name: Porto city flat near the sea
description:
Here you'll find all you need for your holidays or business trip including feeling like at home.
My flat is very spacious, with all you need to spend a lovely time discovering the city and it's surrounds.
It's in a residential area, so you won't find much traffic around.

The space
Apartment facing Southeast, with a big bedroom, living room, separate kitchen, bathroom and balcony overlooking the river and the sea. The room is very spacious, it has two single beds and a desk and if needed, you can open an extra single bed. The living room has a 2 persons sofa bed, cable TV, DVD player, dinning table and chairs. The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, oven, fridge, freezer, washing machine, microwave, toaster, kettle, blender, mixer, coffee maker, iron and iron board … The bathroom has a sink, toilet, bath and bidet, hairdryer, first aid kit. The balcony has table and chairs and a great hammock for you to take a rest. The apartment also includes bed line
neighborhood_overview: In the surrounds you have Serralves Museum and Pasteleira public park where you can have a picnic, take a walk or rest. There's also Porto's Youth Hostel. The river front is just 3 min apart. The tram passes close by.
host_about:
Olá, sou a Paula e adoro a minha cidade!
Adoro viajar mas é no Porto que me sinto em casa.
Adoro tricotar e aproveito o meu tempo livre para o fazer, é o meu ioga ;)


Hi, I'm Paula and I love my city!
I love to travel but where I fell at home is here in Porto.
I love to knit and use my free time to do it, it's my yoga ;)

name: Oporto Apartment Triplex
description:
- Cozy apartment with great sun exposition
- It is ideal for 2 or 4 people
- It has 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds
- Panoramic terrace with views of the city center
- Full bathroom and 1 wc
- Internet Wi-Fi and TV
- There's an elevator.

It is located on Rua Santa Catarina, 10 minutes from Bolhão market and the commercial area, one of the most known areas of Porto. The main Aliados square is 15 minutes away.

It's a welcome place

The space
- Apartment has 90 m² area and is located on the third floor of a building with elevator on Santa Catarina street, 10 minutes walk from the urban center.
- Capacity for 4 people.
- Possibility of private parking at 100m: 10 euros/day (confirm availability).

The apartment is composed of 3 floors.
Floor 1:
- 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds (1,95x1,40mt). Bed linen included.
- Full bathroom features bath towels, shampoo, shower gel and hair dryer.<
neighborhood_overview:
OPorto Apartment Triplex is located on Rua Santa Catarina, 10 minutes walk from the pedestrian street / shopping area, one of the most known areas of the city of Porto.
Due to its exceptional location, it allows you to get around on foot, starting to explore the surrounding area: from tourist sites, shops, traditional businesses, Bolhão market, Aliados square, emblematic monuments, art galleries, Douro River, Caves of Port Wine.

Within a radius of 200 meters has: supermarkets, bakeries, patisseries, pharmacy, restaurants, bank and fast access to public transport. The Marquês metro station is 5 minutes away and Bolhão station is 10 minutes away ( line E-direct to the airport).

name: 1 Bedroom Vintage Apartment 60sqm
description:
The space
Our apartment is located on the first floor of a 19th century building near where once stood the medieval walls. Situated in Vitória, one of the most beautiful and traditional neighbourhoods of Porto, classified by UNESCO as "World Heritage Site" is an ideal base to explore all the places of the town.

It can accommodate two guests in a comfortable double bed and two extra guests in a sofa bed. It is perfect for couples (straight/gay/lesbian friendly) who want to enjoy romantic days in Porto, solo travellers who want to experience the town as a local, businessmen/women who are tired of staying in hotels, families with one or two kids and close friends who are looking for a cosy and private place to stay.

Decorated in a vintage style, it has everything you need to feel at home.

The apartment is accessed by a stairway (there is no elevator in the building) leading into a quiet and cosy sitting room with a comfortable sofa-bed (120x20

A trip to the center costs about 10 €. There are bus stops and a taxi station within a 5-minute walk.

host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host_about:
I´m the person you want to meet in the city of Porto... why ???

Because I´m a very sociable person, always happy and cheerful, talkative and always with a very positive energy towards life.
A detail, i love everything that is quality, i love eating good food being one of the pleasures of my life as well as drinking fantastic wines of superior quality.
For me, the quality is in the details, and in the attention we have to all the people around us. Do your best to others and hope that life will reward you, this is how i am in life.

I´m one of the pioneers on airbnb with more than 10 years and more than 3500 travel experiences. I´m a professional tour guide also awarded on airbnb experiences, see my profile in detail on airbnb.
I also have a project of personalized tourism where i design tours at your measure. With me you can see Porto city, Douro Valley and all north of Portugal with the eyes of a local citizen.

I look forward to your visit to be able to give you the best informations and all the best places to visit.

I live for my guests, because i love meeting other people, other cultures and learning all the wisdom that my guests can add to me.

I have a phrase that is always present in my mind ...
"I don´t have much time to travel around the world, but the world comes to my house everyday through my guests ..."

Because I´m a very sociable person, always happy and cheerful, talkative and always with a very positive energy towards life.
A detail, i love everything that is quality, i love eating good food being one of the pleasures of my life as well as drinking fantastic wines of superior quality.
For me, the quality is in the details, and in the attention we have to all the people around us. Do your best to others and hope that life will reward you, this is how i am in life.

I´m one of the pioneers on airbnb with more than 10 years and more than 3500 travel experiences. I´m a professional tour guide also awarded on airbnb experiences, see my profile in detail on airbnb.
I also have a project of personalized tourism where i design tours at your measure. With me you can see Porto city, Douro Valley and all north of Portugal with the eyes of a local citizen.

I look forward to your visit to be able to give you the best informations and all the best places to visit.

I live for my guests, because i love meeting other people, other cultures and learning all the wisdom that my guests can add to me.

I have a phrase that is always present in my mind ...
"I don´t have much time to travel around the world, but the world comes to my house everyday through my guests ..."

name: Studio - Casa do Pinheiro
description:
The space
Located in the last floor of a renovated 18th century house with a balcony to the picturesque Rua do Pinheiro. This sunny studio has 35 sq./m, including WC and an all equipped kitchen. One double bed and one extra single bed, by demand.

Rua do Pinheiro is located in a vivid neighborhood with antique dealers, second - hand bookshops and charming pubs. 5 min walking to Trindade Metro Station Terminal, 3 min to the City Hall, 10 min to the riverside.

License number
6184/AL
neighborhood_overview: Rua do Pinheiro is located in a vivid neighborhood with antique dealers, second - hand bookshops and charming pubs. 5 min walking to Trindade Metro Station Terminal, 3 min to the City Hall, 10 min to the riverside.
host_about:
Casa do Pinheiro was a typical 18th century building in the city centre, normally for big families, and was recently bought by Bernardo and Francisca Amaral ( brothers) and rehabillitated for 4 different apartments. They live on two of them and the Studio and Duplex facing the street are destined to receive travellers and short term inhabitants. The rehabilitation project, conceived and directed by Bernardo, a free-lance architect, has been recently recognised with an honourable mention in a rehabilitation prize, promoted by the city council.
We both, live in Porto, in the city centre, for more than ten years, and always propose our new guest our own view on the city life, it's hidden spots and paths, restaurants, cafes, a good place to eat fish or hear some fado. Francisca is a tour guide. Bernardo also organizes walking and driven tours, focused on the  architecture of Oporto School, but also on the city's urban development since the 12th century.

name: Sun, sea & city.
description:
Beach apartment with sea view only 15 minutes away from Porto center and 100mts walking distance to the beach. Private condominium with parking, playground, basketball and tennis court. Public transports, supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants and beach lounges nearby.
If you are coming to work we have a work desk with PC and super fast internet!
We provide bikes for our guests on request.

The space
Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, we have adopted strict measures and procedures to protect our guests and follow the advice and guidelines issued by the World Health Organization (WHO).
The apartment is receiving additional cleaning on departure, paying attention to the contact points.
There is a 24h window between stays, by doing this we use the most effective cleaning products and give them time to act for the best possible result.
We have also been awarded by the Portuguese Institute for Tourism with the “Safe and Clean” certification and follow
neighborhood_overview: The beaches are amazing and certified blue flag for its quality. The Douro river is only 2 km away. This area is perfect for relaxing. You can enjoy long bike rides along the sea or the river with perfect views all the time. You can also use the promenade for pleasant long walks at the end of the day and sit on the sand admiring the lovely sunset. Restaurants, Bakeries, Supermarkets, ATM,Beach lounges in the area, also a Bike rental spot just 300mts from the apartment.

I AM GLAD TO HOST YOU!
Hello everyone and welcome! I believe that Portuguese hospitality starts with a smile and I'm excited to be part of this community and be able to help people feel at home.Look forward to making wonderful new friendships with people around the globe! :)

3 Bdr (1 Ensuite) Penthouse Apt located within a gated community. You have access to 3 pools (2 outdoor/1 indoor), games room, gym, squash court and benefit from parking.
If you wish to enjoy luxury accommodation in quiet, peaceful surroundings it is the ideal home and the truly location.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment overlooks Madalena Beach which is very quiet, safe and a pleasant place. It is situated in a quiet residential area which combines beach and city.
The local large sandy beach, with some rocky areas and calm sea, is complemented by wooden walkways which are attractive options for biking or long promenades. You are: 1 min. walk away of Blue flag Beaches, pedestrian promenade/beach and cycle tracks.
You'll find everything to make your vacation pleasurable... sun, romantic sunsets, pedestrian walkways, cycle tracks, an endless variety of water sports, freshwater and saltwater fishing, nature tourism, shopping,... beach bars, sidewalk cafes, restaurants providing interesting activities for all tastes. For golf enthusiasts, there are 3 golf courses nearby.
The apartment is perfect for long-term assignments, short breaks and leisure travel, for families or couples. Moreover, it is an ideal choice for golfers or small groups of friends.
host_about:
Born in Oporto / Porto, I love my city but not only. I love to travel around the world for studies or for leisure. For me to travel/discover new landscapes and new cultures are one of the most important things in life. As I´m used to be in different parts of the world, I appreciate a fantastic place to stay as much as you do! 

I decided to rent my fabulous Beachfront apartment because I think it has luxury conditions for visitors and I like to meet people from other countries. My renters are always delighted with the property and I enjoy seeing their faces as they come into the apartment and see the high standards in quality & style for their holiday. 

I love the place I live in, because it is calm, unbeatable, just by the seaside and for its accessibility to Oporto / Porto. Porto is close to it too (about 30 minutes away by bus from Porto and just 1 minute walk to bus stop). 

I love to arrive home after a long day's work in Porto / Oporto and in the minute I set foot in the entrance hall having Beach and Ocean views. The facilities on the site and the local facilities are more than you can expect with plenty to see, eat and drink. I love it: play a party of squash, swimming, walk on the beach, cycling, go to the beach bars...

It's important to me that renters can relax and enjoy the luxurious comforts of this Beachfront Penthouse whilst sampling the delights of all that Oporto / Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia has to offer. I am very happy to help in anyway, either before, or when you arrive. Just let me know what I can do to make your trip a good one!

Bienvenue chez vous !
Welcome to you!
¡A bienvenidos a usted!
Willkommen bei Ihnen!
Benvenuto da voi!

description:

The space

It has a modern kitchen with fridge, oven, kettle, coffeemaker, toaster, microwaves, coffee espresso machine, and all utensils, in order to allow guests to prepare their own meals.
In the bathroom you will find toiletries (soap, shampoo, shower gel, paper, towels and hairdryer).
The apartment is very comfortable and is equipped with plasma TV with more than 40 channels), wi-fi connection and free Internet access. The apartment is a short walk from the area of restaurants and bars and the main historical monuments of the village, as well as the River Douro. Its excellent loc
neighborhood_overview:
Praça de Gomes Teixeira, The Square with the fountain of Lions

This might be one of the nicest squares in the Carmo district of Porto. The square with the fountain of lions.
It got its name on 1936 in honor of Francisco Gomes Teixeira, a well known professor in the University of Porto.
Around the square there are some buildings belong to the university, the Carmo Church and main roads to the city center.
It is a walking distance from Sao Bento station, Livreria Lello and the beautiful Rua Galeria de Paris.
The fountain with lions around it, is one of the few water sources in the city.
Highly recommended to visit this beautiful square and peek into the university store or paying a visit inside the beautiful church.
This charming apartment, totally renewed, is located in Oporto's historical center, (classsified by UNESCO as World Heritage Site) in the middle of the bar and restaurant distrit, near Torre dos Clérigos, a very busy part of Town.

COVID-19
The welfare of all our guests and team members is of the utmost importance, and we had been busy implementing new health initiatives to welcome new guests after the lockdown.

name: Your Beach House, close to Oporto
description:
Looking for a place to relax, with a beautiful view of the sea and a beach to enjoy but at the same time, close to the main sights like Porto, Braga and Viana do Castelo?
This is the right place for you and your family.
Here you will find a cosy flat, exclusive use, with all the commodities and a 5-minute drive from the picturesque town of Vila do Conde.
There is so much to discover. From surf to birdwatching. From amazing sunsets to delicious freshly caught seafood. What are you waiting for?

The space
Beach House - 2 rooms Apartment in a gated community, with private pool and garden areas, in one of the most preserved beaches in the district of Porto.
Open plan living-room with kitchen and dining areas. TV and wi-fi access. Balcony with sea view. Oven, microwave and fridge. Dishwasher and wahsing machine.

Towels and linens included in the ammenities.

Guest access
Access to all areas of the house.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a quiet neighborhood, right in front of the beach. There are nice restaurants and beach bars. Within 10 minutes on foot there are convenience supermarkets where you can also buy fresh vegetables and fruits.
A 5-minute drive from the picturesque town of Vila do Conde where you can find great restaurants to try the local gastronomy.
Azurara is a fantastic spot for a surf or pladdle adventure (sea and river). There are schools right in front of the apartment, with lessons and rental of all equipment. There is also a sea front going from here to Oporto for late afternoon or early evening walks and beach bars offering freshly caught seafood.
In addition, 20 minutes by car or 30 minutes by metro from the city of Porto, elected in 2016 best European Destination for the 2nd time.
Plenty of things to discover and get amazed with.
host_about:
I am a nice portuguese girl who values the small details of life that make the whole difference. I lived by the beach all my life but recently I discovered that a country life can have its charm. 
It is also why I am moving house and opening my home to anyone who wants to enjoy a panoramic view of the ocean, in a still small and cosy paradise of the north of Portugal. 
I have 5 dogs amd 5 cats, all rescued ... and wish to have much more :)
I work as a marketing strategist and I am passioned for transforming the consumer journey experience into something really meaningful.
I hope I can do just that with you :)

When I sought this space, I put as conditions that were located in the historic city, which was comfortable and modern, which have public transport links nearby and accessible, which have good accessibility to the airport and had high quality equipment.
Upon discovering this brand new apartment in the historic area in front of a beautiful garden, where there was tour buses and trams and it also has its own garage, i do not hesitate to choose it.
With my wife, i've equiped it with modern, comfortable and functional furnishings, and refined taste.
Just happened to be a pleasure to welcome people of all nationalities who wish to visit this beautiful city of Oporto that we love.

name: The peacefulness of the countryside near Oporto
description:
Casa do Mestrinho is a licensed holiday home two hundred years old house with garden is set near the river Douro, in Avintes (Vila Nova de Gaia), 8km from Porto.
This is the perfect place to stay if you want to explore the beautiful city of Porto while simultaneously recharging your batteries!

The space
Nineteenth century house, charming, recently refurbished and fully furnished house, ideal for people looking for a temporary rental. This is an ecological house with regard to the techniques used in its restoration, and also because we reused old furniture. Along side with this, we created conditions for the separation and recycling of garbage, specially the one required to make homemade compost.
What makes this unique? You can visit the city (Oporto, but also Guimarâes, Braga, Vila do Conde, Viana do Castelo) and, when returning home, eat and sleep like if you were in the field. You may also decide to do nothing, just sunbathing in the garden, reading
neighborhood_overview:
The place, called Espinhaço, was habited at least since the eighteenth century, mostly by fishermen. It is an ancient village with narrow, winding streets. Today it is a place of good-natured simple people.
Located in a peaceful, and extremely beautiful semi-rural area, 100 meters away from the Douro river. You can take nice walks along the river, have your meals in the garden under the shade of vines and have a good night sleep in a very quiet place.
In the village of avintes we highlighted as the main landmark the Gaia Biological Park, interesting project of nature conservation.
Located only 9Km from Porto center, near the main highways that connect the north and south of the country and 27km from Porto's Airport. Nearby there is public transport but with very limited schedules. A car is required.
What makes this unique? You can visit the city (not only Oporto, the closest one, but also Guimarâes, Braga, Vila do Conde, Viana do Castelo) and, when returning home,
host_name: Teresa E Pedro / Teresa Und Pedro
host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host_about:
Gostamos das folhas amarelas a cair das árvores, gostamos do vento, gostamos das pequenas ideias, gostamos do poder que cada um de nós tem para transformar o mundo, gostamos da utopia e da liberdade, gostamos de quando um desconhecido ajuda outro, gostamos de viajar com um livro, gostamos de mexer na terra, de fazer plantas crescer, gostamos de criar objetos, gostamos da diferença e da diversidade, gostamos de coisas muito pequeninas e de coisas muito, muito grandes e gostamos do que elas têm em comum. Gostamos dos momentos rápidos que se arrastam no tempo. Gostamos de metamorfoses e do poder da mudança. Gostamos de convicções e de boa vontade. Gostamos de imaginação e de criatividade. Gostamos de justiça, gostamos de igualdade. Gostamos do passado e de histórias sem interesse. Gostamos de distinguir o essencial do acessório e de definir prioridades. Gostamos da capacidade para nos colocarmos no lugar dos outros: sejam eles os passados, os vindouros, os vizinhos, os estrangeiros, os de outras convicções, os animais, as plantas ou os extraterrestres. Gostamos das pessoas que gostamos e gostamos de conhecer pessoas novas. 
Como anfitriões gostamos de ajudar a conhecer e gostamos de não incomodar.
Wir lieben die fallenden Herbstblätter, wir lieben den Wind, wir lieben kleine Ideen, wir lieben die Kraft, die jeder von uns hat, die Welt zu verändern, wir lieben die Utopie und die Freiheit, wir lieben es, wenn ein Fremder einem anderen hilft, wir lieben die Reise mit einem Buch, wir lieben es, in der Erde zu wühlen, Pflanzen wachsen zu lassen, Gegenständen zu erschaffen, wir lieben den Unterschied und die Vielfalt, wir lieben sehr kleine Dinge und sehr große Dinge  und wir lieben das, was sie gemeinsam haben. Wir lieben flüchtige Momente, die sich in die Länge ziehen. Wir lieben Metamorphosen und die Kraft der Veränderung. Wir lieben Überzeugungen und das Wohlwollen. Wir lieben Phantasie und Kreativität. Wir lieben  Gerechtigkeit und Gleichberechtigung. Wir lieben Geschichten aus der Vergangenheit und belanglose Geschichten. Wir lieben es, das Wesentliche vom Nebensächlichen zu unterscheiden und Prioritäten zu setzen. Wir lieben die Fähigkeit, sich in andere hinein zu versetzen: seien es Wegbegleiter von früher oder in der Zukunft, Nachbarn, Fremde, Andersdenkende, Tiere, Pflanzen oder Wesen aus fremden Welten. Wir lieben die Menschen, die wir lieben, und wir lieben es, neue Menschen kennen zu lernen.
As Gastgeber helfen wir gern beim Kennenlernen, ohne dabei zu stören.
neighbourhood: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

name: PortoFLAT Self contained studioflat
description:
The space
Self contained large remodeled studio flat near CASA DA MUSICA / BOAVISTA, on the 4th and last floor (with elevator, obviously! ), comprises large sunny lounge / room, large bathroom with italian shower, large sunny fully equipped kitchen (including fridge, micro-wave oven, vitro ceramic stove, toaster and coffee machine). All facilities are included.
You will also have a WiFi access point provided by the FON / ZON alliance which will also work outside the flat, a large monitor/TV with Satellite channels, a 2.1 speaker set, and a washing machine.

You may also have a bicycle if you want one !

Towels and linens are also provided.

There is a small shop on the same street, with all the basics just next door to the building, several cafes, and a bakery, all literally at a 2 minute walking distance. At a 5 minute walking distance, there's also a supermarket! CASA DA MUSICA, the internationally acclaimed concert hall designed by D
neighborhood_overview:
Check out the "Casinha Boutique Cafe" which has a lovely garden ! Or the superb "Em Carne Viva" vegetarian restaurant ! Both are really close to the flat ! As is the "Mercado do Bom Sucesso", an old market place converted to a multitude of cool food stands...The Serralves Museum is also close.
There are also two supermarkets just 5 minutes walk : "Pingo Doce" on the Avenue and "Lidl" also close...
host_about:
Cosmopolitan may be what first comes to mind !
I work in the film business and my other half is a Graphic designer... Born of French parents in Liberia (sh** happens !)  brought up in the Uk, lived in Spain, Portugal and Brazil....multilingual & well travelled,with a base in Porto for over 15 years , I also have a passion for doing up places, wine, architecture, music, photography, art, bakelite phones, peanut butter and....hmmm...Film !

" A vida, é a arte do encontro ! " - Vinicius de Moraes

The space
Duplex Apartment at Largo do Terreirinho (Barredo), in a XVII century building with two bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and living room. In the historical, world heritage city area. Close to the Ribeira square and river Douro(just 30 meters). Historical neighbour. Fantastic for those that want know the city of Oporto.

It´s fully equipped and is completely renovated.

It´s a two bedrooms apartment with one double bed and one double sofa bed.

Nearby to restaurants, wine caves, bars, Luís I bridge, shops, church of São Francisco, tourist spots, cruises on the Douro river, historical buildings, Palácio da Bolsa (Stock Exchange Palace), Museum of Port Wine, and more ...

We will welcome you with a bottle of Vinho do Porto (Port Wine) and a basket of fruit.

Everything you need to spend your holidays. In a quiet place but in the down-town.

Cabeira House (named for being the home there will be "along the path to the River") is located in the small village of Paradinha currently no permanent inhabitants. It is in a small valley, embedded in the Arouca Geopark. Excellent for those who love nature and quiet river.
Near:
Located 22km and 7km of Arouca Alvarenga, known for its superb steaks, beef breed Arouquesa.
River Paiva much sought after by lovers of extreme sports (rafting, kayaking, climbing, canyoning).
Arouca Geopark, several walking trails, Career Mill, Arouca Monastery, Frecha Mizarela (falling water), Saw da Freita, Pillory Alvarenga.

Possibility of meals prepared at home ... breakfast, snacks, typical Portuguese food or something to your liking ... or even a surprise for someone special ... or .. a party Thematic ... the mot is released .. .

Sempre quisemos ter um lugar nosso que pudéssemos desfrutar com a família e com os amigos. name: Portugal - Vila Do Conde! Location!
description:
The space
In the middle of a lively mix of beach-side cafés, coffee bars, discotheques, bars, restaurants, quality hotels, main street along side the most popular beach and a 1930's classy newly-renovated casino! This is a perfect place to stay! only 100 metres from the beach and 500 metres from the casino!

During the Summer there is a vast array of traditional festivals and plenty of entertainment throughout. There are also great heritage attractions around the apartment, one being an old medievil castle located approximately 500 meters away.

The nearest metro stop is Portas Fronhas, about 1km away, where you can catch the (largely above ground) red line to Porto, with stops at the major concert hall Casa da Música, some of the most central areas in downtown Porto (Trindade, Bolhão, etc) and one of the central train stations, Campanhã. If you enjoy going for a stroll, head north in the coastline towards Póvoa de Varzim for some more beaches and se

name: Old city! River View! Indoor Parking!
description:
Charming recent double bedroom apartment, combining a stunning river view with a central location in the old district! 5m walking from Cathedral, Luis I iron bridge, Ribeira panoramic elevator, Batalha Square, Sta. Catarina street and Majestic caffé!

The space
The Apartment:

Double room apartment located on the 2nd floor with elevator of a modern and recently built condo (2010), right in the city center, fully equipped and with surely the Best river view in town!
Picturesquely situated in a cliff at one of the oldest districts of Porto (the Fontainhas district) it will make you feel almost as if you were standing in a natural balcony overviewing the Douro river!

The Equippment:

The apartment has all the facilities for a short stay, and the comfort for a longer family holiday such as:
- Red Room (one double bed 160x220cm)
- Blue Room (three single beds 90x200cm each)
- Living room with large sofa confortable f
neighborhood_overview:
Holiday Festivities:

In June on the night from 23rd to 24th, the hole city celebrates its religious patron day, St.John (S.João).
Traditionally, people come out in the street to watch the firewoks show in the river by the iron bridge and then walk the city up and down dancing in the various street parties.
The Fontainhas district has an eternal connection to theses festivities and this is usually the place where people pass by during their night march!
It is crowded to say the least! This is one of the night you should stay at this apartment!
host_about:
I am 31 years old. 
I own a very nice apartment in the Unesco World Heritage, in Oporto and would be very pleased to host you during your stay in this magnificent city!
I am interested in travelling, sports and history.
Portuguese food is my favourite and it will surely be yours too once you taste it. The mix of flavours is just unbelievable and not to mention the amazing fish on our coast!
I usually enjoy travelling backpack so my favourite trips are of course, interrail style!
My apartment is very cozy and modern, besides its very central location, wich will allow you to walk any interest point!
Portugal is an undescovered treasure. Where else can you have breakfast in World Heritage spot, have lunch by the beach and dinner in the mountains in just one day?
Do not think twice, come and visit Oporto and Portugal!
Cheers!

name: Rustic House
description:
The house is perfect! Magnificent garden with fruit trees, ponds, patios, and a 12-meter long covered swimming pool, excellent for an early morning swim. Train to Porto at 5 min, a shopping center at 5 min and a bakery nearby. Very well equipped, with a fully functional laundry room, pool stretchers, including beach towels, fully equipped kitchen and bathrooms! There are also two bicycles for your rides and a vintage table football (foosball) for frenzied games and great laughs!

The space
I'm renting out an amazing stone house dating back to 1740, just 15km away from Porto. It's a great place to spend some relaxing holidays in the countryside.

The house has 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with two single beds. Both rooms have a bathroom and there's also a third guest WC. The kitchen is fully equipped (including a stove, fridge, microwave oven, dishwasher and a table). There's also a washing machine, an iron and an ironing board in the
neighborhood_overview:
O espaço está situado numa pequena aldeia, a 20km do centro do Porto e a 5 minutos de várias superfícies comerciais.
Espaço calmo e recatado, ideal para relaxar, pois tem uma envolvência paradisíaca. É ideal também para juntar a família ou os amigos num pequeno evento.
Nota: o preço de eventos é o equivalente ao preço de 4 noites, no entanto este aspeto poderá ser discutível, de acordo com o n.º de convidados ou noites efetivamente passadas na casa, entre outros.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Elisa and I'm renting out a beautiful stone house near Porto. It's not just a house, it's a real home and it's been in my family for several generations! It's recently vacant and I'd like to open the doors to travelers from all over the world. I want it to be your home when you come to visit Porto and I will do my best to make you feel comfortable. 

Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions, I'm happy to meet your needs if you need an extra bed or any tips and advice. I speak Portuguese and French and, with the help of my 2 sons, we can also communicate in English, Spanish, and German. If I'm able to, I'd love to come and fetch you in the airport and I'd be happy to share a meal with you if you'd enjoy that.

Looking forward to welcoming you in Portugal!

name: Blue Oporto Home River Front - Ribeira
description:
Oporto Home Apartments are 5 touristic apartments, completely equipped for our guests to live there during their stay.
Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira neighbourhood

The space
Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira area, the most typical neighborhood of Oporto.
The apartments have a magnificent and exclusive view of Douro River, the monumental D. Luis Bridge and the numerous wine cellars that line the river in Gaia side. At the same time you stay near the attractions and historical monuments of the city and just 20 minutes away from Sá Carneiro Airport and 5 minutes away from the train and subway station of São Bento.
The apartments and its building are dated from the XVIII century and are classified by UNESCO as part of the World Heritage Site. Totally remodeled and decorated in a contemp
host_about:
Oporto Home Boutique Apartments are a touristic apartments chain developed by portuguese entrepreneurs that have more than 10 years of existence.  We believe that the more globalised and standardised the world becomes, the more people want to experience something authentic when they travel. Whether our guests are stopping off for a few hours or a few days, for work or for pleasure, we want to pass them the feeling and soul of a genuine Porto. We strive daily to make our guests feel welcomed, comfortable, locals, at home. 
Welcome to your Oporto Home Boutique Apartments - make yourself at Home.

name: Holiday Villa - Casa do Sobreiro
description:
The space
Only 20 minutes from the city of Oporto, " Casa do Sobreiro" was recently renovated and managed to keep the original structure and architecture, which is typical of the Douro region.

An old mill for the production of olive oil was kept intact and is certainly an interesting feature of the Casa do Sobreiro.

In the surrounding area, the focus is on the beach and a small marina with restaurants where you can enjoy the best Portuguese gastronomy.
You can also explore the Douro river cruises.

Accommodation

Casa do Sobreiro offers self catering accommodation for up to 8 propõe.
The house compromises:
- Four bedrooms
- extensive loung and dining area
- full equiped kitchen
- three bathrooms
- cable tv
- fireplace
- hifi and dvd
- swimming pool
- barbecue
- car park

Outside

The safety of letting the kids play outside without concerns. The diferent smells of the flours, and always have some kind of outside activity to do.

A car trip from the villa to the downtown area of Porto takes 12 minutes (17 km), and the Atlantic coast and sandy beaches are 20

Earlier in my life I traveled a lot for recreation and for work, but now I'm saving up to travel with the children in a few years time :-) I love my family and live a quiet and simple life in one of the best and most beautiful countries in the word, and one of the richest ones also, if you measure the wealth by the quality and sympathy of the people.

name: Charming Apartment near the Beach  (34512/AL)
description:
Flat in the 1st floor of a typical portuguese building within two walking minutes from the beach, in the beautiful city of Vila do Conde, Portugal. The initial price, €60, is for 2 persons per night. Near by there are several typical restaurants

The space
The flat has 4 rooms (1 with a double bed, 1 with 2 single beds, 1 with a large single bed and 1 with a bed sofa), two complet bathrooms, living room with dinning table and fireplace, large kitchen with breakfast table and a hall. It is a very confortable apartment with wood floors and lofted ceilings with wood beams, completely equiped and furnitured in a charming style with a touch of portuguese elegant taste, including dishwasher, washing machine , fridge and freezer, TV cooker with oven, microwave and even a Nexpresso coffee maker for your delight. 6 persons can well stay in tha apartment.

Guest access
The whole apartment with all the existing facilities and a garden shared by the res
neighborhood_overview: Despite its good connections with many beautiful cities you do not need to go far to enjoy yourself.  Vila do Conde is a seaside city well-known beaches that extend for 5 Km until the next city of Póvoa de Varzim where you may find one of the most glamorous casinos of the country.  There is also history to discover in Vila do Conde, with its old convent, churches and aqueduct.  The gastronomy will surprise you each time by its simplicity, flavoureness and great value.  Sea fish in its varied forms, usually grilled or oven made, is a speciality in this locality.
host_about: I am a person who likes to meet new people, to make known to receive and to show how good this place has to offer from the nature, the sea, the food, the people, the monuments and the city. I am 56 years old and I am married with lovely wife, Gabriela,  with 3 children having made this house and Vila do Conde my place of vacation because of the house the beach and of the surroundings that are excellent to visit, to walk and to have superb meals.

Hello! 
YoursPorto was created to host travelers that want to discover the hidden secrets, opportunities and get the best that Porto has to offer.
We are a young team that always wants to get the best of the places, so he will try to give (you) that opportunity. Please share your experiences when arrive! :)
Andreia, Helder, Ricardo, Nicolau, Pamela, Tiago, Diogo, and Rui are fun and helpful, they are graduated in Tourism and they are the heart of this company, you will love them for sure!

Join us and find out how to LOVE PORTO!
The YoursPorto team

name: Apartment near to Port Wine Cellars
description:
Este é um apartamento idealmente bem situado. Daqui obtém-se vistas maravilhosas, quer seja durante o dia quer seja à noite. Próximo, está o teleférico, os barcos para passeios no rio, as caves de vinho do Porto, restaurantes e... o Porto.

The space
Apartamento c/ três quartos. Um c/ cama de casal, outro c/ duas camas individuais e o terceiro c/ uma cama de solteiro possui também grande janela e uma varanda de onde se pode desfrutar ainda melhor a belíssima paisagem envolvente. Todas as janelas dos quartos e da sala são duplas. Quarto de banho completo e um WC de apoio. Cozinha equipada c/ placa eléctrica, todos os utensílios p/ cozinhar, máquina de sumos, cafeteira eléctrica, forno micro-ondas, torradeira de pão, frigrífico e máquina de lavar roupa. Salão p/ jantar e estar c/ grande janela c/ óptima vista p/ o Rio Douro e equipado c/ televisão. O edifício tem elevador. Idealmente bem situado em rua sossegada da zona histórica de Gaia, sobre as Caves do Vinho d
neighborhood_overview: O apartamento insere-se na zona histórica da cidade de Vila Nova de Gaia. Próximo está o Mosteito da Serra do Pilar. Na ribeira de Gaia está o Mosteiro de Chorpus Christi e as caves de vinho do Porto. Está situado a meia distância entre a passagem inferior e superior da Ponte D. Luiz. Isto quer dizer que quando se dirigem à cidade do Porto, tanto podem fazê-lo pela ponte superior, que os leva à baixa da cidade, catedral, estação de S. Bento, etc. e voltar pela ponte inferior com passagem pela ribeira. Como podem fazer o percurso inverso passando pelos mesmos sítios.
host_location: Resido em Vila Nova de Gaia. Ou seja, do outro lado do rio.
host_about: Sou natural de S. Nicolau - Porto, freguesia ribeirinha. Nasci à beira do Rio Douro, aprendi a nadar neste rio. Tenho a pronúncia do norte. Adoro a minha cidade. Aprecio um bom vinho do Porto.
neighbourhood: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

name: PENSÃO FAVORITA
description:
A Pensão Favorita situa-se no centro histórico do Porto, na rua Miguel Bombarda, onde a maioria das galerias de Arte estão localizadas e onde estas organizam uma abertura comum, com novas exposições, bimensalmente.
Tem doze quartos independentes, cafetaria com esplanada e jardim.
Na casa principal localizam-se: sete quartos, a receção, a sala-de-estar que dá acesso ao jardim e á cafetaria. No jardim localizam-se mais 5 quartos.
•Ano de Construção: 2010
•última remodelação: 2018

The space
A Pensão Favorita é uma Casa onde qualquer pessoa se pode sentir bem-vinda, graças a uma seleção detalhada de objetos e referências, onde se mistura o mobiliário moderno e peças vintage.
O hotel foi pensado de forma a oferecer uma boa dinâmica tanto nos espaços públicos como na organização dos quartos e áreas privadas.

Guest access
As áreas comuns são: a sala de estar, a cafetaria, a esplanada e o jardim.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
O bairro é conhecido por ter comércio de rua alternativo, está muito perto do centro histórico e do Palácio de Cristal.
A rua é calma, tem poucos restaurantes e não tem nenhum bar. No entanto, a 5 min a pé encontram muitas opções para passarem uma bela noite.
host_about: A Favorita está localizada no Porto, internacionalmente reconhecido pelo Vinho do Porto e pela sua gastronomia. No centro histórico, entre o Palácio de Cristal, onde podem encontrar uma casa de provas de vinho do Porto, e o museu de Arte Soares dos Reis. Na rua Miguel Bombarda, onde a maioria  das galerias estão localizadas e onde estas organizam uma abertura comum bimensalmente.

name: Oporto Center Private Room1
description:
- This room is ideal for 2 people. It has two single beds
- Bathroom is private
- Shared kitchen for two more bedrooms
- Free Wi-Fi
- On the lower floor has a garden accessible to guests
- Direct metro line from the airport (line E)

- The house completely restored and equipped in a quiet street 50 meters from Rua Santa Catarina, one of the main shopping streets of Porto, is 10 minutes walk from the pedestrian zone and Bolhão Market.

It's a welcome place.

The space
- Oporto Center Private Room it's cozy and bathroom is private, has small wardrobe, bath towels and toiletries.
- The room has recently been refurbished but retains the original wooden floor and of the wooden doors. It is situated on the middle floor in a three-story house.
- On the same floor there are two more guest rooms, a kitchen and a living room overlooking the garden, these spaces are shared.
- Kitchen equipped with appliances needed
neighborhood_overview:
- Oporto Center Private Room1 is in a quiet neighborhood and 50 meters from Rua de Santa Catarina, one of Porto's main shopping streets, is a 10-minute walk from the pedestrian zone.
Due to its exceptional location, it allows you to get around on foot, starting to explore the surrounding area: from tourist sites, shops / stores, traditional businesses, Bolhão market, Avenida dos Aliados, emblematic monuments, art galleries, Douro river, Porto Wine Cellars and nightlife area.
- 300 meters from Bolhão metro station with line (E) direct to Airport.
- In the area you can find several restaurants with traditional Portuguese food.
host_about: Hi, my name is Paula and I'm renting out two lovely and central apartments , in Oporto. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me in English basic, Spanish, French and Portuguese, I'm happy to help!

name: Porto Leça Beach Flat in Matosinhos
description:
The space
Welcome to our apartment, near "Leça da Palmeira" city beach, that was recently renewed and it´s situated in Matosinhos Area/ Porto District:
- 8 minutes walking to Leça beach;
- 20 minutes to Airport, by car;
- 15/20/30 minutes to Porto downtown, by car/taxi, bus or metro, respectively (depending on traffic).

The apartment overview is relaxing with lovely front and back gardens. There're also lots of shops around the apartment block (cafes, grocery and bakery stores, hairdresser and beautician, etc.) and the shopping mall with cinema and IKEA is about 2 km. You have great connections to O´Porto downtown from bus and taxi terminals near Leça Church (about 5/10 minutes walking from the fact) and from "Mercado" metro station (about 20-30 minutes walking from the flat).
Apartment w/ 1 car parking garage.

Guest access
There is always some assistant available to give you the keys and explain you the basic things a
neighborhood_overview: Why is "Leça da Palmeira" city magic for us? Find for yourself... Take a walk in Leça see front, from Marina to the Light House. Have a drink in "Casa de Chá" (Tea House). Bring your kids to the salty swimming pool in "Leça" beach - Siza Vieria well-know portuguese architect works, born in Matosinhos. Great beaches for surf pratice or experience diving or sailing with "Leça" Marina instructors. Learn how to ride a horse in "Leça" Equestrian Center.  Walk through the bridge to Matosinhos city and experience "Porto de Leixões" - the harbour comercial life. Go to "L' Kodac" Bar and enjoy the view on a couch near the sand and sea. Walk in "Quinta da Conceição" gardens - free entrance (with court tennis and swimming pool available for the summer time) or "Quinta de Santiago" gardens. Experience the night life in "Batô" boat disco. Enjoy familiar bar called "45" with friendly pets that will share the space with you (great fireplace in cold weather). Don´t miss "Bit Bar", a pub in the old tow
host_about: Hello! My name is João and I had recently renewed my apartment for renting. Hope you enjoy it!  I also love to travel and know how important is to be well installed and get the proper guidance. So feel free to get in touch for more information. I´m looking forward to share my traveling experiences and also pratice other languages.

name: Big House Near Porto and beachs
description:
The space
Maison de campagne sur deux étages avec jardin sur propriété privée très spacieuse.


Petit potager et arbres fruitiers qui régaleront les plus gourmands.


Portail automatique pour rentrer les voitures et système d'alarme.


Il y a quatre chambres qui peuvent être utilisées contenant chacune un lit double, un grand placard et un fauteuil.
Dans l'une des chambres il y a une salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire et les deux autres pourront se partager une salle de bain avec toilettes et douche.
Une troisième salle de bain se trouve au rez-de-chaussée contenant douche et toilettes.


Il y a un grand salon avec une bibliothèque très bien fournie avec des livres en français, un lecteur de DVD et un lecteur de laser Disc, une petite chaîne hifi, un babyfoot et une télévision avec chaînes câblées.
Il y a deux grands canapés 3 places et une cheminée.

Un accès internet via WI-FI

The house is situated in a quiet street with public/free parking at the door. All you need is in the neighborhood, in which there is a bakery/pastry shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and bank. A few minutes walking you can also find a music nightclub.

We are in an authentic Portuguese neighborhood away from the tourist crowds but close enough to walk to historical spots.

No car traffic noise can be heard from the house.
The house has 2 floors with 2 bedrooms upstairs.
The lounge can become the third sleeping room with a sofa bed.
One full bathroom is downstairs next to the lounge.
Find an extra toilet with sink outside next your front door.

Our places are very clean and well equipped; however feel free to ask any item you could miss, or can not find. We will try to  provided it during your stay.

I take your reservation very seriously and I never cancel, but 
please make first an inquiry clicking on the button: "contact me".

Looking forward to have the pleasure to welcome you and provide you a nice stay!
Kind regards, Isabel

neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is known to be one of the favorites because it is in the center but just a bit away from the big mess - 10min walking from the main square so the perfect distance. It is a very typical neighborhood with plenty of small sellers and cafés and plenty if people on the streets... Also known for the fine art university which brings to the neighborhood some young people. It used to be the richest area in the XIX century, so you will be able to see nice old houses but nowadays it is just the standard of Porto living style, being the rich area nearby the sea and away from center.
host_about: Hello I am a visual artist and professor but most importantly I am a constant traveler. When I travel I get the chance to rent my own apartment. name: Casa da Paz | Clean&Safe Vintage House with garden
description:
Welcome to the center of Porto at its finest! This vintage and completely refurbished Portuguese tile house, is located in the heart of the city, giving guests a true cultural experience.

The space
ABOUT THE HOUSE:
Fall in love with Casa da Paz. Located on the city center, Casa da Paz offers privacy and tranquility, while simultaneously being in the heart of the Arts District. Inside this newly restored house, you will find a bright and spacious living/dining area, with beautiful windows that allow natural light to stream through.

The master bedroom has a king bed and bright window with beautiful solid wooden window shutters. The second bedroom has a queen bed and a beautiful little balcony. Each bedroom has traditional features like beautiful solid wooden floors alongside an edgy vintage stools, wardrobe and vintage lamps. There’s also a twin bed in the living room space.

Take advantage of the fully equipped kitchen to prepare a deli
neighborhood_overview:
THE NEIGHBOURHOOD:

The area is known as the ARTS DISTRICT and the house is located at the epicentre of the art scene and near the famous Oporto nightlife, so you'll have pretty much everything at a walking distance:

Art galleries, illustration galleries, design stores, vintage stores, old books and comics stores, record stores, all kind of restaurants (typical, vegetarian, gourmet, all price ranges), tea and coffee shops, supermarkets, bio stores, bars, clubs and night-life, car parking, bus stops, pharmacies and many other services: all around our street and neighbourhood.

Casa da Música (Rem Koolhaas's Music House): 5 minutes walk

Mercado Porto Belo (Saturday's Flea Market): 8 minutes walk

Lello Bookshop - listed as the third most beautiful bookstore in the world: 15 minutes walk

Clérigos Tower - considered the Ex Libris of Oporto: 15 minutes walk

Cordoaria Garden (with sculptures by Juan Muñoz): 5 minut
host_about:
We are your hosts at Casa da Paz!

Gabriela Molinos was born in Porto and has been working in the 5-star hotel industry over the past 15 years. Passionate about travelling and totally in love with Porto and Portugal, she can combine luxury and vacation rentals like no other.
 
Tiago Molinos was also born in Porto, but grew up in Caminha. He’s our Geek! He’s a specialist in wireless and networking.  And a true enthusiast of water sports and motorbikes.

Maria is a Biomedical Engineer working in Porto, and she enjoys rescuing beautiful Portuguese antiques. She lives in the small village of Caminha, a magical place where the beach and the countryside are kings, perfect for surfers and kite surfers.

We are the family in charge of making your stay in Porto better than you imagined.

The Casa da Paz | House of Peace is an ongoing project. We started by restoring the facade and we gave life to the garden and now we still have other projects on the way.
We hope you enjoy the house as much as we do.

description:
A fantastic space with garden and sun :)

The space
Wooden house with balcony, set in a garden of a villa of the nineteenth century, rehabilitated.
Has an excellent transport network, with Trindade Metro Station only at 5 minutes walk away; bus right next door and Train Station nearby. It's close to some of the city landmarks, such as the Porto City Council, "Trindade", "Avenida dos Aliados" and "Casa da Música".

name: "Porto Ribeira Moments" apartment
description:
The "PORTO RIBEIRA MOMENTS" apartment, designed and signed by the Architect Tiago Torre, is located at Rua de São João, the most charismatic and popular street of the Porto Ribeira. It is part of a prominent building known as The House Doll (A Casa da Boneca) as it shows on the third floor terrace a female mannequin that charms bystanders and delights photographers.

License number
36689/AL
host_about:
Engenheiro Mecânico jubilado com 40 anos de actividade profissional na área industrial como gestor de empresas nacionais com forte componente exportadora. Daí que tenha viajado por todo o mundo em trabalho. Daí também o facto de falar 4 idiomas, o que, cumulativamente com o meu gosto pelas ciências humanas e o relacionamento interpessoal, facilita imenso esta minha nova actividade de recepção e acompanhamento de turistas estrangeiros. Após a formação liceal secundária clássica, feita em Portugal, vivi 5 anos em França (Haute-Savoie e Paris), onde fiz estudos superiores e licenciatura.
A família, o trabalho e os princípios éticos e da moral cristã, são as bases de orientação da minha vida. 
Gosto de ler sobre actualização tecnológica e economia e investigar na net sobre saúde. 
Como "hobbies" tenho a paixão pelo desporto automóvel, tendo sido piloto amador nos anos 60 e 70. Participei em vários campeonatos nacionais de rallies e de velocidade, e em 1974 participei no rally de Portugal a contar para o campeonato do mundo (sonho realizado).
Ao longo da minha juventude  pratiquei vários outros desportos: atletismo, natação, andebol, hóquei em patins e ténis (que continuo a jogar hoje).
Prefiro indiscutivelmente a boa cozinha portuguesa, a qualquer outra.
O meu lema na actividade turística é: "Better than get guests, our goal is to make friends all over the world".

name: Red Oporto Home River Front - Ribeira
description:
Oporto Home Apartments are 5 touristic apartments, completely equipped for our guests to live there during their stay.
Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira neighbourhood

The space
Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira area, the most typical neighborhood of Oporto.
The apartments have a magnificent and exclusive view of Douro River, the monumental D. Luis Bridge and the numerous wine cellars that line the river in Gaia side. At the same time you stay near the attractions and historical monuments of the city and just 20 minutes away from Sá Carneiro Airport and 5 minutes away from the train and subway station of São Bento.
The apartments and its building are dated from the XVIII century and are classified by UNESCO as part of the World Heritage Site. Totally remodeled and decorated in a contemp
host_about:
Oporto Home Boutique Apartments are a touristic apartments chain developed by portuguese entrepreneurs that have more than 10 years of existence.  We believe that the more globalised and standardised the world becomes, the more people want to experience something authentic when they travel. Whether our guests are stopping off for a few hours or a few days, for work or for pleasure, we want to pass them the feeling and soul of a genuine Porto. We strive daily to make our guests feel welcomed, comfortable, locals, at home. 
Welcome to your Oporto Home Boutique Apartments - make yourself at Home.

Big, sunny bedroom right in the middle of the heart of Oporto waiting for you to enjoy :)

There are other three rooms on this floor(one single and two other double bedrooms), each with its own key.
All linen and towels are provided.

We have a large common living room & dining room where you can enjoy breakfast and relax in the sofa while listening to our vinyl records.

The kitchen is fully furnished with a fridge, stove, cooking plates, coffee maker, toaster and kettle.
There are two bathrooms in the house, both with shower to shared use.

On your doorstep you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, cafés, and some of the best bakeries in town within walking distance.

Join us for a memorable stay.

The space
Dear guest!

Thank you for reading our presentation of services! We hope you feel motivated to book your stay with us and discover the beautiful capital of the north of Portugal and its surroundings.

We offer you a renovated apartment in an old building very well preserved. Modern decoration with lots of practicality. Comfortable rooms and social spaces at your disposal are just right for families or friends to be together. Two bathrooms with showers suited for usability. In this location you are in the heart of the cities of Gaia and Porto, close to the world famous Porto wine cellars in the left margin of the Dou
neighborhood_overview: O local do nosso apartamento está sobre a zona histórica das cidades de Vila Nova de Gaia e do Porto. A dois passos, a ponte Luís I, as caves do vinho do Porto, a Catedral e a melhor vista sobre a cidade do Porto!

Lurdes Pereira

Charming apartment with vintage decor and natural light during all day. name: PentHouse Apartment in a Central Building
description:
Open French doors to a Juliet balcony and admire views across red-tiled rooftops of a historic neighborhood and into the horizon. It's charming and inviting inside, with gleaming timber floors spanning from the bedrooms to a light-filled living area.
This is one of our 6 apartments, take a look to the others and choose what suits you better

The space
The apartment is on the 4th floor of a centenary building that over the years, has been renovated with all modern amenities, while keeping the original character. The building doesn't have lift.
The views are breathtaking; from here you see the roofs of the historic center, the Douro River and boats, far away, the smooth hillside of Vila Nova de Gaia city, and more close, the Vitoria church.
The apartment is preppared to receive 6 guests and have all the amenities: cooker, washing machine, microwave, coffee maker and kettle.

Guest access
There are restrictions about parking: a
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a neighborhood of narrow streets, with the beautiful viewpoint of Vitória. It's a noble area where, in the 16th century, the population of Porto housed the Jews persecuted by King Manuel I.
Here you will meet the locals, the most picturesque people in town; they are very welcoming and joyous and fill the streets with their typical language and sincere generosity.
Wander through the narrow streets and steep stairways in this area, have lunch in the restaurant “Caraças” (cheap and very typical) and visit the renovated cafés and shops in town. If you like walking, go down the narrow streets which you lead you to the river, hire a bike and cycle down to the seafront, where you will find wonderful beaches and esplanades for all tastes.
The neighborhoods are safety and quit. Here you are close to everything: 5 minute walk from the main bus stops and 10 minutes away from the metro; it is very near to the hectic nightlife of the city, where music is everyw

Large apartment located in Matosinhos with beach view, aside of Porto's City Park and at 4 km of EXPONOR - International Fair Center. Enjoy the fantastic beach and Sea views and park your car in our underground parking places. Nice and modern neighborhood. Great fish restaurants in the area. Porto center and "Casa da Musica" is only at 3 kilometers and the historic downtown at 11km that you can easily access by public transport (Bus).

The space
Large apartment on the second floor (with 2 lifts) located in Matosinhos, next to the city park of Porto and 4 km from the EXPONOR - International Fair Center. Beautiful and modern area. Great fish restaurants in the area. And the center of Porto is only 3 kilometers and the city center 11km.

The apartment facing east, south and west where you can enjoy, in the living room of 90 square meters, the beach and sea view by relaxing in our blue Chaise-Longe strategically placed.

The apartment has 4 bedroom
neighborhood_overview:
Matosinhos (a fisherman's city) is renowned for its gastronomy, especially the fresh fish. By lunch or dinner time, you start thinking about the old quarters in Matosinhos or Leça da Palmeira, caressed by the fine odors coming out, either from fine restaurant kitchens or from simple charcoal grills on the street, where fish and seafood are cooked. It is an irresistible calling to our senses that you will satisfy in exquisite restaurants or in simple and informal taverns. In Matosinhos eating is, for everybody, a motto for quality and excellence.

Even though meat isn't forgotten (old recipes are still in use: stewed, roasted, boiled, with vegetables, potatoes, beans; or with new recipes), fish has become a special attraction, for its variety, freshness, and quality, explained by the nearness of the sea and the fish market.

Very close to the apartment there's the Matosinhos beach (200 meters), with a very well-known surfer's spot. The Supermarket is just at 250

neighborhood_overview:
The Mouzinho 134 flat is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center.

Due to its excellent location it has great accessibility, so you won’t have difficulty strolling around the city.

Just a 5 minute walk away, you can find São Bento’s train station, a taxi square and the subway station (São Bento – yellow line).

At the same distance you can find Oporto’s Downtown, the most vibrant place in the city.

There you can find countless shops that offer anything from traditional commerce to international brands and several art galleries exhibiting the works of some of the best Portuguese artists.

In Rua das Flores and Rua Trindade Coelho you can also find many jewelry shops.

There is a wide range of places to grab a snack in the middle of the day.

We recommend Ateneia, Leitaria da Quinta do Paço and Majestic.

If you’re looking for nightlife, Galerias de
host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

name: OPO.APT - Pateo Apartment 110-0
description:
The space
The OPO.APT – Oporto Apartments is a charming modernist building from 1936. The building is a noticeable example of the architecture Deco of the 30’s. This residence complex is the result of a restoration project at the year 2012, which recovered the exterior facades of the building and converted the interior spaces into practical and cozy holiday apartments.
This apartment is placed on the ground floor of the building and integrates a gardened backyard with trees and outdoor furniture, two bedrooms with two single beds each, living room with double sofa bed and TV, open kitchen to the dining room, and a bathroom with shower. The maximum capacity is for 6 persons, and we provide you Internet (cable and Wi-Fi), air conditioning, heating, bed linen, towels, and a weekly cleaning.

name: Great room in Oporto's centre WIFI
description:
Bedroom located in a House in Porto's Center very close to Bolhão Market, the famous Café Majestic and Capela das Almas with his beautiful tiles. Has access to the common areas of the house (kitchen, dining room, garden, TV room), with WIFI coverage.

The space
- HOUSE WITH HISTORY
Our beautiful house with over a century and a half of history is located in Porto's Downtown. Now with new double glass windows with thermal and acoustic protection, combining the antique and traditional architecture with the comfort of today!

- ROOM WITH LOTS OF SPACE AND ALL COMODITIES
The bedroom sleeps 5, 2 in one division of the bedroom and 3 in the other division. The divisions are separated by a door, providing extra privacy. Ideal for families for having a double bed and 3 single beds.
This bedroom has a private bathroom in the same floor with two showers, two sinks and a toillet.
The house has also a service bathroom on the ground floor.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is near Av. dos Aliados, "Mercado do Bolhão", Rua de Santa Catarina (a pedestrian street in the heart of the city where you can find a variety of restaurants and traditional stores and monuments like "Capela das Almas" with its beautiful mosaics and the famous "Café Majestic"...)
Ribeira is just 20 minutes away by walk.
Nearby there are 2 supermarkets and 2 shopping malls.
host_about:
Hello everybody! 
We are Sofia and Jorge and we have a house to rent in our lovely city, Porto and we hope to welcome you soon :)

name: Basic Studio With Top Location and View . Carmo 1
description:
Cosy and modern studio with the best location you can ask for! Situated in Carmo area, classified by UNESCO as World Heritage Site, you will be walking distance from all the main landmarks, the iconic Torre dos Clérigos and the beautiful blue tile wall of Igreja das Carmelitas are steps away. Lello bookshop is just across the square! No excuses for not being the fist in line!
Adults only. 19269/AL

The space
Our studio is located on the 2nd floor of a 19th century building. Excels in natural light and fantastic views over the square and churches.
Very simple, but functional, everything you may need for your stay, fits in 18 square meters.
The kitchen is fully equipped, with a electric stove, fridge, freezer, pans and pots, cutlery and a table for two where you can enjoy the flavors of Portugal.
A comfortable double bed (140x200cm) will be always waiting for you in the after a day exploring the city.

Guest access
The st
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very picturesque and typical, has big squares and quiet gardens, providing the best treats for sightseeing.
The street of the apartment is a busy one, but ours double glazed windows do a terrific job keeping all the street noises outside.
The surrounding area is filled with great bars, coffee shops, bakeries restaurants and shops.

name: Studio in  Porto
description:
Localização excelente no centro do Porto e lugar muito seguro.

The space
No alto do Porto, no centro histórico à Praça da Batalha fica este estúdio muito luminoso.
O estúdio tem duas camas individuais que podem ser unidas, cómoda e guarda-fatos. Na área da cozinha há um fogão, frigorífico, micro-ondas e demais utensílios de cozinha. Há ainda uma zona de refeições. Há internet e TV-Cabo. Na casa de banho há um duche, máquina de lavar roupa. O lavatório é separado.
O Largo Actor Dias fica mesmo ao lado das antigas muralhas fernandinas e do funicular que desce em direção à Ribeira. Seguindo em direção ao centro chega-se à Praça da Batalha e daqui a Santa Catarina e à baixa do Porto. Aqui encontra tudo o que precisa para uma estadia fantástica a descobrir o Porto, já que pode passear pelo centro, tem restaurantes e bares por todo o lado; lojas, centros comerciais, etc.
52832/AL
neighborhood_overview: O studio está no centro do Porto, num sitio lindo de onde podem ver o rio, é seguro e está perto de todos os locais de interesse. A é podem visitar os monumentos de maior interesse na cidade, bem como as zonas de lazer, tem uma das melhores localizações que um visitante pode desejar.
host_about: Olá, sou a Sónia nasci nesta cidade maravilhosa que é o Porto e aqui vivo. Trabalho, mas o que gosto mesmo é de receber pessoas de todo o mundo na minha casa e por isso  desejo a todos os meus hóspedes uma excelente estadia. Estou à vossa disposição para o que precisarem.

name: Clérigos Room | Historic Centre
description:
Independent room located in a historic building in the centre of Porto.

The space
This room is located in an historic and classified building by Unesco in Porto. It is located near the famous Clérigos Tower and it is just above the most interesting places in the center of the city. From here, you can go to the most interesting places by foot, like Library Lello, Galerias de Paris, the famous Café Majestic, S. Bento Railway Station, etc.
If you want to visit the historic center you will never need a car.

The room is located on the 2nd floor of the building, entrance at -1 floor and it hasn't a lift (access by stairs only).

All linen and towels are included during your stay.

The bathroom is also private to the room.

Electric heating available and a dryer for towels in the bathroom.

Hair dryer available.

Bed configuration:
- 1 double bed (with 140cm * 200cm)

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The people of Porto have a natural way to approach to others without any shyness. They simply just love to meet new people and have a way to do it absolutely natural, so do not be afraid of them, be kind and… be welcome!
host_about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

name: Sailing boat at the beach
description:
Sleep for a minimum of two nights in a modern and comfortable Elan 37, a sailing boat of 11 meters long (37 feet).
The boat is composed of 3 cabins, a living room area and a small kitchenette for basic cooking, as well as a bathroom.
There is a small convey perfect for apetizers or meals moments outside.

Staying onboard of Windwalker II is perfect to discover how living onboard is.

We were awarded the Clean & Safe badge guaranteeing cleaning and desinfection procedures against Covid-19.

The space
Windwalker II is a modern and comfortable sailing boat, located at the marina of Leça da Palmeira, 2 minutes walk to the beach and the fish restaurants.

It enables an original experience in the middle of the marina, with other boats as neighbours, surrounding by the sea, the seagals's sound, with the possibility to get baths of sea and sun, weither on the beach, weither on the deck of the boat. It is up to you!

The b
neighborhood_overview:
Beach and sea at 2 minutes walk.
Restaurants, including fish and typical portuguese food, at 3 minutes walk.
Mini-market available at 5 minutes.
Laundry at the marina (ask to the shop Walk-On-Wind).
Rent-a-car, moto or bike available.
Special discount for a sailing trip with a Skipper along the coast or to the old town - 2 or 3 hours, half day/ full day.
host_about:
Bonjour, je m'appelle Aude et je vis au Portugal depuis de nombreuses années. J'apprécie la vie à Porto, où l'air marin est constant et nous rappelle l'histoire des grands navigateurs portugais.
Je serai heureuse de vous accueillir à bord de notre voilier Windwalker II, ou pour une ballade à la voile à bord de notre Day Boat Tango!
A bientôt!

Hey! my name is Aude and I leave in Portugal for years now! I like Porto's life where the marine air is constant and reminds you the Portuguese navigators history.
I'll be happy to welcome you on board our cruising boat Windwalker II or for a sailing experience on our day boat Tango!
Meeting you soon!

name: Central House with 2 bedrooms and private garden
description:
House located in Porto's Center very close to Bolhão Market, Rua de Santa Catarina (a pedestrian street in the heart of the city), the famous Café Majestic and Capela das Almas with his beautiful tiles. Has 2 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a garden

The space
- HOUSE WITH HISTORY
Our house is located in Oporto's Downtown. It is a beautiful house with over a century and a half of history. Now with new double glass windows with thermal and acoustic protection, combining the antique and traditional architecture with the comfort of today!

- WITH LOTS OF SPACE AND ALL COMODITIES
The house has 2 bedrooms - 1 bedroom for 4 persons and 1 double room ensuite. It has 3 bathrooms, and our kitchen and dining room have a nice view to the garden.
All the house has Wi-Fi coverage.

- THE GARDEN IS THE PLACE TO BE
The house has a nice garden with table and chairs, flowers and a small vegetable garden where you can start the day with a breakfast
neighborhood_overview:

Ribeira is just 20 minutes away by walk.
Nearby there are 2 supermarkets and 2 shopping malls.

name: Near the City Park and the sea
description:
A bedroom for 2 with private bathroom and breakfast included is what you will get in one of the best places to live in Porto.

The space
A bedroom for 2 with private bathroom and breakfast included is what you will get in one of the best places to live in Porto. It's a

. 2 minute walk from buses to the centre (about 30 minutes to get downtown) or to catch a cheap taxi.
. 10 minute walk from the lovely City Park.
. 20 minute walk from the sea and the numerous relaxing fashionable terraces on the beach, after wandering down the City Park.
. 15 minute walk from Serralves Museum and its gardens.
. 30 minute walk from Casa da Música
. 10 minute walk from one of the stops of the sightseeing-tour buses.
. 120 minute walk from the historic centre-Ribeira ( down the City Park to the sea and then along the bank of the river Douro ).
If you enjoy cycling I have 2 bicycles and helmets available to rent.

Not many touris
host_about:
Reformada recentemente, decidi tentar concretizar esta forma de alojamento de que fui sempre fã, especialmente nas minhas viagens pelo Reino Unido. De facto, disponibilizar Bed and Breakfast parece-me uma forma muito interessante de rentabilizar algum espaço que nos sobre dentro de casa e ao mesmo tempo, fazer sentir "em casa" estrangeiros à procura de conhecer o meu País, especialmente a minha cidade e ainda manter contacto com culturas diversas. 
Fui professora de Inglês e agora gozo o prazer do tempo livre, lendo, viajando e usufruindo da companhia dos amigos.

description:
Our welcoming home is a renovated house and has all the conveniences you’ll need, including WiFi and cable and smart TV.
It’s located in a super-quiet Typical place with no through-traffic. It’s like being in a village but in the heart of Porto.

The space
This nice house in the center of Porto has easy access to restaurants, bars, shops and wine cellars of Porto.
The apartment was renovated in 2012 and comprises: one bedroom with double bed (160x200) with window;
a living room / dining room with a sofa bed (140x190) with capacity for two people with a window;
A room with a bunk for two people;
table with 6 chairs, a kitchenette with oven, microwave, fridge freezer, coffee machine, a bathroom, cable TV, video player, and wireless internet - everything needed for a comfortable stay.

Linens, sheets and towels are included.

Facilities tastefully decorated and equipped to accommodate up to 6 people.

Ideal fo
neighborhood_overview:
RIGHT IN THE HEART OF BAIXA - PORTO'S DOWNTOWN
The house is located in Cedofeita, very near to Avenida dos Aliados, the bustling Mercado do Bolhão, and Rua de Santa Catarina - a pedestrianised shopping street, where you’ll find the wonderful and not-to-be-missed Café Majestic.
You are in the heart of bohemian Cedofeita, where you will discover trendy cafes & bars, shops and the famous and very trendy and vibrant Rua Miguel Bombarda – where you can experience Porto's exciting and refreshing contemporary art scene first hand, and gain an insight into why Porto is classed as Portugal's capital of art;
Serralves Park & Cultural Institution is also worth a detour for those with a taste for contemporary art. At the end of Rua Miguel Bombarda you’ll find the stunning Palacio de Cristal (Crystal Palace), where you can take a walk through the beautiful Romantic gardens (top10 in Europe), marvel at the stunning views, and perhaps catch an open-air concert. Casa da Música, the f
host_about:
Hi, I'm Rui 40 years old and me and Joana are from Porto.
We love socialising with friends and meeting new people
Joana and Me are polite and friendly. We also understand what it's like to have visitors staying in our Touristic house, so we know how to behave when we're the guests! 
We are passionate about the world, We love traveling, experiencing other cultures and walk everywhere. I also volunteer at the Portuguese Institute of Oncology in the host service to the patient, very rewarding for me. 
Work in a textile company but got this House and Guests it´s really a pleasure.
We love to learn about new things, people and cultures. 
One of our favourite meals is a Northern Portuguese dish called Francesinha. It's a heart attack on a plate, but it's delicious! Best come to Porto and experience it for yourself.  
I hope to please all my guests so that they feel good with every comfort.

Welcome to downtown|84!


[about: the location]

Situated in Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in the heart of the Historic Centre that was classified World Heritage by Unesco in 1996, this picturesque building from the 1930’s was originally a single family house and more recently transformed into apartments.

The space

We are ensuring compliance with all basic precautions for prevention and infection control in relation to the outbreak of the new coronavirus COVID-19.
Stay safe by choosing 'Clean & Safe'!


[about: the apartment]

Comfortable and spacious, this 150m² fourth-floor duplex apartment easily accommodates 8 adults. It is comprised of:
- three double bedrooms
- one twin bedroom
- dining / living room
