neighborhood_overview:
[about: the neighbourhood]

The apartment's superb location allows walking distance to the most visited hotspots and points of interest of the city; the Ribeira riverfront, the famous Port Wine Cellars just across the beautiful D. Luís bridge, Palácio da Bolsa Stock Exchange, Ferreira Borges Market, S. Francisco Church, Sé do Porto Cathedral, S. Bento Railway Station, restaurants, bars, cafes... you name it!

Have a look at our Location Map in the photos section!
host_about:
We're Joana and Francisco and oportodowntown is the project we started based on our passion for our home city and for travelling. Having lived outside of Portugal for some time, in São Paulo (Brazil) and London (UK) respectively, we believe Porto is a fantastic city that is worth getting to know!

We are intent on providing our guests with the best experience possible, hoping to take an active part in the success of their stay!

description:
Small and cozy Loft in the heart of Porto. Faced to Clérigos street where you find an icon of the city: the Clérigos Tower and Church.

The space
Recently renovated and the location couldn't be better.

This loft is located right at the city centre in an historic and classified building by UNESCO. It is located very near the famous Clérigos Tower and it is just above the most interesting places in the centre of the city. From here, you can go to the most interesting places by foot. If you want to meet the historic centre you will never need a car.

The apartment is located at the 2nd floor of the building (no lift) and the entrance door of the building is the -1 floor.

All linen and towels are included in the apartment.

Electric heating available and a dryer for towels in the bathroom.

Bed configuration:
- 2 individual beds (not a sofá-bed, It's a divâ bed with 2 x 90*190cm).

Room with kitchenet
neighborhood_overview: The people of Porto have a natural way to approach to others without any shyness. They simply just love to meet new people and have a way to do it absolutely natural, so do not be afraid of them, be kind and… be welcome!
host_about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

name: House w/pool Near the Beach-Espinho
description:
Studio fully equipped w/ swimming pool at1km from Espinho Beach and 15 from the historic center of Oporto . Breakfast, daily cleaning and laundry is free. This house Encourages relaxation, tranquility and privacy indispensable in the holiday mood!

The space
Ideal for a family holiday in the north of Portugal - this home offers guests the opportunity to enjoy the best that this region can offer .
Just two kilometers from the renowned beach of Espinho and 15 minutes by car or train from the historic centers of cities of Porto and Gaia offers its guests the pleasure of the discovery of two cities UNESCO world heritage site and the tranquility of the beaches and coastline northerner .

Protection:

neighborhood_overview:
The Mouzinho 134 buiding is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center.

Due to its excellent location it has great accessibility, so you won’t have difficulty strolling around the city.

Just a 5 minute walk away, you can find São Bento’s train station, a taxi square and the subway station (São Bento – yellow line).

At the same distance you can find Oporto’s Downtown, the most vibrant place in the city.

There you can find countless shops that offer anything from traditional commerce to international brands and several art galleries exhibiting the works of some of the best Portuguese artists.

In Rua das Flores and Rua Trindade Coelho you can also find many jewelry shops.

There is a wide range of places to grab a snack in the middle of the day. We recommend Ateneia, Leitaria da Quinta do Paço and Majestic.

If you’re looking for nightlife, Galerias de Paris Street is
host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

description:
The space
Quietly located just a 10-minute walk away from Casa da Música Concert Hall, this stylish apartment features 2 spacious balconies. Free Wi-Fi, parking and laundry facilities are available.

This modern apartment features four large bedrooms, each with a comfortable double bed. The master bedroom boasts its own private balcony with views of the surrounding area. Relaxation can be found in the living area, which is softly furnished and contains a flat-screen TV. The kitchen is fully fitted, and there are 2 bathrooms.

Guests can enjoy views of the surrounding area from any one of the 3 balconies. A number of cafes and restaurants can be found in the nearby area, and the famous Casa da Música Concert Hall is a mere 10-minute walk away.

Casa da Música Metro Station is just a 5-minute walk away, and the nearest bus stop is just 10 metres away.

neighborhood_overview:
The Mouzinho 134 buiding is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center.

Due to its excellent location it has great accessibility, so you won’t have difficulty strolling around the city.

Just a 5 minute walk away, you can find São Bento’s train station, a taxi square and the subway station (São Bento – yellow line).

At the same distance you can find Oporto’s Downtown, the most vibrant place in the city.

There you can find countless shops that offer anything from traditional commerce to international brands and several art galleries exhibiting the works of some of the best Portuguese artists.

In Rua das Flores and Rua Trindade Coelho you can also find many jewelry shops.

There is a wide range of places to grab a snack in the middle of the day. We recommend Ateneia, Leitaria da Quinta do Paço and Majestic.

If you’re looking for nightlife, Galerias de Paris Street i
host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

name: CHARMING ATTIC ROOM & WC + GARDEN
description:
An attic almost like an apartment:big room, bathroom, and no one else in that floor
Access to garden & kitchen (just for breakfast, not for cooking), and very nice bakery around the corner.
Walk downtown, metro&bus everywhere (including airport&ocean)
Romantic, perfect for 1 couple!

The space
This attic on the 3rd floor of our house is almost an apartment for guests: a big room (15 m2), a bathroom, and an extra room (15m2) if you need it.
In case you are more than 2, the extra room is available to comfortably accommodate everyone.
Towels and linen are included.

Guest access
The house has 3 floors, and the room is on the top floor.
There is a garden behind, a hidden secret perfect for an early morning tai-chi or a cold beer before dinner
The hosts can use the kitchen (fridge and microwave) for breakfast (not for cooking, sorry).
Wi-Fi included.

Bakery and grocery shops just around the corner (100 metres), open everyday 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Casa da Música concert hall, with performances 4 or 5 days a week.
host_about:
I am Pedro, an entrepreneur and activist; I'm also a Porto lover, born and living here most of my life. I live with my 2 little daughters, who sleep at home 3 nights a week.
I wish to offer a nice place to stay for people that want to discover the city and its nice surroundings; and I look forward to doing the same all around the world!
I like gardening, barbecues with friends, swimming in the ocean and meeting people from all over the world.

name: Vitória - Central and Rustic Studio
description:
The space
This apartment consists of a kitchenette (equipped with fridge, microwave, 4 ring electric hob and oven, provided all kitchen utensils), living room with sofa bed, open bedroom with double bed and bunk bed, bathroom with shower. The studio is heated and the bathroom has a towels warmer. Can sleep 4 people. We have cots available.
Lovely place, where we can open the window and feel the essence of Porto. Full of details that recall the history of the city. Ideal for a holiday in the center of Porto.
It is situated in the heart of the city, in the historic area, named World Heritage by UNESCO.
Is close to the main city attractions. A 5 minute walk from the Ribeira, the Clerics Tower and Avenue of the Aliados. In próximidades the accommodation can also find restaurants, bars and a shopping area.
Close links with buses, metro and trains.

License number
4910/AL
host_about:
Olá eu sou o Marco, um italiano a viver no Porto à alguns anos... apaixonei-me por esta cidade!!! A minha mulher Carla, nasceu e cresceu no Porto e conhece-a melhor do que ninguém.
 Conhecemo-nos a viajar, temos dois filhos e a paixão pelas viagens continua, adoramos viajar a 4 de mochila às costas pelo mundo...
Gostamos muito também de receber os nossos hóspedes nos nossos apartamentos, dar-lhes boas informações e  dividir experiências!!!

Due to the pandemic situation, Mouzinho 134 has implemented an internal protocol for the safety of everyone: you and your family, but also the health and safety of our staff and their families, as well as of other guests.

The internal protocol has measures for protection, cleaning, disinfection and sterilization and what to do in case of a suspected case.

Protection:

1 - All staff works always with the necessary protection equipment.

2- Masks are mandatory in all common areas of the building (if you don’t have one, we’ll be happy to provide at the cost of 1€/mask). Also, in many places of Portugal the use of masks indoors is also mandatory,

3- Hand sanitizers are available on all the buildings entrance. Please use them every t
neighborhood_overview:
The Mouzinho 134 building is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center.

Due to its excellent location it has great accessibility, so you won’t have difficulty strolling around the city.

Just a 5 minute walk away, you can find São Bento’s train station, a taxi square and the subway station (São Bento – yellow line).

At the same distance you can find Oporto’s Downtown, the most vibrant place in the city.

There you can find countless shops that offer anything from traditional commerce to international brands and several art galleries exhibiting the works of some of the best Portuguese artists.

In Rua das Flores and Rua Trindade Coelho you can also find many jewelry shops.

There is a wide range of places to grab a snack in the middle of the day. We recommend Ateneia, Leitaria da Quinta do Paço and Majestic.

If you’re looking for nightlife, Galerias de Paris Street i
host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

neighborhood_overview: Our location is central, perfect spot to start discovering the city, visiting the main historical monuments on foot, surrounded by numerous restaurants and nightlife area is just around the corner. The Douro River is within 5-10 mins walking distance and the famous Port Wine Cellars are just across the D. Luis I bridge.
host_about:
O edifício do Porto Wine Hostel está definido pela arquitetura clássica portuguesa. A decoração tem como base o famoso vinho do Porto. Os quartos são coloridos, nomeados e decorados de acordo com diferentes tipos de vinho do Porto.
O Porto Wine Hostel está situado no centro histórico, com uma vista deslumbrante para o Jardim da Cordoaria e a Torre dos Clérigos. A nossa localização é central, sendo um local perfeito para começar a descobrir a cidade, visitando os principais monumentos históricos a pé. O rio Douro está dentro de 5-10 minutos a pé e as famosas Caves de Vinho do Porto encontram-se do outro lado da ponte D. Luís I. Está rodeado de numerosos restaurantes, cafés e bares, e a vida noturna está mesmo ao virar da esquina. 
À volta do Hostel existem diversas paragens de autocarro e metro que o levam até diferentes partes da cidade (Casa da Música, Jardim Botânico, Museu de Serralves, o Parque da cidade, às praias e ao Oceano Atlantico, Matosinhos). Os autocarros nº 601 e 602 permitem uma ligação direta desde o aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro até ao centro da cidade, com uma duração de cerca de 50min. A estação de comboio e de metro São Bento estão a uma distância de 5min a pé. Aí pode ir de comboio até Braga, Guimarães, Aveiro, Coimbra e muitas outras cidades que valem a pena visitar. O metro também tem uma linha até ao aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro.
É a localização perfeita para explorar a cidade e ter umas ótimas férias.

Hostel: 10 quartos

name: GuestReady - ASTERN/ INNVICT
description:
Located in the heart of Porto and facing the Douro River, this is the best lodging for families/friends who wish to explore Porto!

The space
Welcome to my home!

Set in a refurbished 19th-century building and tastefully furnished with modern decors, this charming home is close to many of Porto's top attractions!

Fitted with a sofabed, a comfy double bed and a TV, unwind in the living room after a busy day of exploring Porto. There's also a work desk available and a drawer for all your belongings! The flat also comes with multiple windows throughout the space, allowing you to enjoy the sunlight and city views from the comfort of your home!

Upon arrival, complimentary hotel-quality linens will be provided to ensure you'll have a pleasant sleep.

The bathroom has all the amenities you'll need to freshen up including a shower, a toilet, and a sink. Fresh towels and free toiletries will also be supplied for your convenience. <
neighborhood_overview:
Once a former home to Jewish and Armenian communities, its colorful old houses, cobbled streets, and location near the river will charm anyone who visits Miragaia. This area is also known for being particularly lively during São João, the traditional street party that takes place in Porto in June.

Moreover, Miragaia is where you can eat sardines and drink the best of Portuguese wine as you watch the sunset over the river. Don’t forget to take a walk alongside the Douro. You will not miss the Ponte Luís I, a spectacular metal arch bridge that spans the river between Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia.

You will see that the Bolsa Palace dominates the Infante D. Henrique Square. Visit the famous Arab room inspired by the Alhambra of Grenada in Spain. Igreja de San Francisco is must visit if you want to be refresh!

After, you can either hop on the Funicular dos Guindais or stroll along Bandeirinha da Saúde (Miradouro) to get a better view of the Douro river.
host_about:
Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, clean and prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.
We're looking forward to meeting you and are always ready to answer any of your questions!

Warm regards,
GuestReady Team

name: Cozy studio w/free parking - Oporto
description:
The space
This is a space where comfort and welfare of the guests was thought to detail.
The kitchen and the room are open plan and has a full bathroom with heated towel rail.
All furniture and textiles adhere to a high standard of quality in order to achieve a modern but cozy place.

It is located in the historical center of Vila Nova de Gaia, 10 minutes walk from the city of Porto, overlooking the river, and near where it all happens ...

It offers transport a few feet away and is situated between the various port wine cellars, restaurants and bars, but without noises that might disturb your rest.

Guest access
During their stay guests have all the necessary support, and will be available all the tourist information about the city.
Free parking

Other things to note
De acordo com as leis locais, seremos obrigados a cobrar no momento do check-in / out a taxa de imposto municipal correspondente a
neighborhood_overview:
Full of objects of interest, the Historic Centre of Vila Nova de Gaia today offers a mixture of sensations that vary between the splendour of its historic monuments and the modernity of its public spaces.

There are many monuments to enjoy, including the Monastery of the Serra do Pilar, the Luiz I bridge, the Port cellars, the church of Santa Marinha and the monastery of Corpus Christi as well as many excellent and modern public spaces, such as those along the riverfront, alongside which can be seen the barcos rabelos, the embarkation point for cruises along the river, and the Cais de Gaia (Gaia Quay), a special place where restaurants, bars, shops and performance areas are clustered together, offering the visitor a panoply of entertainment and interest.
host_about: Como anfitriã, sou um pessoa atenta e disponível com os meus hóspedes, tentado para que a sua estadia seja a melhor possível.

name: FOZ DO DOURO HOUSE
description:
The space
Detached villa with sea and river situated in Vila Nova de Gaia. Really next to Oporto City and very close to many beautifull beaches with BLUE FLAG quality.
The house is really next to the mouth of Douro river, with an amazing view, and nearby of Porto wine cellars and next to the typical fishing village of Afurada.

The house has 4 floors, an attic with terrace and a basement with direct garden access.
There are 3 bedrooms ( 1 single bed suite ; 1 double bedroom ; 1 child bedroom ) 1 living room with fireplace, TV & DVD player. 1 Completely equipped kitchen.
All linen and towels are provided and with request we can provide one more single bed.
There is a 18km boardwalk with a cycle track and a pedestrian promenade along the seaside.
You can enjoy the sea and river breeze by using the cycle track or the pedestrian promenade for enjoying breathtaking view of "Ribeira", considered world heritage of humanity by UNESCO.
host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host_about: Moro e cresci no Porto e esta cidade continua a apaixonar-me. Adoro o azul eléctrico do Rio Douro ao entardecer. Adoro ver o sol a desaparecer no mar. Adoro o Estuário do Douro. Adoro a praia, passear de bicicleta ou caminhar a pé junto ao mar. Adoro a peculiar zona da Afurada. Adoro continuar a descobrir o belíssimo centro histórico do Porto.

neighborhood_overview:
The Mouzinho 134 buiding is located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center.

Due to its excellent location it has great accessibility, so you won’t have difficulty strolling around the city.

Just a 5 minute walk away, you can find São Bento’s train station, a taxi square and the subway station (São Bento – yellow line).

At the same distance you can find Oporto’s Downtown, the most vibrant place in the city.

There you can find countless shops that offer anything from traditional commerce to international brands and several art galleries exhibiting the works of some of the best Portuguese artists.

In Rua das Flores and Rua Trindade Coelho you can also find many jewelry shops.

There is a wide range of places to grab a snack in the middle of the day. We recommend Ateneia, Leitaria da Quinta do Paço and Majestic.

If you’re looking for nightlife, Galerias de Paris Street is
host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

name: 5 minute walk to River Douro?
description:
We have to offer a hous located near the port wine cellars and the river Douro.
All amenities are 5 minutes walking distance.
It is very well located for transports.
You have a train station that connects with the coastline of Gaia. Welcome!
host_about: I´m describe myself as true local from Porto. I fall in love with my city everyday and I know it very well. I have travelled and lived in  several other countries before and what I truly apreciate when I´m abroad is to know the places from a local perspective. What types of food do local people eat, what places they hang out , what is their favorite beach and so on. As a host I´m open to let you find Porto in your own way and give you some tips of the things we love to do in our town so you can have the best time possible when you are with us.

name: GuestReady- TOPMAST/ INNVICT River Views!
description:
Located in the heart of Porto and facing the Douro River, this is the best lodging for solo travelers/couples who wish to explore Porto!

The space
Welcome to my home!

Set in a refurbished 19th-century building and tastefully furnished with modern decors, this charming home is close to many of Porto's top attractions!

Fitted with a sofa, a comfy double bed and a TV, unwind in the living room after a busy day of exploring Porto. There's also a work desk available and a wardrobe for all your belongings! The flat also comes with multiple windows throughout the space, allowing you to enjoy the sunlight and city views from the comfort of your home!

Upon arrival, complimentary hotel-quality linens will be provided to ensure you'll have a pleasant sleep.

The bathroom has all the amenities you'll need to freshen up including a shower, a toilet, and a sink. Fresh towels and free toiletries will also be supplied for your convenien
neighborhood_overview:
Once a former home to Jewish and Armenian communities, its colorful old houses, cobbled streets, and location near the river will charm anyone who visits Miragaia. This area is also known for being particularly lively during São João, the traditional street party that takes place in Porto in June.

Moreover, Miragaia is where you can eat sardines and drink the best of Portuguese wine as you watch the sunset over the river. Don’t forget to take a walk alongside the Douro. You will not miss the Ponte Luís I, a spectacular metal arch bridge that spans the river between Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia.

You will see that the Bolsa Palace dominates the Infante D. Henrique Square. Visit the famous Arab room inspired by the Alhambra of Grenada in Spain. Igreja de San Francisco is must visit if you want to be refresh!

After, you can either hop on the Funicular dos Guindais or stroll along Bandeirinha da Saúde (Miradouro) to get a better view of the Douro river.
host_about:
Hi there!

We're GuestReady, a professional property management company helping hosts around the world deliver outstanding experiences to their guests.

We welcome all guests, clean and prepare our homes for your arrival and will be available 24/7, should you have any questions or requests. From the second you book with us to the moment you check-out, we’re here to make sure you have a smooth and comfortable stay!

With our years of experience in the hospitality business, you can be assured of a fantastic stay at any of GuestReady's properties. We manage multiple properties around town, so if you're looking for something specific, do let us know and we'd be happy to help you find the perfect place just for you.
We're looking forward to meeting you and are always ready to answer any of your questions!

Warm regards,
GuestReady Team

name: Bedroom twin at Casa 45 in Porto Center
description:
The space
Located in Rua do Pinheiro and recently restored, Casa 45 presents bright and ample rooms, just a short walk away from relevant cultural marks, like Praça dos Aliados, Rua Miguel Bombarda and Piolho or Clérigos and Bolhão. It’s an old area of antiquaries, booksellers, small restaurants, gourmets and pubs. Altought the bars maybe close, the street is really quiet and peaceful at night.

The house features 4 rooms with wooden floors, fully equipped with private bathrooms. The individual room on the last floor has a balcony with a nice view over the city, while the living room, has a porch over the house’s garden appropiate for breakfast service. The whole house has free wi-fi internet connection.

Casa 45 is located in the center of Porto, really close to all kinds of public transportation. 15 minutes away from S. Bento (train), and 5 minutes away from Trindade (metro station and bus stops), wich ensures a practical travel to everywhere in

name: Welcome to So Cool Hostel Porto!
description:
So Cool Hostel Porto building was built before 1890 and fully restored in 2013, and together with our staff, we have created a cozy environment, so that our guests feel at home.

The space
Welcome to So Cool Hostel Porto, feel yourself at home!
So Cool Hostel Porto building was built before 1890 and fully restored in 2013, and together with our staff, we have created a cozy environment, so that our guests feel at home. You can choose to stay in one of our comfortable dorms or in one of the double rooms.

You can listen to music, watch TV/DVD, read a book or just take a rest in the common areas. In our beautiful and spacious garden you can sunbath, chill out and enjoy one of the excellent wines from our cellar. In our kitchen we invite you to prepare your meals, and don’t miss our special Portuguese dinners.
So Cool Hostel Porto is located 5 minutes (walking) from the Rotunda da Boavista (near Casa da Música), 10 minutes (walking) from the old
host_about:
Olá, nós somos um recém criado Hostel, instalado num belo edifício do século XIX, com um espaçoso e belo jardim, e queremos que se sinta em sua casa, se divirta e relaxe numa ambiente cool e descontraído.
Estamos muito bem localizados, na zona da Boavista, muito perto da estação de metro do Carolina Michaelis.

name: RIVERFRONT APARTMENT IN CENTER OF PORTO
description:
Newly refurbished apartment providing wifi, tv cable, cozy, modern & relaxed atmosphere. Guaranteed to be an unforgettable travelling experience providing a unique riverfront view of the Rabelo boats navigating the river Douro and Port Wine Cellars.

The space
The Rabelo boat is a traditional Portuguese boat, which for centuries held the job of transporting people and goods along the river Douro. It is native of the Douro region, it exists nowhere else in the world. Its history is closely linked to the production and trade of Port Wine. Although no longer in use, we can still admire these graceful vessels belonging to Port Wine Companies on the banks of the River Douro, in the cities of Porto and Gaia.

The apartment is at the heart of the historic center of Porto between the monumental Customs Congress Center and the Ribeira area that is declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Rabelo apartment is a 2º floor, one bedroom apartment newly refurbished pr
neighborhood_overview:
Miragaia is a colourful neighbourhood built near the Douro River. This medieval neighbourhood was built on the beach during the Discoveries Era. Nowadays the colourful quirky houses built over arches give the neighbourhood its personality. Miragaia is the place to be to truly experience the city, filled with both locals and tourists.
As the sun goes down, Miragaia’s restaurants and bars open. Here you can quietly have dinner or enjoy a drink with some friends while enjoying the beautiful views of the river and of the rest of the city

Surrounded by cafes and shops that make this area one of the main tourist areas of the city, everything is accessible within a short walk to the main tourist attractions of the city located within a 15 minute walk, the Church of San Francisco, São Bento Station, Avenue of the Allies, Porto Cathedral, etc..,
Animation during the day and night gives the Ribeira and the surrounding areas a unique touch of history, tradition, excitement an
host_about:
Enjoy cooking, music, cinema, travelling, sightseeing and discovering new places to visit and eat. 
I consider myself an organized and punctual person, I enjoy meeting people from different life experiences and cultures.This multidisciplinary and versatility makes it easy to meet new friends and host people from around the world allowing them and to discover the charming and beautifuly city of Porto.

I will be pleased to welcome you in Porto, where all will be done for you to feel at home, and at the same time provide you with the best possible insights about the city, recommending places to visit, see and eat ! 
Take the bus or typical tram and follow the douro river all the way to the  atlantic ocean and sit in one of the many beach cafes and observe the unforgetable sunset along the horizon.
Visit the cathedrals, churches, museums, Port wine caves, adventure on the touristic bus tours around Porto and the peripheral towns close by, visit traditional Portuguese handcraft products and discover the hidden spots strolling the old historic streets.... making you experience in Porto a memorable everlasting one!

description:
Immersed in historic central Porto, in the very central "Largo de São Domingos" at the end of "Rua das Flores", this apartment dating from the XIX century, is completely refurbished and adapted to current needs. Taking as its theme the wine, its contemporary décor and functional makes this apartment the perfect accommodation for your holidays.

*COVID VACCINATION CERTIFICATE REQUIRED*

The space
With a fantastic view and sun exposure, this bright and airy apartment has a bedroom with a double bed, a living room with a sofa bed and and a fully equipped kitchen. It also has a fantastic balcony facing the pedestrian square where you can enjoy and absorb the whole life of the city.
Soundproof windows.
Free Wifi is available.
Towels and bed linen are provided for your stay.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire apartment and all its amenities, including all furnishings and utensils.

neighborhood_overview: Located right in the heart of the Ribeira district, in "Largo de São Domingos" at the end of "Rua das Flores", gives guests the chance to experience and enjoy the most authentic and characteristic aspects of Porto. This central neighborhood, now extremely fashionable, is very well connected via public transport, which means that getting to any part of the city is really easy. On top of this, the apartment is just 2 minutes walking distance from Ferreira Borges Market, Palácio da Bolsa, Cathedral, Clérigos, Douro river, and walking across D. Luís Bridge you can visit the Wine Cellars of Porto. Eating and drinking is not a problem, because they are countless restaurants, wine bars, traditional grocery stores, where you surely fall in love for the food and wine of the Douro Valley.

The flat it's just in front of a blue flag beach. There´s a great safe long 15 Km bicycle track along coast line and Douro River. There´s a wood path in the sand along the shore perfect for romantic walks and jogging.

6452/AL

The space
The studio has 45 square meters and a terrace with a view over the Douro River and the city. It's a 3rd floor, NO elevator.
Ideal for 2, but accommodates up to 4 people!

FULLY EQUIPPED APARTMENT
• king Size Bed (160 cm x 200 cm)
• double Sofa Bed (140 cm x 190 cm)
• 40'' LCD TV, cable TV with international channels, DVD Player (and movies as well)
• free Wi-Fi

small appliances such as coffee machine, kettle, toaster, sandwich maker, electric squeezer, handheld blender.

neighborhood_overview:
LOCATED IN PORTO HISTORIC CENTRE
Located in Porto historic center, in an area classified as UNESCO World Heritage in 1996.

From here you can walk to the most important touristic spots!
Good restaurants and bars are just around the corner as well! :)
host_about:
Hey!
My name is Raul and I live in Porto.
I like to walk outdoors, have a beer with my friends and I love "Francesinhas" (you will know what this is when in town).

I love to travel and I am fortunate to do most trips with my longtime girlfriend/wife. Together, we have been to more than 25 countries and are always looking for the next destination. 
We have 2 children (a girl born in 2016 and a boy born in 2020), so now we have more stuff to carry on trips. :)

I will be very happy to be your host in Porto!

name: Ribeira Cinema Apartments - 2 Bedrooms Apartment
description:
Superior 2 Bedroom Apartment 4 Pax Apartment Ensuite 2 Doublebed Rooms.
The apartment is Cinema Themed and you can stay with "Star Wars" George Lucas movies.

The space
Ribeira Cinema Apartments are the newest completely remodeled serviced apartments in Ribeira, with an astonishing first row river view. Located on the beginning of the Guindais Stairways, one of the most picturesque areas on the historical center that stays along the XIV century city wall, facing Ribeira, the Douro River, D. Luis bridge, the Port Wine Cellars and “Serra do Pilar” Monastery.
The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and have all the commodities needed for a memorable stay.
The Apartments are an extend of Rivoli Cinema Hostel and you can also use the Hostel facilities and services, as the 24h presence reception, walking tours, BBQ, terrace… and living its unique atmosphere!

The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and you can choose T
host_about:
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is the first Cinema themed Hostel in Portugal, and here you can find 13 rooms each one about a different film.You can choose a room by a Director or by a Film, and the interior of the room is decorated with things about the film. You can find movies from Tim Burton, Tarantino, Ridley Scott, Almodovar, Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Godard, Manoel de Oliveira, David Fincher, Alejandro González Iñárritu, Michael Radford, Mira Nair, Steven Spielberg, Stanley Kubrick, Jonathan Demme, Ang Lee.

The Rivoli Cinema Hostel has 12 rooms available (twin or double beds and 4 beds room), 6 shared toilets and 6 shared showers, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 lounge area where you can relax, have a drink, read books and play games, and an outside 180 m2 space where you can listen to music, barbecue, sunbath, party, or just chat with the others guests.

In the Hostel you can use free WiFi internet, and you have free maps, tourist info and guides.
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is located in the Porto historical center, right at the most important city square:  Avenida dos Aliados- where you can find streets full of monuments, restaurants, cafes, esplanades, shops, supermarkets, shoppings, tourism info spots . RCH is right in center of the cultural center of Porto near Coliseu, Cinemas, Theaters, and Art Galleries.

At the doorstep you can find metro, bus, sightseeing bus, train, taxis and tram.From here you can easily visit the most important references in the city like the Port Wine Cellars, Clerigos Tower, Serralves Museum and its beautiful gardens, go to a concert in Casa da Musica, take a walk across the bridges, take a look at a local architecture, visit the F. C. Porto stadium, travel by boat in Douro river where you can take great pictures and have a drink in one of the many bars in Ribeira.

Nightlife is around the hostel, you just have to choose between cafes, nightclubs, discos or bars where you can meet Erasmus students and locals. Right across the street you have the Rivoli Theater where you can see musicals and at February you can attend one of the best Fantastic Cinema Festival in the world – Fantasporto.

name: Garden House Downtown with Garage
description:
This is the perfect home for those who like to relax at the end of the day, after exploring the city, drinking a Porto wine in the beautiful and exotic tropical garden!
The whole house opens on glass over the garden and the two small fish ponds, which is very pleasant even at night, as the garden is lit and heated on cold nights!
The house only has 40 m2 inside, but it is very well equipped and very comfortable.

The space

Located in the interestig neighborhood of Fine Arts School, with a very characteristic ambience that offers traditional and alternative shops, and traditional Portuguese cuisine.
Supermarket, pharmacy, bank and ATM within 100 mts.
At 5-minute walk from S. Lázaro Garden, the oldest city garden, with terraces and restaurants, from Café Magestic in St. Catarina Street, and from the amazing Bolhão market.

The neighbourhood of Bonfim, Porto, is the fourth coolest neighbourhood in Europe, according to The Guardian in an article published on Feb 8, 2020, entitled "10 of the coolest neighbourhoods in Europe”.

“With city-centre rents skyrocketing, this once-bourgeois enclave is fast finding favour with a young, creative crowd.” (…) “handy for primary exit routes: Porto’s main bus terminal and train station are on the doorstep and there’s a metro line to the airport.”

name: Pretty flat with terrace, free parking, host 6
description:
You will feel very welcome in our apartment because we love to host and we prepare for this carefully. Our concern is that at the end of the stay, feel it really worth the money spent for the comfort you've got.

The space
The apartment is located at the last floor of a building with elevator and has the privilege of a beautiful terrace to enjoy the Portuguese sun. Here, even in winter, we have many sunny days.
The large bedroom has two double beds, with new mattress, linen and coverlets, so 4 people could comfortably sleep here. In the living room there is a sofa-bed for two.
For the kids, there are also some toys and books.
To entertain the parents, we have Internet wi-fi, cable TV and kitchen with all the equipments necessary to cook a delicious meal.
All the rooms have electric heaters.

Other things to note
Additional windows frames for thermic isolation installed in november 2014, done!
New watter pipes install
neighborhood_overview: At 5 minutes walking we have Porto d’Artes, a place where you could try the African dance – Kizomba, the Brazilian art of fighting and dancing Capoeira, Portuguese class for handcraft, art therapy and other activity, not meant for tourists, but where you could integrate with the locals. The Portuguese are known as really good hosts.
host_about: I am a happy mother of two wonderful boys and this is my small business that I love and I want to make it grow. You will be very wellcome at my home!

name: Dream View In Trendy Pvt Condo Penthouse Apt
description:
Open space apartment with breathtaking sea view of Foz, one of the most hi-level areas of the city. The word "Foz" means river mouth. You are only 10m walk where the Douro river meets the Atlantic ocean with beautiful beaches with vibrant bars or you can take the old tram that goes along the river to the heart of the city. Bus stop to city centre just 100m away.

The space
The apartment is for 4 persons. It has a garden for private condo use with a playground for children. Kitchen with dish washer, washing machine, micro waves, fridge and freezer.
Cosy, trendy apartment where you can really relax and feel at home in a quiet neighborhood. You can either enjoy the beautiful balcony, walk down to the beach (10m away) or explore downtown Porto with vibrant bars, restaurants, concerts, performances, etc..

Guest access
Supermarket, bars, restaurants only 15 minutes walk. If you come with your car, there is a free parking place in private con
host_about:
I like to open the door of our house and offer travellers the sense of being at home, although in a new city. 
I love Porto's authenticity and capcity to transform itself. 
Love to connect with people and discover different ways of living.

name: Ribeira Cinema Apartments _ 1 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Superior 1 Bedroom Apartment 4 Bed Apartment Ensuite 1 Doublebed + 2pax Sofabed
The apartment is Cinema Themed and you can stay with "Kill Bill" Quentin Tarantino movies.

The space
Ribeira Cinema Apartments are the newest completely remodeled serviced apartments in Ribeira, with an astonishing first row river view. Located on the beginning of the Guindais Stairways, one of the most picturesque areas on the historical center that stays along the XIV century city wall, facing Ribeira, the Douro River, D. Luis bridge, the Port Wine Cellars and “Serra do Pilar” Monastery.
The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and have all the commodities needed for a memorable stay.
The Apartments are an extend of Rivoli Cinema Hostel and you can also use the Hostel facilities and services, as the 24h presence reception, walking tours, BBQ, terrace… and living its unique atmosphere!

The apartments are decorated with the Cinema theme and you
neighborhood_overview: Located right on the river first row facing D. Luis I bridge, in the most pictoresque nieghborhood, you will be in the heart of historical Porto area of Ribeira.
host_about:
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is the first Cinema themed Hostel in Portugal, and here you can find 13 rooms each one about a different film.You can choose a room by a Director or by a Film, and the interior of the room is decorated with things about the film. You can find movies from Tim Burton, Tarantino, Ridley Scott, Almodovar, Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Godard, Manoel de Oliveira, David Fincher, Alejandro González Iñárritu, Michael Radford, Mira Nair, Steven Spielberg, Stanley Kubrick, Jonathan Demme, Ang Lee.

The Rivoli Cinema Hostel has 12 rooms available (twin or double beds and 4 beds room), 6 shared toilets and 6 shared showers, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 lounge area where you can relax, have a drink, read books and play games, and an outside 180 m2 space where you can listen to music, barbecue, sunbath, party, or just chat with the others guests.

In the Hostel you can use free WiFi internet, and you have free maps, tourist info and guides.
Rivoli Cinema Hostel is located in the Porto historical center, right at the most important city square:  Avenida dos Aliados- where you can find streets full of monuments, restaurants, cafes, esplanades, shops, supermarkets, shoppings, tourism info spots . RCH is right in center of the cultural center of Porto near Coliseu, Cinemas, Theaters, and Art Galleries.

At the doorstep you can find metro, bus, sightseeing bus, train, taxis and tram.From here you can easily visit the most important references in the city like the Port Wine Cellars, Clerigos Tower, Serralves Museum and its beautiful gardens, go to a concert in Casa da Musica, take a walk across the bridges, take a look at a local architecture, visit the F. C. Porto stadium, travel by boat in Douro river where you can take great pictures and have a drink in one of the many bars in Ribeira.

Nightlife is around the hostel, you just have to choose between cafes, nightclubs, discos or bars where you can meet Erasmus students and locals. Right across the street you have the Rivoli Theater where you can see musicals and at February you can attend one of the best Fantastic Cinema Festival in the world – Fantasporto.

name: Spot Apartments - Trindade 2
description:
Cosy apartment in the city center. 3 min waling distance to the main metro station Trindade, 5 min away from the main square Aliados.

The space
The Spot Apartments were recently renewed to your Comfort. The building is located in the city center and is equipped with an elevator. Metro and bus stops are at 3 minutes walking distance from the apartment.

The apartments are 85 m2 (915 ft2), and offer two bedrooms, a living and dining room, an equipped kitchen and one bathroom. One of the rooms has a double bed and the other two singles. There’s also a sofa/bed for two in the living room, allowing six people to sleep comfortably.

The apartments also have cable tv and free wifi internet. If you’re driving you can park your car on the street (free during the night - 20h to 8h), or use a paid parking service located close by.

Your apartment will be the perfect starting point to discover the city on foot, as the main Square and city’s attr

name: Studio at Alfandega Apartments
description:
Os Alfandega Apartments estão situados num edifício restaurado do século XVI, em Miragaia, um centro histórico do Porto. Estas acomodações ribeirinhas dispõem de um elevador e de acesso Wi-Fi gratuito.

Cada apartamento proporciona modernas acomodações luminosas e espaçosas com uma área de estar/refeições em plano aberto e uma televisão de ecrã plano com canais por satélite. A casa de banho privativa inclui produtos de higiene pessoal gratuitos.

A kitchenette equipada permite aos hóspedes preparar refeições. O famoso Vinho do Porto, do Porto, e a gastronomia tradicional podem ser apreciados em vários restaurantes e bares próximos dos Alfândega Apartments, na famosa área da Ribeira localizada a 5 minutos a pé.

A área de Alfândega fica a 5 a 15 minutos a pé da Igreja e Torre dos Clérigos, da Estação Ferroviária de São Bento, da Catedral do Porto, do Palácio da Bolsa, do Museu do Vinho do Porto e da Ponte D. Luís.

Mesmo em frente aos Alfandega Ap

Feel Porto was created with the goal of opening the doors of Porto to the world by offering the opportunity to welcome our travelers in the best accommodation apartments complemented with service excellency.

Headquartered downtown Porto it counts with a lot of properties not only in Porto but also in Matosinhos and Vila Nova de Gaia, so we can connect the city experience with the beach lifestyle. 

In order to add major value to our guests stay, we count with our partners to provide remarkable and customized Services and Experiences.

Porto is a city with character and that’s what Feel Porto wants to pass on!

name: Duplex with Terrace | Ace Location - Clean & Safe
description:
The flat is in the heart of Porto's city centre (Unesco World Heritage). Carefully refurbished - 2nd PRIZE WINNER of BEST URBAN RENOVATION of 2014 by the Portuguese government. It is located on a quiet street close to all major places of interest .

We are following all the public health guidelines to ensure the apartment is properly sanitized for your arrival. All the necessary precautions have been taken in order to guarantee a clean & safe stay.

The space
BEDROOM 1
spacious double bed (200x140cm), built-in desk, chest of drawers and clothes hanger. two special details distinguishes this bedroom, one of the walls has a built-in traditional portuguese tile and another wall has an original centenary sanitation system exposed.

BEDROOM 2
spacious doublebed (200x140cm), desk and a doubledoor wardrobe. there are also two shelves so that you can save your belongings. one special detail distinguishes this bedroom, one of the walls mainta
neighborhood_overview:
The Baixa neighborhood (downtown) is the most charismatic area of the city. Here you can find a variety of places in walking distance from the house:
- Lello's bookshop: 3 min
- Cathedral: 5 min
- Clérigo's tower: 1 min
- City hall (main square): 2 min
- Lots of cafes, restaurants and shops
- Ribeira (river front): 10 min
- Port wine cellars: 15 min
- Nightlife (best bars and clubs): 5 min
- Supermarket: less than 1 min
- Laundry self-service: next door
host_about:
My name is Afonso and I'm 28 years old. I've been an Airbnb host for 2 years now and I love it!

I've lived in Porto for most of my life and every day this city continues to amaze me. In the last couple of years Porto has been growing radically, specially when it comes to tourism, and it has been a pleasure to be part of it. Fortunately, this growth didn't affect the city's truly unique charm. It only turned it more dynamic!

I'm really passionate about traveling and I've already visited more than 30 countries (and counting). But when I am not traveling what I really enjoy is welcoming people from around the world. 

I really appreciate getting feedback from all guests. This will help me continue to improve my hosting skills.

Hope you enjoy Porto. See you soon!

: )

name: Watermillhouse  Cottage in Nature Reserve
description:
Quinta do Moinho is the ideal place to finish reading that book you want, to cook a delicious meal, or just relax listening to the water stream. The big garden offers various idyllic spots, underneath a rose arch, at the river shore or at the fire-pit. Privacy guaranteed since closest neighbors live 300 meters away.
Explore the archaeological, natural and historical sites around Campo-Valongo. The city of Porto is just 12 km away. Francisco Sá Carneiro international airport is just 18 km.

The space
The property is located in Campo next Rio Ferreira, a river that flows into the Douro river. Quinta do Moinho consists of the main house (living room and kitchenette, bath and bedroom) and a garden. In addition to a king size double bed in the bedroom in the main house, there is also a fold out couch in the living room.
If you never slept listening to the sound of the river, this is your chance. The kitchen is fully equipped (coffee grinder, juicer and pans,
neighborhood_overview:
The watermill house is located at the end of a working class neighborhood, but at the beginning of a nature reserve, part of "Serras do Porto" (Porto Mountains) with hiking and running trails, and a Paleozoic Park of archaeological and historical note. Opposite to the watermill-house there is an active slate mine you can walk by. There are great mountain and river views, all around you.
You will love "Quinta do Moinho" because of the views, the location, the outdoors space, and the ambiance. It is suitable for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).
host_about:
Greetings,
Ten years ago when I found "Quinta do Moinho" I was the happiest person on earth. In the past years I have tried, (with some help from my friends), to turn it into a comfortable, cozy and relaxing place. In the garden and surroundings one can hear the birds and the water stream, (and life is slow again). 
I am happy to share this place with you.

Olá eu sou o Marco, um italiano a viver no Porto à alguns anos... apaixonei-me por esta cidade!!! A minha mulher Carla, nasceu e cresceu no Porto e conhece-a melhor do que ninguém.

name: GuestReady- Ayres Studio with Balcony and Garden
description:
Set in peaceful Miragaia and close to the stunning Duoro River, this is the ideal home for families/friends who wish to explore Porto!

The space
Welcome to my home!

Bright and tastefully furnished with modern decors, this lovely home is close to many of Porto's top attractions!

This studio uses an open floor concept that connects the living and dining area, and the bedroom. Fitted with a sofa bed and TV, relax in the living room after a day of exploring Porto. If you fancy dining in, there a dining area complete with a dining table and 4 chairs where you can grab your meals. There's also a balcony where you can grab some fresh air!

The attached bedroom consists of a double bed and a drawer for all your belongings. Upon arrival, complimentary hotel-quality linens will be provided.

The kitchen is fully equipped with all the cookware and cutleries you'll need to cook a delicious meal such as a stove, a fridge, and an oven
neighborhood_overview:
Once a former home to Jewish and Armenian communities, its colorful old houses, cobbled streets, and location near the river will charm anyone who visits Miragaia. This area is also known for being particularly lively during São João, the traditional street party that takes place in Porto in June.

Moreover, Miragaia is where you can eat sardines and drink the best of Portuguese wine as you watch the sunset over the river. Don’t forget to take a walk alongside the Douro. You will not miss the Ponte Luís I, a spectacular metal arch bridge that spans the river between Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia.

You’ll see that the neo-classical Palacio da Bolsa dominates the Infante D. Henrique Square. Visit the famous Arab room inspired by the Alhambra of Grenada in Spain. Igreja de San Francisco is must visit if you want to be refresh!

After, you can either hop on the Funicular dos Guindais or stroll along Bandeirinha da Saúde (Miradouro) to get a better view of the
host_about:
We manage several apartments in Oporto's Historic centre. If you are searching for the best place to rest after exploring this amazing city, we can help you with that :)

The apartments can provide you with a real native experience! They are all furnished and well equipped for a pleasant, yet alternative, stay compared to a traditional hotel room. They are all located near most of the main attractions in the city.

If you have any questions our staff can give you all the information.

Hope to see you here! :D

description:
Welcome to Ayres Gouvea House! Our lovely, recently refurbished family home from XIX century, located in a prime area, just up the street from Fountain of the Virtues and walking distance to hundreds of restaurants and bars! This elegant and bright apartment for 4 guests features a cosy living space, full kitchen and a common garden.T his home is complete with hotel quality linen, fresh towels and complimentary toiletries to make your stay all the more comfortable and enjoyable!

The space
This duplex named " Office", has a high ceiling, creative lighting, and a modern interior that keeps the studio bright, spacious and airy. Featuring a TV, Wi-fi, dining table, double bed, single bed, sofa (extends into a bed), the living space and room are perfect for 4 guests to lounge and relax after a day of exploring Porto. The modern bathroom features a shower and hairdryer for your use.
The building has a exclusive garden prepared for children's, animals and even a
neighborhood_overview:
Porto is an amazing city to explore by foot, with many attractions within walking distance. There are a row of restaurants down the street from the home, including an Italian, Portuguese and pastry store. If you prefer a home cooked meal, there are a variety of grocery stores and markets within a 10 minute walk.

There are 2 lovely parks within a 6 minute walk from the home. You will also find a museum, gallery and historic landmarks in the area.

name: Outstanding Apartment Porto Center
description:
(Attention: there are constructions sites on the building next door) Great apartment with Oporto Best Views. Although 2 minutes form the Aliados, S.Bento Station and from the night life, the house is situated in a silent small village inside Oporto. Visit us

The space
The apartment is on the top floor of a renovated building in the historic city center of Porto - UNESCO zone. The apartment is facing south to the area of Sé and Gaia. Has one of the most spectacular views over the old city of Porto and the river.

The apartment is available with the basic furniture, it has two large bedrooms both with en suite included, a kitchen, hall and a good living room with a large balcony.

The apartment is rented with all services included, cleaning, electricity, water, gas and internet access.

The building is located 100 meters from the "Clerigos Tower", 250 meters from "Galerias de Paris" and 200 meters from the Metro and Railways of St.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very calm; it seems that you are on a small village just inside the city centre.
host_about:
Hello, my name is André Amorim. My wife Luisa and I have three kids, one Manel has 8 years old, Sofia has 5 and now Francisco a little baby. In 2014 we start a project YOURS GuestHouse in Porto. name: Apartment  Douro Ribeira Porto
description:
Ideally located in the historic center of Porto, balcony facing directly the Douro River. Property in the area classified world heritage by UNESCO.
Across the Douro River, the Port Wine cellars. Numerous restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity.

The space
Apartment in the heart of Porto, in the Ribeira quay. Balcony with magnificent views over the River Douro. Recently renovated. Very near: bank, supermarket, bakery and many restaurants as well as many tourist attractions.
The apartment has 45 m2 and consists of a lounge / bedroom with balcony overlooking the Douro River, with double bed and extra bed if necessary. At the other side of the staircase it also a private bathroom with shower and another room / kitchen with balcony over Rua da Fonte Taurina, one of the oldest streets in the city of Porto. The kitchen is equipped with electric plate, refrigerator, microwave with electric oven, coffee machine, toaster etc...

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Ribeira is the ex-libris of Porto. Major tourist spot of the city, close to major tourist attractions, with the wine cellars of Porto right in front. And keeps the traditional experience of the city. Many traditional restaurants.

Born in Porto, I love my town. Many interesting things to see.

The building from the late 19th century is situated in Ribeira, declared in 1996 UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The bedroom/living room with balcony offers a direct view over the river, the bridges and the wine cellars.


FEATURES - 3 BEDROOMS - 6 PEOPLE

• Three bedrooms with double bed;

Surrounded by the genuine spirit of "portuense" people, you're most likely to see generosity, warmth and joy around you.

In less than 4 minutes walking you’ll see Ribeira's restaurants, bars and cafés, an ideal location to chill and enjoy the sunset. Here you may embark on river cruises, discover our typical narrow streets and historic sites.

neighborhood_overview:
Located in the historic center of the city, it is very close to the Subway Station (with access to all city destinations), to "Santa Catarina" street (one of the most important and old city shopping areas), restaurants and bars.
You can also visit some points of interest of our beautiful city, such as the the "Mercado do Bolhão", "Torre dos Clérigos", "São Bento" train station, "S. João" and "Rivoli" Theaters, "S. Nicolau" Church and "Cafe Majestic" one of most beautiful and representative of the city´s New Art.
Another visit not to be missed is the area of "Ribeira" where you can enjoy a beautiful view of the "Douro" River, its bridges and the beautiful "Rabelo" boats.
You can also enjoy crossing the bridge "D.Luis" and visit the famous Porto wine cellars.

name: Casais da Bandeirinha
description:
Located in the heart of the city, Casais da Bandeirinha offers a wide range of possibilities with peaceful nights rest.
From the house, it takes a walk of 15 minutes to the S. Bento train station, 2 minutes to St. António Hospital and bus stops, and 10 minutes to the riverside zone. The Palácio de Cristal and the Soares dos Reis Museum are 400 m away and you have a panoramic view over the Douro River just 200 meters from the house.
Casais da Bandeirinha is an apartment restored in 2013 in an antique building, in the 30s style, with 3 bedrooms. It has one double bedroom for a couple, a double bedroom with individual beds, and a bedroom with a bunk with two beds, with a total capacity of 6 persons. It has a living room with access to the garden, a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with access to the garden. Garden area with approximately 400m2.

The space
The apartment is bright decorated with lots of art

In pandemic times, there are no contagions here. The access to the apartment is made by straight corridors in the open air, which avoids the contagion of viruses, nobody crosses anyone, if you are careful, and the garden is divided into parts, each for a single accommodation. There are no gatherings of people.

The space
This local accommodation can provide you with an excellent touristic or comfortable stay for business in Gaia and Porto, at any time of the year. It is located next to the Port Wine Cellars. This flat is a 10-minute walk from the Gaia Pier (down Serpa Pinto Street where the Portwine cellars are), opposite Porto's harbor (Ribeira), just 500 meters away. The river Douro connects the docks with the iron bridge D. Luiz I, on foot, by car, bus and subway. Access to the
neighborhood_overview:
To access the apartment you have to climb a staircase that corresponds to the height of any first floor of a modern building. You have a railing to help you up.
At the ground floor there is a typical Portuguese tavern, called A TASQUINHA, where you can eat typical food: codfish balls, baked or cooked cod, croquettes of minced meat, french fries, meat or fish pies, and drink local wine from the region, With cheap prices. You can still take food to the apartment (Take-Away).
Can also to est here your breakfast by 4 euros.
Just below the tavern (20 meters) there is a market with essential foodstuffs daily, fresh bread and milk, beverages, seasonal fruit and hygiene products. The Train Station is 100 meters from here, called Vila Nova de Gaia (Devesas), as well as the Bus Station. description:

The house was rebuilt in 2016 on the ground floor you have the kitchen, the living room, and the toilets. The all top floor is a big room with an outstanding balcony, the perfect place to relax in harmony with the surrounding nature.

This house was the former laws, being inside of a farm with fields, forest, and a river.

Central located between Porto, Aveiro and the coastline with amazing natural beaches.

name: Brand New Sunny Apt. on the Beach
description:
Welcome to our 2 bed/2 bathrooms by the beach in the beautiful city of Vila do Conde. Ideally situated 20 min from Oporto's Airport has all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. Come and enjoy the sun in this bright and spacious apartment!

The space
Our apartment with a focus on comfort is ideally situated in a closed condominium 1 min from one of the best beaches in the North of Portugal, ideal for surfing or just sunbathing.

Enjoy the pool and have a drink on the balcony while enjoying a beautiful sunset over the Atlantic Ocean.

Whether you are looking for a weekend getaway or a summer vacation by the beach, the apartment comes equipped with everything you may need, from beach towels and a volleyball to a fully equipped kitchen. Our main focus is to ensure your stay is absolutely perfect!

If you have small children, we have available crib, bathtub and high chair for full comfort and safety.

Super fast wifi
neighborhood_overview:
Neighborhood - This is a very quiet area, perfect for relaxing and resting. Enjoy long walks by the beach, reading a book in total silence, a glass of wine overlooking the sunset, the sun and natural light!

The apartment is 5 mins by car (or metro) from the city of Vila do Conde and 20 mins by car (or metro) to Oporto city. The beach is still unspoiled by mass tourism and it's only used by locals (search online for Praia de Azurara for pictures). It's one of the best beaches for Surfing (rental equipment at the beach -contact details in the apartment). There are a few cafes, bakeries, supermarkets, restaurants and a night clube within walking distance.

Airport - Oporto airport is less than 20 mins (by car).
Golf - Estela Golf 18 holes course is 20 mins (by car). One of the best in Portugal.
Casino - Casino da Póvoa is only 10 mins away by car, great place for food and entertainment.
Kitesurfing - amazing kitesurfing area in Esposende, 20 mins (
host_about:
We're a family with a passion for traveling. We visited countries such as: USA, Canada, Mexico, Costa Rica, Brazil, Argentina, Peru, Uruguay, Portugal, Spain, France, Italy, Greece, Switzerland, England, Ireland, N. Ireland, Scotland, Belgium, Netherlands, Tunisia, Japan, Singapore, Indonesia, etc. 

We currently live in Lisbon, Portugal where we have a brand new 2 bedroom apartment at the beach in Vila do Conde. 

We love water sports, the beach, a beautiful sunny day and good food, if you are looking for tips in Portugal, feel free to ask for advice.

neighborhood_overview:
“STUDIO 52" is located at Rua da Fábrica, 120 m from Liberdade Square, in the hearth of the Porto Downtown, one of the most privileged areas of Porto.

The district has many restaurants with different types of cuisine, coffee shops, bakeries, grocery stores, supermarkets, shopping centers, banks and ATM's, libraries, beautiful gardens, art galleries, museums, theaters and trendy nightlife clubs.

The location is perfect to visit the old town, to enjoy the night life of the city, take a boat trip on the Douro River, visit the Port Wine cellars and taste the regional cuisine of Porto.

You can buy fresh fish every day in the village market and grilled it at the barbecue of the house, or if you prefer the village have restaurants near the house at very reasonable prices, you can eat there in front of the sea or bring the food to the house because the restaurants are take-away. The sea is known here as being thermal and therapeutic because of his high concentration of iodine! Near the house you have lots of attractions like hipism (horseback riding) and by car in 15 minutes you have the casino of Póvoa do Varzim. description:
Back - to - Back House é uma casa totalmente restaurada. Neste projecto de reconstrução foi usado um conceito moderno e arrojado e também alguns objectos reciclados, como se pode verificar em todo o interior da casa, na sua decoração e mobiliário.

The space
Os espaços foram transformados em ambientes com apontamentos de cor e conforto, práticos e acolhedores. Todos esses espaços representam alegria, que é isso que pretendo transmitir, que todos hóspedes se sintam muitos felizes ao passarem pelo Porto e pela minha casa.
A casa tem capacidade para 6 pessoas:
O piso superior pode receber até 4 pessoas, tem um quarto principal que possui uma cama de casal e outro quarto com duas camas de solteiro. Todos os quartos têm janela, um deles com varanda, são ambos com luz directa e com bastante privacidade. Ainda conta com um WC completo de apoio aos dois quartos.
A casas de banho além de sabonete, gel de banho tem também secador de cabelo.
No piso (e
host_about:
Apaixonada por viagens e conhecer pessoas. 
Amo a minha cidade "O Porto" onde nasci e vivo, tenho também um carinho muito especial por Praga onde vivi 6 meses como estudante Erasmus.
Já tive oportunidade de conhecer vários locais do mundo, das melhores passagens que já fiz até hoje foi a Indonésia e Brasil.
Tenho um gosto especial pelo mundo da moda e tudo o que envolve nossas tendências, bem como a área de design, marketing e decoração de interiores.
A arte de criar é algo que me fascina no meu dia a dia. A criação deste projecto foi para mim algo muito muito especial. Toda os pormenores, cores têm significado para mim e espero que em todos eles se retratem de alguma forma e sintam bem estar. 
Gosto de acolher pessoas de outras cidades, países e culturas e partilhar experiências.

In the surrounding area, there are many local restaurants serving typical portuguese and international dishes.

The space

In the second part, there is a full-equipped open-plan kitchen, where there's a sofa-bed, as well as the dining-room and a balcony with a view over the river.

name: Francos' Relaxing Apt by metro w/ private parking
description:
Very bright and relaxing apartment very close to the metro station Francos - direct to the airport (20 min) or city center (8 min)!
This 2 bedroom apartment accommodates up to 4 people comfortably and it's located in a calm area near Boavista.
Modern and conveniently located with all the comfort for a nice stay.
Free parking in the garage included, fast internet service (optical fiber) with Wifi in all areas, equipped kitchen, etc.
19579/AL

The space
Very comfortable and recent apartment suitable for max. 4 guests, with:
* One double bed in the main bedroom (1,40m x 2,00m) with large built-in wardrobe
* One single bed in the smaller bedroom (0,90m x 1,90m)
* One sofa-bed for one guest in the living room (1,18m x 2,05m)
* Fully equipped kitchen with: toaster, coffee machine, dish-washer, large fridge with freezer, stove, oven, immersion blender, kettle and microwave
* Hanger, iron and iron board
* Eating area: in
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is situated in a very calm area and despite the relaxing atmosphere inside the apartment you are very close to the modern city centre and the old historical town.
It's located in the modern area of Boavista. At a walking distance you can reach the famous Casa da Música (by Rem Koolhaas) and a nice shopping area and Mercado do Bom Sucesso or take the metro downtown.
From here you can easily reach:
* supermarket at 5 min. walking distance
* metro station (Francos) at 200 meters/2min. walking distance
* Rotunda da Boavista and Casa da Música at 10 min. walking distance
* Mercado do Bom Sucesso at 15 min. walking distance
* sea/beach at 5 km away from here (ideal for swimming, lying on the sun, esplanades, surfing, walking, ...)
* big shopping center (with famous and good brands) at 10 min. distance
If you come by car, you easily reach the apartment as we are close to the main highway's accesses (A1, A28, A29, A4, A3, etc).
host_about:
I'm Sara and I love to know about other cultures by meeting new people in my beloved city, Porto. 
I have been working in the tourism area for more than 14 years and been also a home host for over 7 years in other properties in Porto. I am happy to help you not only with the accommodation but also with suggestions and tips during your stay. 
I can speak Portuguese, English, German, French and Spanish.
My husband Hugo is my co-host and we're both very happy to welcome you in this wonderful city!

description:
A beautifully renovated, independent part of our house is waiting for you.

We are a german-portuguese family living on our farm with our two kids (4 and 8 years) and our animals. 
We like to be in inspiring exchange with our guests, but you can also be totally on your own.

Your place is completely independent with your own entrance, a kitchen, three sleeping rooms, and a bathroom.

The space
The rooms are all equipped with double beds (140x190cm). We accommodate maximum 6 people. A baby bed can be added on request.

The kitchen has a dishwasher, a double stove, toaster, kettle, fridge and all the other equipment you will need.

Don’t expect too much of the bathroom, It is basic, as in an old house, with an old bathtub, toilet and sink.

You are free to use all the outdoor space, you can make barbecues and use the old kitchen with the big indoor fireplace and the bread oven.
