name: Miragaia apt_Douro, Unesco area!
description:
Charming flat in Miragaia (Ribeira), at the heart of Oporto Unesco world heritage centre! Two steps from the river Douro, in a renovated historical building, with sunny balcony, sight seeing, near all the main spots, monuments, bridge, wine cellars! (17262/AL)

The space
The Miragaia flat is located on the first floor, in a traditional historic building, fully renovated. It has a double room, with a small living area and balcony facing the river Douro, a kitchenette full equipped, a modern bathroom. Separated by a long corridor, there is a second bedroom with two bunk beds. It is perfect for a group of friends or family with children!

Guest access
- Double bedroom (one double bed)
- Twin bedroom (bunk beds)
- Kitchen equipped with all cooking utilities (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster, kettle)
- Bathroom with shower, hair dryer and towel radiator.
- Free bed linen and towels
- Electric heating in the
neighborhood_overview:
Miragaia is one of the oldest district in town, keeping the traces of medieval Oporto, a riverside town of fisherman and trade.
Miragaia apartment, in front of the river Douro, close to the centennial Custom House (Alfândega), will place you right in the heart of Oporto, across the street to the river Douro, near the S. Luiz bridge, S. Francisco Church, Market Ferreira Borges, the Stock Exchange Palace, the Oporto wine cellars, all the relevant spots!
Just in front, the river invites you to a beautiful walk, heading east to Ribeira and the wine cellars, heading west to the Foz and the seaside, or even catching the boat to the Douro upper region.
Around the corner, you will have all the main attractions, fantastic restaurants, cafés, bars and shops!
host_about:
Hello!

I am an architect and independent curator based in Porto. I have studied and lived in Berlin, Zurich and Paris, and it is always a pleasure to welcome guests from all over the world and share with them what I know about Porto!
Hopefully, this city will be one of those places you will not forget!

The apartment is located on a busy square, it has double glazing windows but it is always possible to hear noise from the street, especially during weekend night.

Free wifi.
Portable speaker that allows listening to music from smart phone, tablet and laptop.

Ex
neighborhood_overview:
The Hungarian Biscuit is a charming and beautiful apartment located in the heart of historic Porto city. From the balcony you can admire the famous Praça dos Leões, Igreja do Carmo and Igreja das Carmelitas and you can also spot the famous Lello Bookshop on your right. The Tower of Clérigos and the Portuguese Center of Photography are on your backside.

The quartier is not only surround by monuments, but also great restaurants, shops and traditional grocery's. A few 5 minutes walking from the Arts quartier Miguel Bombarda and 2 minutes walking from the quarter Galerias de Paris full of trendy bars and the heart of Porto night spot. During weekends the quartier is full of street markets where you can find a little of every thing!
You can also take a beautiful 20 minutes walking till the riverside – Ribeira.
host_about:
We are from Porto and we love it!!
We will be glad to give you some ideas to get to know our city!!
We  love to travel and  get to know people from around the world! 
We have 2 small kids and 1 dog named Bowie, yes after David Bowie. 
We love music! 
we hope to see you soon.

name: Luxury Apartment in Cardosas
description:
We have comfort, charm and safety at the heart of the historic area of Porto, between Rua das Flores and Aliados. Torre dos Clérigos, Lello bookshop, Palácio da Bolsa, Praça da Ribeira, Douro river, Sé Cathedral and Café Majestic just 5 min walk.

The space
In our apartment we hear seagulls, we see the São Bento train station, feel the happiness of lovers on the Rua das Flores, heard the flash of cameras, it's so nice to go to the window and see the view. We have the luxury of a new house, decorated with the dedication of those who like to feel comfort and quality of life in the historic city center. When we left the door see happy people, the people of Porto are the happiest city dwellers in Europe, and we see tourists dazzled with everything the area has to offer. We love living here. When we are not here we rented our apartment for holidays.

Guest access
This apartment is well sized and comfortable for 2 people with 1 bed in the living ro
neighborhood_overview:
Due to its important role in the history of Porto, Rua das Flores has more visitors during the day than local people. It is a place not to be missed. Why not stay here for a few days instead of passing?

This apartment is carefully decorated on quality, modernity and good taste. This part of town are typical Portuguese food restaurants, traditional shops, cafes and the center of nightlife with bars and clubs, yet is in a peaceful and quiet place.

The condo Passeio das Cardosas was completely rebuilt for 1 year and had to keep the original architecture by imposition of Portugal culture department retaining its beautiful Portuguese style.
host_about:
Somos apaixonados por novos lugares, novas culturas, novos paladares e novos cheiros. Temos dedicado muito tempo a explorar o nosso país e por isso é um prazer imenso aconselhar os viajantes que chegam ao Porto com as nossas sugestões, vividas na primeira pessoa.
Temos um apartamento disponível para viajantes que queiram conhecer a cidade do  Porto.
Não somos portuenses mas adotámos o Porto como nosso. A alegria e bem-estar que nos invadia em cada estadia na Invicta fez-nos rumar a norte várias vezes por ano até que percebemos que todos os meses havia uma boa desculpa para vir ao Porto. A cidade está lá para nos receber a cada ida ao teatro, a cada visita a um monumento, a cada jantar de amigos, a cada concerto de música clássica, a cada passeio pelas avenidas, a cada lanche nas confeitarias e a cada jantar nos belíssimos restaurantes. 
Gostamos de viajar em família e gostamos de conhecer várias cidades em cada país, por isso usamos carro e mota nas nossas viagens. Temos viajado bastante pela Europa e já pisámos em quase todos os continentes.

Fully equipped studio for up to 2 people with all you need to spend your holidays in Porto!
Right in the historic centre of the city you will be just steps away from most of the tourist attractions and the busy night life this great city offers.

The space
The studio is cosy and comfortable located in a 3 storey 19th century building, completely renewed and modernized to receive international guests.

It offers a room with TV, air conditioning for heating in the winter and cooling in the summer, a comfortable double bed, linen, towels, toiletries, private bathroom, wireless internet and a separate fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, pans and pots.

name: Cardosas Design Flat
description:
A real one bedroom apartment where you have all the comforts of a independent bedroom, with ensuite, a spacious living room with dinning area, and a separate full equipped kitchen with all the amenities of a real home!
This old style renovated apartment centrally located in the heart of Porto (100m from S. Bento train station) fits four people.
Enjoy a beautiful sunny apartment decorated with iconic design pieces.

The space
Literally in the heart of Porto, this apartment is for all of those who would like to experience Porto as a local. You will be staying in one of the more exquisite blocks of Porto, Passeio das Cardosas.
This brand new top quality apartment is a mixture of old and modern style, sleeps 4 comfortable guests, 2 in the Master Bedroom and other 2 in the living room Sofa Bed.

Guest access
The bedroom is nicely decorated with traditional Portuguese elements. Has a fully furnished kitchen with brand new appliances
neighborhood_overview:
Being in the heart of a city like Porto allows you to have a great experience. Most of the city attractions are within walking distance.
S. Bento central station, one of the most beautiful train stations in the world, is right across the street. The apartment is also facing the newly renovated Rua das Flores, a pedestrian way full of coffee shops, restaurants and cute stores. Porto's night scene, Galerias de Paris, is right up the street.

Everything you need is right outside the door.
S. Bento Station - 100m
Clérigos Tower - 250m
City Hall - 400m
Ribeira - 600m

name: New Apartment with a small terrace
description:
PATH apartments were designed to make your stay in “invicta” city, just perfect! After some years travelling, we decided to share with you our wonderful city. PATH apartments are located in the Heart of the city. The building was completely rebuilt!

The space
The building was completely thought, renovated and designed specifically for you to find comfort, functionality and modern design where you can stay and rest in Porto with your family and/or friends.

The apartment has a living room with kitchenette fully equipped; a bedroom, with 2 single beds or one double bed; 2 single sofa bed and one more double sofa bed; 2 bathrooms, both with shower.

So, we are ready to provide you a stay in one confortable, beautiful and well thought appartment, where the reconstruction preserved the arquitecture of the primitive building in one of the oldest streets of the city, right in the center of old town.

neighborhood_overview:
Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon.
Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centres, and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries, when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin.

One of Portugal's internationally famous exports, port wine, is named for Porto, since the metropolitan area, and in particular the adegas of Vila Nova de Gaia, were responsible for the production and export of the fortified wine.The Porto region is also a major producer of cork.

Afurada is a typical ancient village in Vila Nova de Gaia, just across the river from Porto, and offering the best view of the city you can get. Porto is very near, but there is not a lot of public transports so it is useful to have a car. If you are arriving by air, you can get usually a quick an inexpensive rent at the airport, but in high season it is best to book in advance. Taxis are a great option, there are a lot and they are not ver
neighborhood_overview: Afurada is an old, typical fishing village, right in front of Porto's Ribeira and historical center. Recently, it has been renovated but maintains wonderful traits of it's true nature. You can enjoy grilled fish on the streets or eat in a modern restaurant, party on the docks or go to the beach, surf or watch the birds at the natural park (2 km). Or just stay at home enjoying the fantastic view!

host_about:
Vivo na cidade do Porto em Portugal.
Tenho 59 anos, falo inglês, francês e espanhol.
Gosto de viajar; Conhecer novas gentes e novos lugares.
Conheço quase todas as capitais europeias e,  de África, já estive em Marrocos e na ´Tunísia.
A Paris já fui 2 vezes mas é uma ciadade aonde apetece voltar mais vezes; Oh Paris, toujours Paris!! ;-))
Gosto de animais mas o meu preferido é o gato; Adoro a sua indepêndencia e auto confiança; Neste momento partilhamos a  casa com o  gato "Félix" que vive connosco há 13 anos.
Gosto do Verão e das suas noites quentes, de flores,  de chocolate, de praia, de passar um fim de semana no campo, de ler e cinema.
Em viagem sempre fiquei hospedada em hoteis mas, descobri a Airbnb através do meu filho que é um anfitrião aqui na cidade do Porto/Portugal e, como a oferta de apartamentos é tão boa, decidi experimentar; É a minha primeira vez ;-) Espero que corra bem!
Aos anfitrioes digo que os seus apartamentos ficam em boas mãos; Sou uma mulher muito organizada e cuidadosa; Se duvidar, consulte o meu horóscopo; Sou do signo Virgem, logo,  mais perfeccionista não há, LOL!!!

name: View over the mouth of the Douro
description:
A charming house with view both on the Douro river and the sea.

The space
The house offers an exceptional view over the Douro river and the sea.
It is a two floor dwelling house with 120m2 and a garden (80m2).
On the ground floor, there is a living room, a toilet, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen, with garden access.
Upstairs, there are two bedrooms: 1 bedroom, facing west, with a double bed and a small terrace offering panoramic view over the mouth of the Douro; The other room, facing east, has two single beds and a small balcony. A complete bathroom serves both rooms.
The house is located in a quiet street where you can easily leave your car.
and public transport in a close neighborhood (metro, bus, taxi).

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a traditional neighborhood that preserves several rural characteristics. However, it is very close to the city center.
Located on the slopes of the Douro, between the city center and the sea, this is a
quiet and peaceful neighborhood. It is in close proximity with all amenities, including local shops (grocery / bakery) and the bus stop is on the street next to the door. It is also at 10 min walk to the district of "Boavista" where you can find major retail and leisure areas (shops, restaurants, bars, cinemas, museums, etc), served by a large network of public transport (bus, metro, electric, taxi).

It has an easy access to different points of historic and cultural interest, within a 10 min walk to the House of Music and 20 min to the Serralves Museum) and other leisure areas (parks - Park City with organic market on Saturday, botanical garden, beaches and surf spots, cycling lanes, etc.).
It is an ideal place for those looking to stay
host_about:
Hello, I'm Ester, live and work in Porto. 
I love the city for its historical and cultural heritage and also by its surrounding landscape - river, sea and green spaces that make this city is so pleasant to live. 
People are part of the well-being of this city, being available and given, always with a friendly smile. 

The architecture and landscaping surrounding, the events, gastronomies, and above all the friendliness of the people make this city a travel destination, charming and special. 

I will gladly give you some tips for you to discover all the charms of this town.

neighborhood_overview:
The building is located on the historical center of Porto, in the heart of UNESCO World Heritage Center.
It's one minute away from the river side, and in the same street you have monuments like Palácio da Bolsa, S. Francisco church, among others.
Is close by to all the city's major attractions such as the Port Wine Cellars, Clérigos Tower, Lello book store which inspired J.K. Rowling in her Harry Potter books, and so much more. 5 min from S.Bento Station and from Alfândega Porto Congress Center.
host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

neighborhood_overview: Located in Porto downtown, in a residential street parallel to Rua de Santa Catarina (main shopping zone, Café Majestic), the apartment is very close to many landmarks, shops, theatres, restaurants and bars. Guests can discover and enjoy the city and its idiosyncrasies by walking. Walking along Rua Santa Catarina (100 meters), guests find the Souls Chapel (Capela das Almas, 280 meters) next to the Bolhão Market (Mercado do Bolhão, 400m) and the Bolhão metro station. Just about 8 minutes is the city's main avenue, the Avenida dos Aliados, next to which are the São Bento Station, Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) and across the Tower of Clerics (Torre dos Clérigos) (shopping area, restaurants and bars). Going down to the Riverside of Douro (Ribeira do Douro; about 20 minutes from the apartment), guests find the Palace of Bolsa (Palácio da Bolsa) and the Church of St. Francis (Igreja S. Francisco). description:
Casa da Madalena is in a quiet street, near the beach (3km) and Oporto City (6 Km)
The supermarket is at the parallel street.
It is 30 meters from the bus and it´s near of the train station, allowing you to quickly reach the historic city center.

The space
Madalena Room is in a quiet street, near the beach (3km) and Oporto City (6 Km). Two bicycles are available.
It is 30 meters from the bus station and 600 meters from the train station, from which you can travel along the coast or quickly reach the historic city center.
The room is part of a house with two floors and is located on the top floor.
The room is bright and with two single beds, comfortably sleeps two people.

Guest access
Guests have access to kitchen, living room and garden, situated in the backyard.

Other things to note
We have two friendly cats, Rondo and Pingú, who interact with us.
neighborhood_overview:
Madalena is an urban village in the municipality of Vila Nova de Gaia, which is 6 Km from the historic center of Oporto, classified as a World Heritage since 1996.
Casa da Madalena is 600 meters from the train station, from which you can reach the historic center or travel along the coast.
Also lies 3 km from the beach where you can walk or ride the coast toward the north, to reach the mouth of the Douro river and visit the picturesque village of Afurada.
Toward the south at a distance of about 20 Km, you can visit some fishing villages as Aguda or Espinho where there are many restaurants where you can enjoy fresh seafood or have fun at Espinho´s Casino.
At Vila Nova de Gaia among other interesting places you can visit Port Wine cellars and enjoy the river border with many typical restaurants with a beautiful view of Oporto.
host_about:
My name is Rui and my whife´s name is Ana.
We have two children, Tiago and Ricardo and two cats Rondó and Pingú. 
We love all kinds of music with a special preference for classical music.
Traveling and meet  people from different places is what we like most.
We hope this is a good opportunity  to meet  and help people doing one of our favorite things.

neighborhood_overview: 100 meters from the apartment there are the famous Avenida dos Aliados, the Cathedral, Clérigos Tower, Rua de Santa Catarina, Lello and Batalha Square, among many other must-visit places. At the bottom of the street, comes Palacio da Bolsa, the Douro River, Ribeira and Dom Luis Bridge. Two minutes walk, is the animated Galerias de Paris, with its bars, restaurants and modern 'taverns' where you can experience the finest cocktails and typical food.

name: Egg Nuts Apt - Historic Center
description:
The sweetest apartment in town! 
The Egg Nuts apartment is on top of one of the oldest Pastry Shops shops in Porto center, where you can have your breakfast included on the price.

The space
Is a large, charming and sunny space with 55m2. With one bed room, and a sofa-bed convertible on the living room is a comfortable place for 3.
Two bathroom and a kitchen with fridge/freezer, stove and microwave. With the necessary equipment for cooking during holidays or for a small stay in work. 
Is a second floor without elevator. 
You have free WIFI , music equipment and same books, including city guides. 

This is a city center apartment, that is turn back to some courtyards with engines from restaurants. It make some noise, please note this if you are looking for a quiet place.

Guest access
We will be present when you arrive and special snacks and drinks are waiting for you.
We are glad to help you during your
neighborhood_overview:
The Egg Nuts is a charming and beautiful apartment located in the heart of historic Porto city.
Just across the street you have the famous Praça dos Leões, Igreja do Carmo and Igreja das Carmelitas. The Clerigus Tower and the Portuguese Center of Photography are on your backside and you can also spot the famous Lello Bookshop on your right.
The quartier is not only surround by monuments, but also great restaurants, shops and traditional grocery's. A few 5 minutes walking from the Arts quartier Miguel Bombarda and 5 minutes walking from the quartier Galerias de Paris full of trendy bars.
During weekends the quartier is full of street markets where you can find a little of every thing!
You can also take a beautiful 20 minutes walking till the riverside – Ribeira.
host_about:
We are from Porto and we love it!!
We will be glad to give you some ideas to get to know our city!!
We  love to travel and  get to know people from around the world! 
We have 2 small kids and 1 dog named Bowie, yes after David Bowie. 
We love music! 
we hope to see you soon.

name: PortoPath- Duplex with mezanine very bright
description:
PATH apartments were designed to make your stay in “invicta” city, just perfect! After some years travelling, we decided to share with you our wonderful city. PATH apartments are located in the Heart of the city. The building was completely rebuilt!

The space
The building was completely thought, rebuilt and designed specifically for you to find comfort, functionality and modern design where you can stay and rest in Porto with your family and/or friends.
It can handle up to six adults at a time.
The apartment has a living room with kitchenette fully equipped and a spiral staircase that conect down a bedroom with one double bed and a bathroom and on the top a mezzanine where you can find 2 individual beds; there is still one double sofa bed in the livingroom and other bathroom, both with shower.
This apartment is different than usual, being very atractive for family with kids. However, we don't recommend for kids younger than 6.

Guest
host_about:
We, the mentors of PATH, traveled  the world, found and experienced new cultures, shared knowledge, climbed mountains, explored canyons, walked to the far East to find and understand the relaxed way of living and now, in our own beautiful city we are ready to be the cradle of those who visit us.

So, we are ready to provide you a stay in one confortable, beautiful and well thought appartment, where the reconstruction preserved the arquitecture of the primitive building in one of the oldest streets of the city, right in the center of old town.

So, be our guest!

name: 2-room appartment in Gaia with an amazing view
description:
In Vila Nova de Gaia (across Porto), very close to the ocean and to the outlet of Douro river, nice little apartment with an american kitchen on a 3rd floor. Amazing view, nice neighbourhood. Public transportation right at the door, along with the area's best bakery, a café and a grocery store.
Well equipped kitchen, making the apartment confortable for longer stays.

The space
As of February 2022, a new AC system for your heating and, occasionally, refreshing. Double windows as well, for a better sound isolation.
A very nice bar between the kitchen and the living room.
Sound isolated bedroom.
A well equipped kitchen.
An inspiring apartment with a real cachet.

Guest access
Everything is accessible to the guests.

License number
76420/AL
neighborhood_overview: The location is very special. It is very close to the outlet of Douro River, on the Gaia side (opposite to Porto city). It is on the 3rd floor so you do see water - river and ocean - from the windows. Sea and river ar at an equal - 15 min - walking distance. The closest site on the river is a nature reserve with bird observatories. From there a few extra steps to the left: you are in front of the ocean. A few steps to the right on the other hand take you to lovely fisherman's village Afurada with fantastic views of Porto and the Douro river upstream. And Porto being a very dense city, you are actually 10 min away from its city center by car!
host_about: I am a symphony orchestra musician, living in Porto since 2000 and working at Rem Koolhas' smashing palace Casa da Musica. Porto is a very special and unique city that you can enjoy in lots of different ways as a tourist. But as for living there, I wouldn't swap home with anyone!

A Cordoaria Guest House surge no Porto, no início de 2012, em pleno coração da cidade Património da Humanidade, fruto da vontade da 3ª geração da família proprietária do edifício.
Numa altura em que o intercâmbio de cidadãos dos mais diversos centros europeus, nomeadamente jovens, floresce, a readaptação de um edifício oitocentista numa guest house parece inevitável. O conceito da CGH oferece uma estadia temporária a quem quer "sentir-se em casa".

name: Wonderful Apart Center Oporto!
description:

You can find out from here to Porto just walking, you will find churches, monuments, typical restaurants and shopping streets with many shops from crafts to modern design items.
Enjoy the evening at the Port, following the crowd in the streets, bars and terraces, from traditional to modern. Just 10 minutes from home, find the Ribeira do Porto, where you can find handicrafts, restaurants and traditional bars. name: Rosário 75 A small part of our home
description:
Faça parte da vizinhança! Venha conhecer o Porto!

The space
Be a part of the neighborhood! Get to know Porto!

Rosário 75 is a fully independent apartment, located in the arts quarter, housing up to 4 persons with master bedroom, living room, bath room and kitchen equipped with refrigerator, stove, and dishware and small kitchen utensils that allow you to prepare breakfast and, why not, a special dinner!
It belongs to an old house recently renovated in March of 2014. Both the bed and sofa accommodate 2 persons which makes this house ideal for a party of four.
Located in a very quiet but central neighborhood, is ideal for families but also for couples and groups of friends. It is possible to use the bathroom independently from each division which helps to maintain some privacy.
It has cable TV and Wifi in the unlikely event of spare time!
Due to its excellent location it’s within walking distance from Oporto’s down town (10 minutes) w
neighborhood_overview: A nossa casa está localizada num local muito calmo, num bairro típico da cidade onde as galerias de arte combinam na perfeição com os cafés de bairro e as pequenas mercearias onde se podem comprar legumes e frutas frescas. É sem dúvida um bairro muito “sofisticatípico”.
host_about:
Só conhecemos verdadeiramente um local quando conhecemos as suas gentes, a sua cultura e o seu modo de viver.
Acreditamos nisso e sabemos que não estamos sozinhos! Estamos pois (eu, a Rita e a Rosinha, a nossa gata) ansiosos por partilhar com os nossos futuros hóspedes e amigos o nosso entusiasmo e carinho que temos por esta magnífica cidade que é o Porto! 
Apenas conocemos verdaderamente un local cuando conocemos a sus gentes, cultura y modo de vivir. ¡Creemos en esto y sabemos que no estamos solos! Estamos (yo, Rita y Rosinha, nuestras gata) ansiosos para compartir con nuestros futuros huéspedes y amigos nuestro entusiasmo e ilusión que tenemos por esta magnífica ciudad de Oporto.
We only really know a place when we know their people, their culture and way of life.
We strongly believe in this and we know we are not alone. We are (me, Rita and Rosa our cat) anxious to share with our future guests and friends our enthusiasm and love for this magnificent city that is Oporto!

name: Large, bright, stylish, two floor apart downtown
description:
The apartment is part of a famous housing complex designed by renowned architect Álvaro Siza Vieira. The “Lapa” metro station is a 2min walk away and you can get from the airport in 20min. Oporto is famous for its food, wine and architecture like "Casa da Música" which is 10min walking away or the river side “Ribeira” which you can walk to in a very interesting 30min downhill stroll. You can walk all over the city from the apartment, then jump the metro back at the end of your days exploring.

The space
The apartment is set in the “Bairro da Bouça” housing complex, design by Álvaro Siza Vieira. This housing complex is mandatory in people visiting to see the style and buildings of Porto architectural guide. Set in a quiet neighborhood, you will find residents who live there since the 70’s, as well as young musicians, artists, designers and architects. It’s a cool and sought after place to live and has a great reputation.
This two floor apartment has two sleep
host_about:
Sandra is an architect and a researcher on Landscapes and Societies at University of Minho. Alexandre is a teacher and a musician in “Galandum Galundaina”, a musical group specialising in Portugal traditional music.

We are a young couple who love traveling and exploring different cultures. We have lived in Porto for many years and know the city well, and are always happy to suggest an authentic place for something to eat, some interesting art or where to go for the best shopping in the city. The local area is interesting and a real Porto neighbourhood, full of character and places to relax, eat or just grab a coffee and watch the world go by.  It is always a pleasure to welcome our guests and share with them our passion for Porto. We speak English, Spanish and French.

description:

The space
Near Porto Historic Center and Port Wine Cellars, in a quiet typical fishing village, close to the sea and the beaches. You can enjoy nature and the sightseeing and at same time stay close to the main turistic and historical sites of Porto.
The house accomodates 2 (45€/day) to 6 (90€/day) guests. A perfect place for families.

The Natural Reserve of Douro Estuary in the final part of Douro estuary, on the south bank of the
neighborhood_overview:
São Pedro da Afurada is a village on the left bank of the Douro, just next to the river mouth. It is the most recent, smallest and most typical of Gaia's parishes.
Afurada is essentially known for its fishing traditions as well as for its feast in honour of São Pedro which is commemorated every year on the first weekend of July and consists of a beautiful pilgrimage followed by a lively open-air festival.
The gastronomy of this parish has a special glow because many of the fish dishes that you can appreciate in its restaurants are fruit of the local work.

name: Historical house with private garden
description:
A nossa casa está localizado na encantadora cidade de Porto, a poucos minutos de distância de uma grande quantidade de atracções e monumentos históricos. 5 quartos , grandes áreas comuns e um jardim para o uso privado dos nossos hóspedes.

The space
O edifício do início do século 20 foi convertido numa casa de hóspedes com 220 metros quadrados em dois andares e um jardim privativo com 150 metros quadrados. Como nosso hóspede pode desfrutar da privacidade e exclusividade de uma casa de 5 quartos para si mesmo, a sua família ou amigos.
Com capacidade para 9 pessoas, a decoração dos 4 quartos duplos da casa foi especialmente concebida em sistema de mezzanine (cama alta) para satisfazer as necessidades dos nossos hóspedes, criando um espaço de intimidade para cada um mesmo dividindo o quarto. Para além dos 4 quartos duplos temos também 1 quarto individual com decoração singular. Todos os quartos têm fechadura digital.
A sala de estar, jantar, cozinha, wcs/b
neighborhood_overview:
Num um local tranquilo, mas com tudo o que é preciso tão perto.
Se estiver com vontade de andar em 15 minutos estará na baixa da cidade (Bolhão ou Aliados). Se estiver com preguiça o Metro ou estação de autocarro fica apenas a 100 metros de distância!
host_about:
Together for more than 20 years we were always passionate about building and crafting our own projects.
The free spirit of a designer balanced with the focus of an engineer, made us the perfect team to rebuild an historical house in the center of Porto city, the town where we were born and raised, that we now bring to YOU.
With attention on details and comfort, we want to prepare this house for our guests so they feel at home and live the true Porto experience. 
We live 5 minutes away in other house with our son and daughter so we are glad to help at anytime.
Oh yes we also have a dog called Pompeu!

name: PORTO PENTHOUSE - Suspended Bed and Terrace
description:
The fusion of traditional and contemporary architecture. Suspended bed and terrace

The space
In a full restored building, Porto Penthouse has an excellent terrace with sweeping views over green gardens of Priorado Square (Largo do Priorado) and the oldest church in Porto - Church of Cedofeita, giving a feeling of great openness, not usual in the urban Porto tissue, mostly defined by narrow streets. The terrace is equipped with garden furniture suitable for dining and enjoying moments of relaxation and outdoor recreation. Inside the paradox between the traditional and the contemporary is revealed. In this open space stands a suspended bed, the center piece for a new experience. The bathroom is lined with innovative building materials generating unusual environmental atmospheres. It is equipped with facilities like LCD 32", Cable TV, high performance air conditioning, combi oven, induction hob, wireless internet and small appliances (no washing machine).
neighborhood_overview: Porto Penthouse is situated in the urban city center, between the historical center and some of the major city cultural references, like Casa da Música and Serralves. It's a quiet neighbourhood.

host_about:
Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa and I'm the CEO of Feel Porto. 

Feel Porto was created with the goal of opening the doors of Porto to the world by offering the opportunity to welcome our travelers in the best accommodation apartments complemented with service excellency.

Headquartered downtown Porto it counts with a lot of properties not only in Porto but also in Matosinhos and Vila Nova de Gaia, so we can connect the city experience with the beach lifestyle. 

In order to add major value to our guests stay, we count with our partners to provide remarkable and customized Services and Experiences.

Porto is a city with character and that’s what Feel Porto wants to pass on!

name: Azulejo Porto Riverside
description:
Enjoy this freshly furnished 1 bedroom apartment where all the rooms have fabulous views over the river Douro, the port wine lodges and the Luis I bridge.
It's located in the historic city centre in a quiet neighbourhood. Most of the main touristic attractions are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (metro, train, bus) nearby.
It has a spacious living room and can accommodate up to 4 guests.

The space
The building is located in the historic city centre, on the hill, halfway between the Cathedral of Porto and Luis I bridge, in Ribeira. To the apartments there is pedestrian access only, along 80 steps/stairs, (please see last photo on the website) either down from the Cathedral or up from the river. It may be a drawback if you have mobility concerns, but it does afford you privacy, peacefulness and fabulous views in one of the most genuine quarters of Porto :-)

Other things to note
Discounts apply on wee
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 minutes walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 minutes from the cathedral, and 5 minutes from São Bento station.
It is perfectly placed to visit the world heritage site of Porto city centre. Go down to the Ribeira to watch the world go by in a riverside cafe, or to take a river trip up the Douro to see the Port wine vineyards. Walk across the river to sample wines in the port wine lodges in Gaia. Visit the Cathedral, the Clérigos Tower and the colourful Bolhão market. Visit the Serralves Museum, one of the best art galleries in Europe, and the Casa da Música, an incredible work of contemporary architecture. Take in the cafes, bars, restaurants and clubs of the city. It's all on your doorstep.

In the center, there is a huge variety of bars and typical Portuguese restaurants to choose from, so you can find a variety of options from simple and traditional to the most sophisticated and contemporary.

name: Miss'Opo - studio downtown Porto
description:
Miss’Opo is a home for guests, in historic Porto downtown, where the tradition are welcom the urban and contemporany shifts.

The space
She provides accommodation with her single and double studios.
From Tuesday to Sunday, she takes care of the hungry and thirsty in the restaurant/bar. Miss’Opo’s menu is the gastronomic equivalent of the architectural frame. Frequently she has guests in the kitchen so we may vary tasting experiences. Also in the ground floor there’s the store that sometimes becomes a gallery.

Guest access
The motto underneath her service relies on proximity. Her wish is to make her guests feel at their friends home, learning with their senses and forgetting rush times for a while. 
Miss’Opo’s atmosphere renews itself on account of the diverse cooperations and partnerships with artists, galleries and cultural institutions. These unlinear interactions compose her agenda. 

Other things to note
W

name: House in the Country with Pool
description:
A house in the country side, perfect place for relaxing with quality.
With nature as surrounding and quality as a priority, we chose to ensure a unique stay with only one possible drawback: not wanting to leave there!

The space
Rustic house with pool in the country side, located in the Minho region of Portugal, very close to Póvoa de Varzim (12km), in a quiet and relaxing atmosphere.
Being a farm belonging to the same family for about 150 years, the old barn has been rebuilt with truthfully care, remembering the original roots alloyed with comfort and functionality of our days.
With nature as surrounding and quality as a priority, we chose to ensure a unique stay with only one possible drawback: not wanting to leave there!

Car Parking

- Hair dryer;
- water boiler;
- Toaster;
- Microwave
- Dishwasher
- Stereo with Bluetooth, CD player, USB and Radio;
- Satellite TV

Beds configuratio
neighborhood_overview:
In line with what is happening in the Portuguese northwest, also in the municipality of Póvoa de Varzim religious festivals are the main manifestation of the collective communities. Spreading throughout the year, however, a clear concentration in the months of June, July and August. Each of the parishes of the county has a favorite devotion. Although every celebration has its own characteristics, it does not nullify the religious and cultural unity of substance.
Of all religious festivals stand out Holy Week; S. Peter, big party in town, with the highlight on the night of June 29 to 28; Our Lady of the Assumption, patron saint of fishermen, the 15th of August; and the Lady of Sorrows, September. Deserves particular emphasis because of their size, the cult of Sister Alexandrina recently beatified, and that makes the parish Balasar an important pilgrimage site for domestic and foreign.
host_about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

name: S. Bento II - Studio
description:
Cozy apartment with a modern and unique decor, located directly opposite São Bento Station, at the beginning of Rua das Flores. Has three fronts, full of windows, providing a fantastic view!

The space
Situated right in the heart of the city, opposite the S. Bento Train Station and at the beginning of Rua das Flores, offers great views and a fantastic private terrace to enjoy the late afternoon or make a meal outdoors.
It is the perfect accommodation for a solo traveler, two friends or a couple in love. Set in a historic building which has been fully restored to provide every comfort to its guests, allows, despite having no kitchen, preparing small meals because it is equipped with a fridge, microwave and kettle.

Guest access
Refrigerator, microwave, kettle, toaster, hairdryer, LCD, cable TV, Wi-Fi; Dishes; linens and towels; Guest Book.
neighborhood_overview: 100 meters from the apartment there are the famous Avenida dos Aliados, the Cathedral, Clérigos Tower, Rua de Santa Catarina, Lello and Batalha Square, among many other must-visit places. At the bottom of the street, comes Palacio da Bolsa, the Douro River, Ribeira and Dom Luis Bridge. Two minutes walk, is the animated Galerias de Paris, with its bars, restaurants and modern 'taverns' where you can experience the finest cocktails and typical food.

MyRiverPlace are 4 charming apartments with fabulous views all over "Douro" River and Porto.
Located in a strategic place:
- Metro Station "Jardim do Morro" at 350 m
- BUS stop 10 m
- Train Station from 400 m
- D. Luis BRIDGE & "Douro" River at 150 m
- Car Parking almost in front, at 30 m
- Mini-Markets, Cafes, Bakery, Snack-bar and restaurants close by!

The space
This apartment is decorated with furniture from the beginning of the twentieth Century in an atmosphere of charm and refinement so that you feel involved in the historic town.

The neighborhood area is perfect for visit Porto. Strategic place surrounded by Cafe, bakery, Supermarkets, Restaurants, METRO Station 400 meters, Train Station 400 meters, Bus Stop 10 meters and the historic center in about 5 to 10 minutes walk!
As you
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is decorated with furniture from the beginning of the twentieth Century in an atmosphere of charm and refinement so that you feel involved in the historic town.

The neighborhood area is perfect for visit Porto. Strategic place surrounded by Cafe, bakery, Supermarkets, Restaurants, Metro Station, Train Station, Bus Stop all in about 5 to 10 minutes walk!
As you are in the historic center, easy to visit all town by foot, you don't need any transport to visit the best places in Porto. Located in front of the "Douro" river with the BEST view in town, just in front of "RIBEIRA" which is world heritage area!
You can start the visit from the river and going through the the old Neighborhoods or choosing one of the several Port wine cellars for a tasting visit and next for a river cruise of 50 minutes in a typical boat called "Rabelo".
All this in 5 minutes walking!!

It has fabulous views over the River Douro and the city of Porto. The place
host_about: Como cidadão desta "aldeia" global, a minha grande paixão são as relações humanas, adoro conviver, partilhar, aprender com todas as pessoas que por alguma razão se cruzarão na minha vida. Para mim, é um verdadeiro prazer receber todos os que nos visitam, e também poder partilhar tudo aquilo que sei sobre a cidade que amo... o Porto

description:
Fully equipped studio, superbly located right next to the main avenue.
Walk everywhere from here! And the garden is perfect to relax!

6361/AL

The space
The studio has 33 square meters + a garden! :)
Fully equipped, ideal for 2, but accommodates up to 3 people!

FULLY EQUIPPED APARTMENT
• double size bed (140 cm x 200 cm)
• single sofa bed (100 cm x 190 cm)
• 24'' LCD TV, cable TV, DVD player (and movies as well)
• free wireless internet
• kitchenette with electric stove, microwave, fridge with a small freezer compartment and dishwasher.
• small appliances such as coffee machine, kettle, toaster, squeezer, handheld blender.

• shared laundry on the ground floor with washing. Inside the apartment, non-shared, there is an iron & ir
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATED IN PORTO HISTORIC CENTRE
The apartment is located in Porto Historic Centre, really next to the main avenue. The area was classified as "World Heritage" by UNESCO in 1996.

From here you can walk to the most important touristic spots! Good restaurants and bars are just around the corner as well! :)

Come on, you will love the place!!!
host_about:
Hey!
My name is Raul and I live in Porto.
I like to walk outdoors, have a beer with my friends and I love "Francesinhas" (you will know what this is when in town).

I love to travel and I am fortunate to do most trips with my longtime girlfriend/wife. Together, we have been to more than 25 countries and are always looking for the next destination. 
We have 2 children (a girl born in 2016 and a boy born in 2020), so now we have more stuff to carry on trips. :)

I will be very happy to be your host in Porto!

description:
The sweetest apartment in town!
The Belly Angel apartment is on top of one of the oldest Pastry Shops in Porto center where you can have your breakfast included on the price.

The space
The Belly Angel is a charming and beautiful apartment located in the heart of historic Porto city. From the balcony you can admire the famous Clérigos Tower, the Portuguese Center of Photography and the beautiful Cordoaria Garden.

Large, spacious and sunny space with 55m2. A large bed room and a sofa-bed convertible on the living room makes it a comfortable place for two where can accommodate three. Two bathrooms with shower. Towels and bed sheets are provide. Kitchen with fridge/freezer, stove and microwave. With the necessary equipment for cooking during a short stay.

You can eat a lot of cakes downstairs because is a 3rd floor without elevator!

Guest access
It is an independent apartment. Common entrance with the pastry s

The quartier is not only surround by monuments, but also great restaurants, shops and traditional grocery's. A few 5 minutes walking from the Arts quartier Miguel Bombarda and 2 minutes walking from the quartier Galerias de Paris full of trendy bars and the heart of Porto night spot. During weekends the quartier is full of street markets where you can find a little of every thing!
You can also take a beautiful 20 minutes walking till the riverside – Ribeira.

name: Spacious suite with sunny terrace and bathroom
description:
Very spacious and bright ensuite room with a large sunny terrace and private bathroom in a typical townhouse, at 3 minutes walk from metro station Bolhão and Santa Catarina shopping street. Near cafes, restaurants and several shops and services. Downtown, Ribeira and Porto's main sightseeings at walking distance. At a very short walk, Santa Catarina street, Coliseum, Batalha and Poveiros offer plenty of breakfast options, cafes, restaurants and known tapas and bars.

The space
Very comfortable and quiet room in a typical townhouse, with high stucco ceilings and hard wood floor. The room is about 30m2, with a large new window, king size bed, private bathroom and a 16m2 sunny private terrace facing the back garden.

Guest access
A large and fully equipped living room & kitchen on the ground floor is for everyone´s use. This is a typical townhouse with only six rooms, shared with 5 other international guests (ages usually between 20 to 40 years
neighborhood_overview: Safe residential area near Porto's famous Santa Catarina shopping street and Bolhão Market, with several fruit shops, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes around. There are two shopping centres at 5 min walk with extended opening times offering many shops and services, sports and a health club (with swimming pool). Downtown sightseeing spots at walking distance, and close to S. Lázaro Garden, Praça dos Poveiros, Coliseum. Several known restaurants and bars such as Maus Hábitos and Casa Guedes at a short walk.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Architect and exhibition designer, interested in museums, travelling & exploring cities and nature alike. Dog lover, vegetarian & coffee drinker, non-smoker, I enjoy a glass of wine & good conversation, picnics and long walks. 

I’m originally from Lisbon, studied architecture in Porto and lived in Berlin, Vienna, London, Sydney; I live & work in New York City since 2018.

name: Porto Music House B&B
description:
Traditional apartment in the heart of Oporto, two minutes' walk to "Casa da Música". The owner, a female teacher of Arts and Crafts, opens her house to friendly couples or single travelers.

The space
Proximity to the Porto Music House, in an architecturally interesting building, with a decoration reminiscent of the literary period of Romanticism.

Guest access
Guests have access to most of the house, except the owner's room. As for the kitchen, it is required to ask the owner, a few hours in advance, if and when a guest wishes to use it, for better organization.The owner reserves the right to decline on occasion use of the kitchen if it is inconvenient.
Breakfast is included in the price and will be prepared by the owner.
neighborhood_overview: Although the house has enough beauty and interest in itself, its most important feature is the close proximity to the heart of Oporto, via the Music House, which has transportation options to virtually anywhere, because it is one of Porto's tourism central hubs.

name: Foz House®: holidays in Oporto (V2)
description:
Foz House: a historical experience in a vibrant city.

Completely renovated historic home, located in the heart of Foz Velha, close to many amenities and with easy access to the Oporto's downtown.

The space
House with 2 bedrooms (1 double and 1 twin), bathroom with shower, lounge (living room with reading area, and dining), fully equipped kitchen and a terrace overlooking the Douro River.
Check-in: 2pm/flexible. Check-out: noon/flexible.

Other things to note
Can accommodate one more person (extra bed, at extra cost) and 1 child up to 3 years (extra bed, free).
neighborhood_overview:
Foz House is integrated in the hearth of Foz Velha (Old Foz), a short walk (200 meters) from the beaches of Foz do Douro (with blue flag) and from Rio Douro, the Foz's castle (Forte de São João Batista), the Passeio Alegre's garden and the Brasil's avenue.
There are many shops, including bars and restaurants (eg: Bar Tolo, Casa da Foz, Praia da Luz, Cepa Torta).
The House Foz is located approximately 2 km to the City Park and Museum and the Serralves Park.

We are very easy going, and like to keep ourselves busy with travel and fun experiences.

i am  fluent in , Spanish, English and some French and hope that this will be useful to all our international guests when in need of advice or tips in  Porto.

name: Charming & Unique City Flat
description:
Located in Porto downtown in a building renovated in 2014, this flat is filled with light and character. The flat is walking distance from major landmarks and transportation. With 2 bedrooms, plus a mezzanine it can comfortably accommodate 6.

The space
Centrally located in a quiet square, the flat is within walking distance to most of Porto landmarks, with easy access to major transportation lines.
The building has been completely renovated in 2014 to the highest standard, providing all the comfort of a modern house while maintaining its beautiful original features, such as its staircase or its windows in traditional Portuguese style.
The flat comfortably accommodates 6 people and it’s your perfect home away. Whether you are a family with children or a group of friends looking for a home away, this is a place you’ll be looking forward to come back to after a day out in the town.
With 125 square meters, the flat occupies the entire 3rd floor of t
neighborhood_overview:
Overlooking the Douro River, Porto is one of the most ancient European cities. It was born and developed from the northern bank of this river during the Middle Ages. One of the most significant aspects of Porto and its historical centre is its landscape, combining harmony with the urban structure and presenting a frame of rare beauty. The city was classified as World Heritage by UNESCO in 1996.

When discovering Porto, you will find many surprises. Besides its welcoming and historical environment, Porto is also contemporary and artistic. This is shown not only in the streets, architecture, monuments and museums but also in the terraces, restaurants, nightlife and shopping areas.

We look forward to welcoming you!
Filomena and Ana

The Paranhos parish - located northeast of the city centre - is the site of the largest concentration of higher education institutes in the city, concentrated around the Pólo Universitário. This
host_about:
Hi, I’m Luis, born and bred in Porto and a true tripeiro (the nickname given to the people of Porto who, during the Discoveries in the 15th century, gave the ships sailing off to the New Worlds all the best meat, and kept only the tripe for themselves). That means we love our city and are very proud of it, perhaps especially its football team – the best in Portugal! It’s also evidence of how friendly and hospitable we are, and I’ll do my best to make your visit to Porto really enjoyable. Advice on where to go, the hidden gems that most tourists never get to see, the best places to eat, the best bargains and ways of getting around on a budget – just ask.

I used to live in this apartment, but when my daughter was born, 10 years ago, I moved around the corner. That means I’m readily available to help all I can – it’s what I do for a living, so you’re sure to get my undivided attention.

I may have lived in Porto all my life, but I’ve also travelled a fair bit, to the United States, to Asia and, of course, to other parts of Europe, so I understand what travellers need, and will always do my best to make your stay go smoothly.

name: Studio1 kitcnhet and wc Clean&Safe certified HACCP
description:
Due to covid 19 pandemic, and, for your safety, we have adopted a hygienic service, with an anti- bacterial product, based on a compound of quaternary ammonium certified by HACCP.

My space is close to public transport, the city center, art and culture, its all a 10 minuts walking. You'll love my space because of the comfortable bed, the warmth, and also the silence and the tranquility of the house that is in the center of Porto but far away enough to not feel the low noise .

The space
The studio is, modern, full of light, in an apartment in one of the most iconic buildings of downtown Porto; The Big Ben building.
The studio is an open space with a kitchenette, fully equiped, bunk bed with 2 single beds and private bathroom with shower. The studio has in a closet and screen TV and wireless internet. Our guests have also a laundry available for free.

Guest access
Guests have full access to their studio and bathroom.
neighborhood_overview: The building is on a street where there are restaurants, grocery store, greengrocer and bakery. moreover, it is very comveniente because there is a restaurant / snack bar, open 00:00 daily. And downtown is 5 minuts walking and Ribeira is only 15 minuts walking.
host_about:
Vivo na cidade do Porto em Portugal.
Tenho 59 anos, falo inglês, francês e espanhol.
Gosto de viajar; Conhecer novas gentes e novos lugares.
Conheço quase todas as capitais europeias e,  de África, já estive em Marrocos e na ´Tunísia.
A Paris já fui 2 vezes mas é uma ciadade aonde apetece voltar mais vezes; Oh Paris, toujours Paris!! ;-))
Gosto de animais mas o meu preferido é o gato; Adoro a sua indepêndencia e auto confiança; Neste momento partilhamos a  casa com o  gato "Félix" que vive connosco há 13 anos.
Gosto do Verão e das suas noites quentes, de flores,  de chocolate, de praia, de passar um fim de semana no campo, de ler e cinema.
Em viagem sempre fiquei hospedada em hoteis mas, descobri a Airbnb através do meu filho que é um anfitrião aqui na cidade do Porto/Portugal e, como a oferta de apartamentos é tão boa, decidi experimentar; É a minha primeira vez ;-) Espero que corra bem!
Aos anfitrioes digo que os seus apartamentos ficam em boas mãos; Sou uma mulher muito organizada e cuidadosa; Se duvidar, consulte o meu horóscopo; Sou do signo Virgem, logo,  mais perfeccionista não há, LOL!!!

name: Apartment with views over Douro
description:
Apartamento T1 com terraço virado a sul com vistas fantásticas sobre o rio Douro. Tem uma cama de casal no quarto e um sofá cama de casal na sala (acomoda 4). Wc completo e cozinha equipada. Tv LCD e internet WiFi.

The space
Este apartamento está num pequeno edifício reabilitado frente ao rio a metros da famosa zona da Ribeira na parte mais pitoresca da zona histórica do Porto. Todos os locais de interesse turístico são acessíveis a pé. O seu solarengo terraço permitirá vivenciar momentos inesquecíveis. Acomoda 4 pessoas confortavelmente.

Guest access

name: ORM - Sé Apartment
description:
Apartment in one of the most traditional buildings of Porto , within the UNESCO protected area.
From it´s typical balcony you can get a glimpse of the imposing Sé do Porto.
This apartment will allow you the comfort of your home as it is fully equipped with all the necessary amenities for a stay in Porto.
It´s 1 minute from Sé Cathedral and Luís I bridge. Ideal for 2 people, but fits 4 as your sofa bed allows for this versatility.
Come and join us! The real experience in Porto.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

The apartment is located on Rua Saraiva de Carvalho and was named Sé for its proximity to the Igreja da Sé, one of the main and oldest monuments of Portugal.
This cathedral began to be built still in century XII, having the works extended until Century XIII.

The Sé apartment building dates back to the 1930s, retaining its original structure
neighborhood_overview:
Familiar building located in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment.
Points of interest:
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)
- Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)
- Rua de Santa Catarina - Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)
- Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)
- Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)
- S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)
- Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)
- Torre dos Clérigos - Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

name: crowntown apartment 2a
description:
►We require the digital covid vaccination certificate online before check-in!
(Mandatory measure by Portuguese government)
►At the moment there is construction work vis-à-vis the apartment!

crowntown apartments opens its gates. Seven wonderfully furnished apartments promise the ideal home base for an unforgettable stay in the city of Porto. The soft opening of the crowntown apartments during the first months of this year offers the ideal time for this.

The space
The crowntown apartments are located in the centre of the historic City Porto, in a fully renovated building of the 19th century. The house combines the charme of traditional city apartment and the amenities of current standards. Thereby, the obtained elements of the stone wall and the high rooms captivate, just like the relaxing rain shower and the comfortable Boxspring bed.

The apartment is based on the 2th floor and combines kitchen and bedroom within a spacious room.
host_about:
Individual and personal service in a family atmosphere. We are friendly, uncomplicated and always strive to offer our guests something new - that is our aspiration.

Discover the special charm and the personal touch of our house.

We look forward to welcoming you soon with us!

Your host,

Christiana & Diogo

name: Oásis House
description:
Private and fully equipped house, located in a very quiet residential area. It is a very safe and pleasent place for families and kids. At a 10-minute walk from the house, it is possible to find restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries and patisseries. The beach is 15-minutes walk and 5-minutes by car.

If you are interested, it is possible to provide the upper floor of the house, allowing the accommodation of 3 to 4 people (1 bed and 3 sofa beds) and one extra bathroom.

The space
The house is composed by a hall, living a dining room, fully equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It also has a large private fenced garden. If you wish, you will have garden chairs to rest outdoors.

TV with multi-channel access and free Wi-fi.

Guest access
Guests have access to the lower floor of the house and to the garden.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located 1,5 km from the beach (15 min walk). Within walking distance, you can find supermarkets, bakeries, grocery stores, butcher, fishmonger and local restaurants

At 4 km (11 min walk by car), you will find Vila do Conde Fashion Outlet, where you can find renowned brands at the best prices (like Mickael Kors, Carolina Herrera, Ralph Lauren, Furla, among others) and metro stations.

name: Porto On Your Doorstep!
description:
This stylish one bedroom apartment is on the 5th floor.
The apartment is located in down town Porto guaranteeing fast access in a walking distance to anywhere in the old city, and to Metro, bus and train terminals.

The space
The central location means it's very easy to reach: the Metro will whisk you off from the airport directly to the front door in 25 minutes. It also puts most of Porto's major attractions just around the corner. Close by are: the main historical sites, Porto´s best restaurants, bars, coffee houses, traditional shopping areas and much, much more. In the immediate vicinity there are also small grocery stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, a post office and the city tourism office. In short, just about anything and everything you may need is at your doorstep.

Guest access

From this apartment you can see the city silhouette with all its roofs and several monuments like the Teatro de São João, Câmara Municipal do Oporto (City Hall) , Torre dos Clérigos and Mosteiro de São Bento da Vitória. The amazing D. Luis Bridge and Sé Catedral is just a few steps away, literally, with one of the most stunning views the city can give you. If you cross the bridge and catch the Teleférico de Gaia (chair lift) you can visit the many Caves de Vinho do Oporto located in Gaia. If you want to go to the beautiful Ribeira (River Douro) you can walk for 2 minutes or catch the Funicular dos Guindais (cable railway) which is 50 meters from the apartment. The São Bento Metro and Train Station is just 50/150m away, respectively, which is perfect wherever you come from and wan

name: PORTO TERRACE ❤️ 70m2 Apartment w/ lovely Balcony
description:
This fully equipped apartment, located in Espinho, seaside Porto Metropolitan Area, is a great choice to visit Porto Historic Centre (less than 1/2h by train or car), benefiting from beach lifestyle. No massified tourism, expensive prices to eat and to sleep and no noise from nightlife parties.

In Espinho you hardly need a car; just walk:
- 5 min to the main shopping spots
- less than 10 min to the train station and the beach.

Great choice also to explore other cities nearby.

The space
When the weather is nice, sunny breakfast at the terrace will surprise you...

The apartment is composed of:
- Bedroom (double bed + baby bed if requested)
- Living Room, suitable for up to 3 more people (sofa-bed for 2 and an extra bed for 1)
- Kitchen
- Bathroom
- Terrace (if you smoke, please do it here)

Contemporaneous decoration. Free WiFi and cable TV.

Guest access
The whole
neighborhood_overview:
The area is calm and safe. If you come by car it will not be an issue to find a parking place next to the apartment. (parking in the area is free). For example:
- A supermarket is less than 50m away,
- For breakfast or to buy fresh bread, you have 2 bakeries just next to the apartment: Pão Pepim and Aipal,
- Restaurants, laundry shop, hospital and other services are just a few metres away from the apartment.

About the city:

Espinho is one of the 17 towns composing Porto Metropolitan Area.

Due to its privileged location, standing by the sea coast and only 17 km south from Porto Historical Area, I would say it is probably the best place to stay in Porto Area.

It is a high-level tourist resort that welcomes thousands of national and foreign visitors throughout the year. Still, you don't notice the hassle of massified tourism in the town. There are two fundamental reasons for this: firstly, the fact that Portugal has one of the
host_about:
I love simple things of life, like enjoying a beautiful sunset by the beach, dinner with friends, traveling.

Airbnb gives me the opportunity to meet interesting people, each one with a different story, each one with someone new to teach me. I'm so lucky and grateful to have such a chance.

name: Porto_Loft
description:
i am a designer and i love to surf. i live in a recently restored house near the serralves contemporary art museum in Porto. The house is great, but a little big, only for me, in this life moment . Then i thought why not share, and meet nice people.

The space
Modern and cozy room. The house was 2 floors, the first have 2 rooms, bathroom and a wide entrance hall, the other is a open space loft (living/ dining-room with a kitchenette) with a nice fireplace. Also a wide terrace with a great view. (Private room the other house areas are shared)

Other things to note
You can visit Serralves contemporary art museum that was designed by architect Siza Vieira in a one of the nicest gardens that we have in Porto. (7 minutes walking from the house). And if you like you can go to Matosinhos Beach near the Porto city Park, surfing, jogging or enjoy the sunset in a great esplanades.(3km from the house)
neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood is quiet and friendly (residencial area), where children play in the street. Supermarket nearby.

name: Wine Apartments II - Ribeira 1BR by LovelyStay
description:
Immersed in historic central Porto, in the very central "Largo de São Domingos" at the end of "Rua das Flores", this apartment dating from the XIX century, is completely refurbished and adapted to current needs. Taking as its theme the wine, its contemporary décor and functional makes this apartment the perfect accommodation for your holidays.

*COVID VACCINATION CERTIFICATE REQUIRED*

The space
With a fantastic view and sun exposure, this bright and airy apartment has a bedroom with a double bed, a living room with a sofa bed and and a fully equipped kitchen. It also has a fantastic balcony facing the pedestrian square where you can enjoy and absorb the whole life of the city.
Free Wifi is available.
Towels and bed linen are provided for your stay.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire apartment and all its amenities, including all furnishings and utensils.

Other things to note
We are pas
neighborhood_overview: Located right in the heart of the Ribeira district, in "Largo de São Domingos" at the end of "Rua das Flores", gives guests the chance to experience and enjoy the most authentic and characteristic aspects of Porto. This central neighborhood, now extremely fashionable, is very well connected via public transport, which means that getting to any part of the city is really easy. On top of this, the apartment is just 2 minutes walking distance from Ferreira Borges Market, Palácio da Bolsa, Cathedral, Clérigos, Douro river, and walking across D. Luís Bridge you can visit the Wine Cellars of Porto. Eating and drinking is not a problem, because they are countless restaurants, wine bars, traditional grocery stores, where you surely fall in love for the food and wine of the Douro Valley.
host_about: Apaixonado pelo vinho e toda a sua cultura, gosto de viajar, conhecer novos costumes e novas pessoas e acima de tudo, bem receber!!

name: Ilda's Home - Garden
description:
Ilda's Home is an apartment with terrace and garden, ideal for groups and families in the city of Porto, close to Estádio do Dragão and with easy access to the city center. It is a very well-equipped family home and is located on the street of the Soares dos Reis Artistic School, with plenty of space to park the car at no cost.

The space
Ilda's Home - Jardim is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 6 people, with two bedrooms (one double room, the other with two single beds). The apartment has a bathroom with shower, living / dining room with a double sofa bed and an equipped kitchen, including an oven and a dishwasher.
The accommodation also has a washing machine, as well as an iron and ironing board. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Heaters and a fireplace provide heating for the apartment.
TV service and Wifi Internet available and free.
The accommodation
neighborhood_overview:
Bonfim is a central area of the city of Porto, being halfway between the historic center and the Antas area, where the Estádio do Dragão, home of the football club F.C.Porto is located.
Despite having varied commerce and restaurants, it is characterized as a strongly residential area at more affordable prices than the tourist center. Here you can enjoy a beautiful stay, with greater flexibility, either by quick access to other areas of the city by public transport or on foot, or by the possibility of parking on the street without parking meters near the Soares dos Reis School.
host_about:
Proudly from Porto, love our city, our people, our history :) Love to welcome and share the best tips I know from 30 years living here.
Passionate about languages, fluent in Portuguese, English, Spanish, Italian and able to understand some French. Lived already in Milan, London and San Francisco.
Having had ocasionally hosted some groups in a family house in the Northern Portuguese countryside in the early days, hosting in Porto wasn't something completely new for me. I started hosting one apartment by the end of 2017 and now I manage more than 20 apartments in Porto! Thrilled for having made this my full-time job! You can count on me and my team 24h/7days available to help you.
Looking forward to meet you! Welcome to Porto!

name: Ilda's Home - Balcony
description:
Ilda's Home is an apartment with a balcony, ideal for groups and families in the city of Porto, close to Estádio do Dragão and with easy access to the city center. It is a very well-equipped family home and is located on the street of the Soares dos Reis Artistic School, with plenty of space to park the car at no cost.

The space
Ilda's Home - Jardim is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 6 people, with two bedrooms (one double room, the other with two single beds). The apartment has a bathroom with shower, a living / dining room with an equipped kitchenette, including an oven and a dishwasher.
The accommodation also has a washing machine, as well as an iron and ironing board. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Heaters provide heating for the apartment.
TV service and Wifi Internet available and free.
The accommodation is located on the second floor, has a ba
neighborhood_overview:
Bonfim is a central area of the city of Porto, being halfway between the historic center and the Antas area, where the Estádio do Dragão, home of the football club F.C.Porto is located.
Despite having varied commerce and restaurants, it is characterized as a strongly residential area at more affordable prices than the tourist center. Here you can enjoy a beautiful stay, with greater flexibility, either by quick access to other areas of the city by public transport or on foot, or by the possibility of parking on the street without parking meters near the Soares dos Reis School.
host_about:
Proudly from Porto, love our city, our people, our history :) Love to welcome and share the best tips I know from 30 years living here.
Passionate about languages, fluent in Portuguese, English, Spanish, Italian and able to understand some French. Lived already in Milan, London and San Francisco.
Having had ocasionally hosted some groups in a family house in the Northern Portuguese countryside in the early days, hosting in Porto wasn't something completely new for me. I started hosting one apartment by the end of 2017 and now I manage more than 20 apartments in Porto! Thrilled for having made this my full-time job! You can count on me and my team 24h/7days available to help you.
Looking forward to meet you! Welcome to Porto!

name: Modern house & garden-Porto seaside
description:
Our house is situated at Oporto's seaside, in Leça da Palmeira, a beautiful and historic village. It's the perfect spot to rest and have a bbq after exploring Oporto, going for a swim or a beautiful hike by the coast. It comfortably accommodates 4.

The space
New modern, fully equipped house with a lovely, sunny garden at a 5-minute walk from the beach. It comfortably accommodates 4 people that can enjoy the cosy open living room, the great rain shower, a good bbq in the garden etc.

Guest access
The house has one bedroom with a double bed and has a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room. All essentials are at your disposal.
The kitchen has an oven, dishwasher, micro wave and has all the common pots and tools.
The garden has a cosy bench, table and a bbq set.

License number
14935/AL
neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in Leça da Palmeira, a beautiful and historic village by the ocean. This former fishermen’s village has a lot of activities to offer, from surfing on the wild waves to a delicious grilled fish meal in an authentic ‘churrascaria’. Strolling along the beach, swimming in Siza Vieira’s ocean pool, cycling on the seashore all the way to the center of Porto, running, city-tripping, tasting Port wine... You can experience it all!
host_about: Traveller - Vocal coach - Singing teacher

name: An unique place just for you.
description:
Reserve a Quinta de Santa Luzia só para si! Quinta com piscina, court de tennis, 5 quartos, sala de estar e de jantar e barbecue. Quinta em Santo Tirso, apenas a 30 minutos do Porto, com 20,233 m2, num local único pela sua beleza e autenticidade.

The space
Casa de campo inserida num local essencialmente rural e agrícola, numa freguesia notável pela sua beleza e com aspectos panorâmicos onde se pode passear no tempo, oferece ao visitante um ambiente privilegiado de repouso e privacidade onde a contemplação da natureza é obrigatória.
Diferencia-se pela procura de experiências únicas de bem estar, que partem da vivência com os animais e capacidade de descoberta do “apelo e celebração da terra” deste modo, estando a quinta dotada de horta e pomar biológicos poderão os seus visitantes participar na respectiva manutenção e tratamento, procedendo igualmente à recolha dos produtos que posteriormente serão consumidos durante a sua estadia.
* Para estadias mais c
neighborhood_overview: Quinta inserida num ambiente campestre, onde os visitantes podem relaxar e usufruir da paz do campo. A área envolvente e toda a atmosfera inspiram ao contacto com a natureza e propiciam uma enorme privacidade a quem visita esta quinta. Tem ainda como mais-valia a curta distância da malha urbana, encontrando-se ao mesmo tempo próximo do buliço da cidade e de todas as outras coisas que igualmente nos dão prazer.
host_about:
I love to contemplate nature and feel peace of mind, I like to dance and listen to music. I love to cook especially recreate and invent dishes from various countries of the world.
I am a defender of quality in friendship, fostering the good principles and humanization.
In the other hand, i despise dishonesty and lack of character.
