name: PENSÃO FAVORITA
description:
A Pensão Favorita situa-se no centro histórico do Porto, na rua Miguel Bombarda, onde a maioria das galerias de Arte estão localizadas e onde estas organizam uma abertura comum, com novas exposições, bimensalmente.
O hotel tem 12 quartos independentes, cafetaria com esplanada e jardim.
Na casa principal localizam-se: sete quartos, receção, sala-de-estar e cafetaria. No jardim localizam-se mais 5 quartos.

The space
A Pensão Favorita é uma Casa onde qualquer pessoa se pode sentir bem-vinda, graças a uma seleção detalhada de objetos e referências, onde se mistura o mobiliário moderno e peças vintage.
O espírito desta velha casa portuguesa, encontra uma segunda vida graças à aproximação contemporânea que propõe um estilo de vida fácil e confortável.

Guest access
As áreas comuns são: a sala de estar, a cafetaria, a esplanada e o jardim.

Other things to note
tem que subir 2 pisos de escadas
é um quarto
neighborhood_overview:
O bairro é conhecido por ter comércio de rua alternativo, está muito perto do centro histórico e do Palácio de Cristal.
A rua é calma, tem poucos restaurantes e não tem nenhum bar. No entanto, a 5 min a pé encontram muitas opções para passarem uma bela noite.
host_about: A Favorita está localizada no Porto, internacionalmente reconhecido pelo Vinho do Porto e pela sua gastronomia. No centro histórico, entre o Palácio de Cristal, onde podem encontrar uma casa de provas de vinho do Porto, e o museu de Arte Soares dos Reis. Na rua Miguel Bombarda, onde a maioria  das galerias estão localizadas e onde estas organizam uma abertura comum bimensalmente.

description:
Duplex Flat located in Porto's Center very close to Bolhão Market, Rua de Santa Catarina (a pedestrian street in the heart of the city), the famous Café Majestic and Capela das Almas with his beautiful tiles.

The space
- THE APARTMENT
Beautiful and cozy duplex apartment set in a nineteenth-century bourgeois home located in the center of Porto. The entrance is at ground level facing the street.
The entire apartment has WIFI coverage.

- DIVISIONS
The apartment has a kitchenette equipped with microwave, induction hob, fridge, coffee machine, toaster, kettle, and the utensils you need to enjoy your cuisine.
The living room has a sofa bed - which allows the house to have the capacity to accommodate up to 4 people - and cable TV.
The bedroom has 14m2 and inside has a "dressing room" with two large closets. Sheets are included.
The bathroom is complete, with a shower tray of 100x80cm. We provide bath and hand towels and an h
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is near Av. dos Aliados, "Mercado do Bolhão", Rua de Santa Catarina (a pedestrian street in the heart of the city where you can find a variety of restaurants and traditional stores and monuments like "Capela das Almas" with its beautiful mosaics and the famous "Café Majestic"...)
Ribeira is just 20 minutes away by walk.
Nearby there are 2 supermarkets and 2 shopping malls.

Hello everybody!

name: Baixa24 - City Center Private Sun Deck Apt Room 1
description:
Welcome to our amazing sun deck apartment that provides you the perfect setting for a Historic Porto getaway.
Well-located in the city center, between 100 meters away from one of the most iconic streets of Porto, 'Rua de Santa Catarina', this spacious and quiet flat has a beautiful terrace perfect for having an amazing breakfast, drinking a good bottle of wine or just enjoying the Portuguese sun.

The space
This double bedroom is located in a spacious flat on the 1st floor with no elevator, redecorated with very clear, urban and minimalist decor.

A quick description of what you will find:

• Sun deck
• Spacious flat (100m²)
• Large terrace (20m²)
• High ceiling
• Great sunlight exposure
• Free Wi-Fi
• Living room with sofa and cable TV
• Linens and towels provided
• Easy access from the airport
• Fully furnished kitchen
• Double bed size: 140x200cm

Guest access
• The
neighborhood_overview:
• A neighborhood with lots of shops, markets, cafes, and restaurants.
• Local grocery stores, bakeries, take-away, ATMs and supermarkets within walking distance.
• 5 min walk to Café Majestic, one of the most attractive cafés in the world.
• 10 min walk to the best 'francesinha' at Bufete Fase.

My name is Alex and I am a co-host with Mario!

Looking forward to provide the best experience for those who come to this wonderful city called Porto!

name: Sweet & Quiet Apartment Center wifi
description:
Hello, my name is Pedro and I have for you a very comfortable apartment in the city center of Porto. Next to the station more central Metro -Trindade. This beautiful apartment was prepared to enjoy the city of Porto with maximum comfort.

The space
A renovated and beautiful building, outside and inside, drew a super comfortable new apartment designed around maximum comfort for guests. Ideal for 2 people, but with a sofa bed in the living room that allows stay up to 4 people. All the amenities for a few relaxing days in the city center of Porto

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment. Next to the apartment there is a supermarket, a laundry, stationery, cafes and restaurants. There is also the Skybar Hotel D. Henrique, one of the best of Porto.

Other things to note
The apartment has a balcony, to smoke, drinking a bottle of wine and enjoy the moonlight. Cot is available for couples with babies.
neighborhood_overview: A typical neighborhood in downtown in the central location of Porto. Next to the Avenida dos Aliados and Trindade Metro Station, the most cosmopolitan city. In the vicinity there are all kinds of services, from good restaurants, supermarket, bakery and laundry.
host_about:
Olá, o meu nome é Pedro, tenho 38 anos, nasci, cresci, estudei e trabalho no Porto. Considero-me portanto um filho da cidade do Porto.
Penso que o Porto é uma cidade especial com um orgulho muito próprio e onde a principal característica dos seus habitantes é a frontalidade e honestidade.
"Muy nobre, sempre leal e Invicta" este é um lema da cidade que também caracteriza os seus habitantes.
Quero oferecer-lhe um óptimo serviço no Porto para além de um bom alojamento. Tenho para si um guia com os melhores locais a visitar, restaurantes, cafés e bares do Porto.  Penso que irá gostar muito dos meus apartamentos.

name: Fabulous Old World in Historic Center
description:
Right in the heart of the city with great access and in an area with all kinds of restaurants and services, Old Fabulous World keeps all the original Portuguese design in a protected building over 200 years old, where the Portuguese writer Joaquim Antunes Leitão was born in 1875. This apartment has been decorated in a very personal and welcoming way, and is also a second family residence.

The space
Old Fabulous World is an apartment with a maximum capacity for 4 people, with two bedrooms with a double bed. The apartment has a complete bathroom with shower and a service bathroom, a living / dining room with a kitchenette equipped with a stove and oven.
We have an iron and ironing board at your disposal inside your apartment. Bed linen, towels and shampoo are included in the stay.
We can provide a bed, bath and baby chair if requested.
Air conditioning system that also provides heating of the apartment in winter, as well as a pellet stove.
Wifi
neighborhood_overview: Old Fabulous World is located right in the historic center of Porto. Here you can visit some of the most important tourist spots in the city, such as the Torre dos Clérigos de Nasoni, the tiles of the Igreja do Carmo and the Livraria Lello, known for its connection to JK Rowling and its literary works Harry Potter. There is an intimate connection with the academic tradition of the city in this area of the garden and the Praça dos Leões, and it is even possible to attend different rituals and concentrations of students in their typical costumes or visit the rectory of the University of Porto. The area is also known for the numerous restaurants, bars and night clubs that give this city neighborhood a unique energy.
host_about:
Teresa and I have lived and travelled in many countries so we know how important it is to feel welcomed when arriving in a new place.  Teresa grew up in Tras-os-Montes in the north of Portugal and I am originally from San Francisco in the U.S.   Our professional backgrounds are in the field of education. Teresa owned and operated her own Montessori pre-school in Porto for 20 years and I taught at the local Universidade  Catolica Portuguesa. We lived in Asia for 5 years where Teresa learned the art of Chinese brush painting. You will see her paintings and other Asian touches in the decoration of our apartment..  I love taking my bicycle for a ride along the river or down the coast, stopping to eat freshly grilled fish at a local restaurant. I also like playing golf on the local courses around the Porto area.  And a great habit I picked up in Asia is the art of tea drinking – I love the ceremony around tea and can’t go a day without my Puer or Oolongs.  Teresa loves to paint and read in her spare time and has studied color therapy. 
We enjoy hosting and meeting people from all over the world.  So come and share a glass of Port wine with us and spend some time in our fantastic city!

name: The Getaway Van - POSEIDON
description:
We are a campervan rental service located in the North of Portugal. With our vans, travelers explore at their own pace, with the freedom of having no ties and the assurance of a great service. Our mission is to provide the adventure of a lifetime!

We´re based in Porto, which is well served with flights (many of them low cost) from major European destinations. It offers a great starting point to explore the country, and specially the North. You can also travel through Europe (unlimited miles).

The space
This is a practical and economical solution for your adventure holidays. It allows you to travel independently, with privacy and without pre-defined travelling packs. Whether you want to visit the countryside, the mountains, the city or the beach, it´s your choice.

Our campervans are Ford Transits with economical Diesel engines and, in paid highways, they will pay smaller fees than a regular auto-caravan.

The same vehicle that works
neighborhood_overview:
Experience the feeling of living in a house on wheels and visit Portugal from top to bottom. Stop wherever you want to, whenever you want, make your meals and sleep when and where you feel like. The choice is always yours! You can have your breakfast by the sea, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have dinner outside with a view over the city, and fall asleep under the starry sky. The choice is yours! You can be in contact with nature, in the company of friends, family and your pets. It is simple and uncomplicated. You don’t have to book hotels, there are no arrival schedules to limit you, no prepaid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use.
Start your journey and discover and enjoy the unique adventure that is Portugal!
host_about:
I've been a camper from the age of 6! I used to go camping with my parents on a scooter. Every summer, me and my family used to go travelling through Europe on a caravan. Recently I upgraded to a campervan as it is a more sustainable option and is easier to drive and park. I love the freedom it provides for a touring holiday or escaping into Nature and my mission is to share this experience with fellow travellers. 

Our campervans provide freedom on wheels. So guests can travel with no restrictions and no ties. With no need to book hotels, no arrival schedules to limit you, no pre-paid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use to explore or relax.

You can get closer to Nature. Fall asleep under the starry sky, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have breakfast by the sea. The perfect companion for outdoor activities surrounded by Nature. Pick up your gear and go explore!

We are locals with a passion for travel and gastronomy keen on giving advice and proud of their travel library! We can suggest travel itineraries. We are specially keen on the North of Portugal region as its varied landscapes, heritage and people make it a fabulous destination that all travellers love!

Looking forward to providing you with the adventure of a lifetime!

Graça Ferreira
Manager

name: Casa da Foz
description:
A casa situa-se na zona histórica da Foz do Douro no Porto. Foi restaurada em 10/2014 e dispõe de 2 quartos, sala,cozinha totalmente equipada,wc e um agradável espaço exterior. 2 bicicletas e capacetes. Na casa há informação sobre locais a visitar.

The space
2 quartos para 2 pessoas cada e uma sala com um confortável sofá-cama de casal. O wc tem um aquecedor e secador de cabelo. Na cozinha há uma mesa de jantar extensível para 10 pessoas. Totalmente equipada, com fogão,forno,microondas, máquinas de lavar roupa e louça, frigorífico etc. Tudo o que é necessário para uma refeição. O espaço exterior foi pensado para desfrutar de uma bebida, uma refeição ao ar livre ou simplesmente relaxar.

Guest access
A casa é independente.
Têm acesso a tudo

Other things to note
Ambiente familiar

License number
20333/AL
neighborhood_overview:
É uma zona muito calma e sossegada.
Existe uma ciclovia com 5 KM paralela ao mar.
A casa localiza-se a 500 metros da praia ótimo para passeios na orla marítima. Zona piscatória podendo observar o regresso dos barcos da faina.
host_about:
Olá, o meu nome é Sónia! Nasci, cresci e vivi no Porto. Gosto muito de ouvir música, ler e de cinema...fazer caminhadas e conhecer pessoas. Restaurei estas casas na zona histórica da Foz para dar a oportunidade a outras pessoas de conhecerem a bela cidade do Porto. 
Terei muito prazer em vos receber na " CASA DA FOZ ", no " APARTAMENTO DA FOZ" e na "DREAM HOME".
A "CASA DO OUTEIRO" é ideal para quem gosta da natureza e da tranquilidade do campo... acordar com o canto dos passarinhos...

name: Apartamento em casa de charme - Porto 181
description:
Apartamento integrado numa casa do século XVIII situada no centro da cidade, numa zona onde pode encontrar restaurantes de gastronomia típica portuguesa e comércio tradicional.
Perto dos centros de diversão noturna apesar de se encontrar num local tranquilo.
Possibilidade de visitar a pé os principais monumentos e locais de interesse cultural (Catedral, Igreja de Santa Clara, Igreja de S. Francisco, Ponte D. Luís I, Biblioteca Municipal do Porto, Livraria Lello, Torre dos Clérigos, etc).

The space
Casa tradicional portuguesa que está na nossa família há mais de 200 anos.
Trata-se de uma construção sóbria e austera típica das casa da Região do Alto Douro.
É a única do conjunto de três casas iguais que existiam naquele local. Revela o modo de vida e cultura das gentes do Norte de Portugal.
Nesta casa cresci e aprendi com a minha família o gosto de bem receber quem visita a nossa cidade do Porto.

Guest access
Apartame
neighborhood_overview: Zona tranquila no centro da cidade, onde todos os vizinhos se conhecem.
host_about:
Tenho vários anos de vida comercial com diversas responsabilidades em diferentes empresas multinacionais.
Ultimamente tenho  recebido algumas famílias e faço gosto em mostrar o que de melhor existe na nossa região, Norte Litoral, nomeadamente a sua cultura e gastronomia.

name: Vila Guiomar - Casa da Eira
description:
A Vila Guiomar é uma quinta de recreio de 7ha, toda murada, com características de Arte Nova.
A Casa da Eira é uma das casas rurais da quinta. Possui 7 quartos duplos, com casa de banho privativa, 5 com cama de casal e 2 com duas camas.
Um salão com lareira, TV por cabo e varanda panorâmica sobre o vale.
Uma pequena sala de estar com TV por cabo. Sala de refeições.
Sala de jogos com mesa de ping-pong.
Aquecimento central, wifi gratuito.

The space
A Casa da Eira inserida numa quinta toda murada está isolada do ruído do trânsito embora se localize no centro da povoação. Pode acomodar confortavelmente 14 pessoas. Situa-se a 5Km do Rio Paiva o que permite aos hóspedes usufruir das suas praias fluviais, pesca, prática de desportos radicais e acesso fácil aos passadiços do Paiva

Guest access
Na Casa da Eira os hóspedes têm acesso ao salão, terraço, sala de refeições, pequena sala de estar e sala de jogos.
Na quinta
neighborhood_overview:
Em Alvarenga e resto do concelho de Arouca os hóspedes podem realizar vários passeios pedestres na montanha, frequentar as praias fluviais junto do Rio Paiva e praticar alguns desportos radicais, como o rafting, Rapell, canoying etc.
Além disso podem apreciar a gastronomia local cuja especialidade principal são os bifes e carne assada de Vitela.

Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira neighbourhood

The space
Located in the heart of the historical centre of Oporto, these charming apartments are on the water front of Ribeira area, the most typical neighborhood of Oporto.
The apartments have a magnificent and exclusive view of Douro River, the monumental D. Luis Bridge and the numerous wine cellars that line the river in Gaia side. At the same time you stay near the attractions and historical monuments of the city and just 20 minutes away from Sá Carneiro Airport and 5 minutes away from the train and subway station of São Bento.
The apartments and its building are dated from the XVIII century and are classified by UNESCO as part of the World Heritage Site. Totally remodeled and decorated in a contemp
host_about:
Oporto Home Boutique Apartments are a touristic apartments chain developed by portuguese entrepreneurs that have more than 10 years of existence.  We believe that the more globalised and standardised the world becomes, the more people want to experience something authentic when they travel. Whether our guests are stopping off for a few hours or a few days, for work or for pleasure, we want to pass them the feeling and soul of a genuine Porto. We strive daily to make our guests feel welcomed, comfortable, locals, at home. 
Welcome to your Oporto Home Boutique Apartments - make yourself at Home.

name: My Own Private Studio
description:
Open the shutters and let in copious natural light from the triple window in the bright living room space of this studio loft apartment. Wander across the original 19th-century wooden floor, admire the quirky artwork, and relax on the chaise lounge.

License number
20267/AL
neighborhood_overview: The studio apartment is located on Largo dos Lóios public square near great coffee shops, restaurants, bars, and shops. The historic centre is great for walking and sightseeing, and it's convenient to Aliados, Clérigos, and Ribeira.
host_about:
Born and raised in Porto, I love this city! Being an Airbnb Superhost and have been a tour guide at the Port Wine Cellars, I'm able to share Porto with the world!

The best part of being a Graphic Designer is being able to see something that starts as just an idea or a sketch and turning that into a full functional, living and breathing Identity!
I have a passion for interior design and architecture: analyzing the light coming through and how it affects the overall Mood Inside, how space can make you Feel, how materials, textures and colors can come together as One and how different personalities shine through, making each space unique, Your Own, and therefore Original!

I'll welcome you and share my Porto Digital Map with all my favorite spots in the city like traditional and modern restaurants, shops, cafés, bars and more! :)

name: Casa de Belomonte (Unesco area)
description:
Charming sunny loft at the heart of Porto UNESCO world heritage area Renovated 373 years building, in a street full of history. Perfect location to visit by foot all the historical centre, just 10m by foot from S. Bento central train/metro station. It has a 123 m2 joyful living room, with plenty of light entering all day, creating an unique atmosphere. 2 balconies offer you a magnificent view to Oporto Wine cellars, churches and little old town streets that seem lost in mediaeval times.

The space
Charming renovated apartment, with a very original wooden ceiling and floor. Located in a 373 years old building, in a neighborhood full of history. It has a 123 m2 joyful living room, with plenty of light entering all day, creating an unique atmosphere. 2 balconies offer you a magnificent view to Oporto Wine cellars, churches and little old town streets that seem lost in mediaeval times. Right at the heart of the old town, we couldn't imagine better location, with Clér
neighborhood_overview: It's autenticy, the old renovated buildings, mixed with decadent houses. The people! The fact everyone still calls you "menina" (little girl) instead of "senhora" (lady), even if you're 50 years old. The good regional food with very reasonable prices. The great belvederes. The fact that living here you don't need to depend on public transports or cars. The joy of the streets. The proximity with the river... and so much more...

name: The Getaway Van - SUNSHINE
description:
We are a campervan rental service located in the North of Portugal. With our vans, travelers explore at their own pace, with the freedom of having no ties and the assurance of a great service. Our mission is to provide the adventure of a lifetime!

We´re based in Porto, which is well served with flights (many of them low cost) from major European destinations. It offers a great starting point to explore the country, and specially the North. You can also travel through Europe (unlimited miles).

The space
This is a practical and economical solution for your adventure holidays. It allows you to travel independently, with privacy and without pre-defined travelling packs. Whether you want to visit the countryside, the mountains, the city or the beach, it´s your choice.

Our campervans are Ford Transits with economical Diesel engines and, in paid highways, they will pay smaller fees than a regular auto-caravan.

The same vehicle that works
neighborhood_overview:
Experience the feeling of living in a house on wheels and visit Portugal from top to bottom. Stop wherever you want to, whenever you want, make your meals and sleep when and where you feel like. The choice is always yours! You can have your breakfast by the sea, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have dinner outside with a view over the city, and fall asleep under the starry sky. The choice is yours! You can be in contact with nature, in the company of friends, family and your pets. It is simple and uncomplicated. You don’t have to book hotels, there are no arrival schedules to limit you, no prepaid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use.
Start your journey and discover and enjoy the unique adventure that is Portugal!
host_about:
I've been a camper from the age of 6! I used to go camping with my parents on a scooter. Every summer, me and my family used to go travelling through Europe on a caravan. Recently I upgraded to a campervan as it is a more sustainable option and is easier to drive and park. I love the freedom it provides for a touring holiday or escaping into Nature and my mission is to share this experience with fellow travellers. 

Our campervans provide freedom on wheels. So guests can travel with no restrictions and no ties. With no need to book hotels, no arrival schedules to limit you, no pre-paid programs to follow. It is about total freedom of choice and use to explore or relax.

You can get closer to Nature. Fall asleep under the starry sky, wake up in the middle of the mountains, have breakfast by the sea. The perfect companion for outdoor activities surrounded by Nature. Pick up your gear and go explore!

We are locals with a passion for travel and gastronomy keen on giving advice and proud of their travel library! We can suggest travel itineraries. We are specially keen on the North of Portugal region as its varied landscapes, heritage and people make it a fabulous destination that all travellers love!

Looking forward to providing you with the adventure of a lifetime!

Graça Ferreira
Manager

name: Eiffel Riverside Garden
description:
Located in the heart of Porto historic centre, with a breathtaking view over the Douro River and a beautiful backyard garden, our apartment offers the perfect conditions to discover the history and charm of this wonderful city.

The space
Located in the heart of Porto historic centre, with a breathtaking view over the Douro River and a beautiful backyard garden, our apartment offers the perfect conditions to discover the history and charm of this wonderful city.

The building from the late 19th century is situated in Ribeira, declared in 1996 UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The bedroom/living room with balcony offers a direct view over the river, the bridges and the wine cellars.

FEATURES - 2 BEDROOMS - 6 PEOPLE

The two bedroom apartment is located on the 5th floor of the building with a a garden in the backyard and a beautiful balcony, with the following characteristics :

• Two bedrooms, one with a double bed and
neighborhood_overview:
Surrounded by the genuine spirit of "portuense" people, you're most likely to find generosity, warmth and joy around you.

In less than 4 minutes walking you’ll be on the main part of Ribeira and you'll have restaurants, bars and cafés, an ideal location to chill by the river and enjoy the sunset. Here you may embark on river cruises, discover our typical narrow streets and historic sites and find tourist information, local products and souvenirs.

name: Porto Downtown Studio w/ free wifi
description:
Right in the heart of the city, within Porto's World Heritage area and near S. Bento station, this cosy flat with free wifi is ideal for couples wanting to discover Porto historic centre, downtown and the riverside at a comfortable walking distance.

The space
OPO TRINTAeUM is a fully equipped studio, located in a recently refurbished historic building right in the heart of Porto.
Since it has been newly renovated, all the apartment is very comfortable, practical and modern. Its big kitchen has all the regular electrical appliances (stove, microwave, laundry and dish washer) and it also includes a nespresso coffee machine, a kettle and a table for two. It is perfect for a quick breakfast but also for long and more elaborated meals, prepared with local products that can easily be found in the nearby delis and traditional grocery stores.
The main room has been separated into two different areas: the living-room, with a nice sofa, a cosy armchair, table for
neighborhood_overview:
All the important monuments, squares and picturesque places of the city can be found within walking distance: Lello Bookstore, Clérigos tower, Bolhão traditional market, Rua das Flores, Rua Sta. Catarina, Capela das Almas, and Porto typical narrow streets.
The riverside, Ribeira, one of the most beautiful and colorful areas of the city, is only 5 min away. From there you can cross the Luís Bridge to Gaia, where you'll have the best view of Porto. Also, that's where all Port Wine cellars (which do tours and wine tastings) are based.
Only 15 min away from the apartment you can also find the trendiest night spot, with all sorts of bars and restaurants.

name: Oporto Cozy Bungalow
description:
Enjoy the peace and the local culture of the countryside so close to a big centre of OPorto city! The time is all yours!

The space
The bungalow / shelter itself is situated inside a little urban farm 100% sealed and safe, and it has a double bed (we can add one single bed), a bathroom equipped with toillet sink and hot shower.
If you are in a camping mood, there is also space to place 2 tents and barbecue facilities.
You can also enjoy the placidity of the small farm in the company of our permanent guests.. the dog, the horse, the ducks and other surprises!

Guest access
There is a private parking inside the farm, with a limit up to 10 vehicles, including 4x4, trails, motorbikes, campervans.
We have also two bicycles available.

Other things to note
-Pets allowed
-Suitable for small groups of travelers and adventurers

9664/AL
neighborhood_overview: Within your stay, you can enjoy the neat air from the country and a relaxing ecological walk, alongside the “Paleozoic Route”.  Following this path, you will end up in the middle-aged village named “Couce” and you can experience a real time flashback, when you see the extremely well conserved house structures, still with inhabitants! Meanwhile, you can travel over the Roman’s empire legacy, who intensively exploited this Gold  enriched soil. The mines still remain as a tourist open landmark, being possible to visit them in a safe, guided tour.

name: Domum | Turistic Apart. T0 - P1
description:
Domum's building is located in the heart of Porto city. The intervention that suffered aimed to retain key identity elements of the original construction, associating others, current, allowing to establish an dichotomy between the new and the old.

The space
This apartment does not have a room division, it´s located on the first floor. Wooden floor was applied throughout the apartment providing its full soundproofing, in order to provide a more comfortable and cosy stay.

Guest access

The kitchen is fully equipped with stove, dishwasher, fridge, oven, microwave, kettle and a Nespresso coffee machine.
The bathroom blends the use of traditional materials with a contemporary langua
neighborhood_overview: Its location is privileged, since it is near some of the emblematic places of this beautiful city: for example, the Carmo Church, the Clerigos Church, the Aliados Avenue, the Casa da Musica or the Cathedral of Porto.
host_about:
domum, latin word meaning “go to someone’s house” or “invite to come to your house”. Its meaning was the motto that gave origin to the concept of domum apartments.
Its definition is based on the act of receiving and welcoming people in the country and in the city, which is ours, providing a stay in an intimate and familiar environment, in places that stand out for their refuge and gathering in an urban environment.
 
So, the idea of family is intrinsically present in this concept, translated into the customization of all interior spaces of each apartment, as well as the care given to the choice of each element that composes it, giving them an enormous originality, uniqueness and identity.
The main objective of the implementation of this concept in several buildings is to make our guests feel at home, and therefore at your disposal numerous amenities thought with every detail.

As of 1 March 2018
What is the tourist tax for?
To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city.
Who is required to pay the tourist tax?
Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the
tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight
nights per person and per stay.
Who is exempt from paying the
tourist tax?
a) People travelling for medical treatment, and continue therapy
in medical facilities. Family members and/or companions

Por estar localizado ao norte de Portugal, o Porto é uma cidade um pouco mais fria do que Lisboa durante o inverno, mas, em geral, nada absurdo. Durante essa época os dias são mais curtos, anoitecendo por volta das 17:30h ou 18h, mas já em abril os dias começam a se alongar bem, com a presença de sol até umas 20h. Uma beleza!<

neighborhood_overview:
Get the best of your Porto stay in this brand new and refurbished apartment Within Porto UNESCO City Heritage limits!

This charming apartment is located within Sé neighborhood. You will be in the heart of a real lively neighborhood offering the best of the Porto life: Praça da Batalha, Sé Catedral, Cinema da Batalha, coffees, National Theatre, daily market with fresh products, Mercado do Bolhão, bakeries, stores, speciality ice-cream store, etc). All at walking distance! The most famous attractions are a few-minute walk away: National Theatre são João, Sé Cathedral, the funicular that takes you to Ribeira and the Port wine cellars, are just around the corner; from Praça da Batalha, also around the corner, enjoy the main commercial street with numerous local and international stores, spend time at Majestic Café (the 1920s artsy art deco café); Torre dos Clérigos, Praça dos Aliados, Mercado do Bolhão, Rivoli Municipal Theatre are less than a 10-minute walk. Other attractions,
host_about:
A Portuguese registered architect, from Porto, Portugal.
I love travelling around the world and I have lived in several places: Los Angeles, New York, Delft , Rotterdam, London, Montreal, among other short stays in many countries and cities. When I travel, I try to be a true local most of times, to get a grip of the dynamics of the place and the people that make that place.
I work in the fields of architecture and in theatre and the performing arts, devoting part of my time  to creative culinary arts. My five can't-live-without-things are: food, people, beauty, travel and art in-all-its-forms!
Welcome to Porto!

name: ALMADA - Cozy Apt. for 2|3 guests
description:
With a remarkable location in the tradicional Almada Street and at 250 meters from Trindade Metro Station with direct connection to the Airport, this warm and confortable apartment with 45ms is perfect for you discover the historic center of Porto.

The space
Absolutely perfect for 2|3 Guests. - This recently renovated 45m2 apartment is in a quiet street at the historic center of Porto.
The location is privileged, you will discover the historic center of Porto, by foot or, if want, you can use the metro Trindade Station, just 5 minutes walk. It is also ideal if you want to visit another Portuguese cities, like Guimarães or Braga, since you are very close to Sao Bento train Station.
The apartment is brand new and has been lovingly and tastefully decorated and furnished to give you a pleasant stay .

The apartment has : - A Queen Bed (160 /210), kitchen with all appliances, including: fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster and a full list of kitche
neighborhood_overview:
Almada – Apartments is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking.

The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries.

Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown.

Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated.

There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.

neighborhood_overview:
Almada – Apartments is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking.

The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries.

Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown.

Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated.

There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.

name: Roof terrace apartment in Porto's city centre
description:
License number 342/AL
This is a beautiful 4th floor apartment divided over two floors with plenty of space. Located at the bottom of Rua do Almada it's right in the centre of town and it's within walking distance from everything. Magnificent views of Clérigos tower from the roof terrace on the 5th floor, where you can enjoy a moment of peace right in the heart of town. There is no lift, only stair access.

The space
A spacious and welcoming home from home occupying the top two floors of a beautifully restored 19th century townhouse situated in the heart of Porto's historic old town. With excellent views from the private roof terrace across the jumbled rooftops of the Unesco World Heritage site, this recently renovated and completely modernised apartment provides a fantastic base for anyone wishing to explore the stunning city of Porto and it's surrounding area. The climb up can be a little bit of a challenge as there is no elevator, but once up there the view
neighborhood_overview: Cafe's, bars, restaurants, ATM's and small supermarkets are all within a two minute walk and there is even a lovely cafe downstairs on the ground floor of the building filling the stairwell with the delicious but dangerous smell of freshly baked cakes and pastries every morning! You've been warned! Food and cooking is one of my passions and I'll be delighted to recommend some fantastic places to eat in Porto whatever your budget or dietary requirements. For those who like to stay up late and experience Porto's thriving nightlife, the main bar and club area is conveniently located close, but not too close to the building making getting home after an evening of music and dancing easy and hassle free. Over the last few years Porto's social, cultural and culinary sides have gone through something of a renaissance and it seems like a new bar, club or restaurant opens up in the city centre almost every weekend! For this reason I'll save my own personal recommendations on where to eat, drink
host_about: Hello there! Thank you for stopping by :) We're all family and are thrilled to welcome you to our beloved city, which we hope you'll find as beautiful and inspiring as we do. Paula is a kindergarden teacher, passionate about foraging for anything that has classroom potential (which, in nature, is pretty much anything from branches to acorns). Raquel is a retired school teacher, with a passion for massage therapy and healing others (if you need a back rub, you'll know who to ask!). Martha is a filmmaker, passionate about surfing, walking her dog and eco living (and eating mostly!) Hope you enjoy meeting us and we hope to make you feel at home :)

host_about:
I m a happy person and I love to spend time with my family, friends and new people of other countries. Metting new people is metting new countries. 

Oporto is my city and I love my city. The city of Oporto is very rich in history, monuments, wine and food.
I love the food from Oporto and Portugal. Tradicional food like "tripas à moda do Porto" or "cozido à Portuguesa" or "bacalhau" in every aways... And of course the great portugueses desserts.









Adoro ser feliz. Gosto de viajar mais e mais e mais.
Adoro arte. 
Adoro a minha cidade. A maravilhosa Cidade do Porto! 
A minha família e os meus amigos são as "coisas" mais importantes da minha vida, incluindo o meu Chico      (cão) e o meu Óscar (gato). 
Adoro dançar.
Adoro a comida portuguesa. As Tripas à moda do Porto, Cozido à portuguesa, Bacalhau de todas as maneiras... E as sobremesas.

As of 1 March 2018

To consolidate Porto as an attractive and sustainable city.
Who is required to pay the tourist tax?
Anyone older than 13 years, staying a night in Porto, pays the
tax per night, per person for a maximum of seven straight
nights per person and per stay.
Who is exempt from paying the
tourist tax?
a) People travelling for medical treatment, and continue therapy
in medical facilities. Family members and/or companions are
exempt also. Documentary evidence of medical and care
service has to be provided (or equival

name: LV Premier Clerigos RE1- AC, elevator, river view
description:
The LV Premier Clérigos Apartments RE1 is a penthouse 4-bedroom apartment, with 2 full bathrooms, and unsurpassed views of city and river. Fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning. Heating. Luxurious bedding. Balconies and frontal views of Douro river, the Porto Wine Cellars and sunset in the ocean in the distance. Very central in Clerigos neighborhood, with lots of bars, restaurants and shops nearby. Clean and sanitized.

The space
The LV Premier Clérigos Apartments RE1 features a large balcony in the living room and smaller balconies in 3 bedrooms- frontal views of Douro river, the Porto Wine Cellars and sunset in the ocean in the distance. The apartment is located in a building with 2 elevators, with good accessibility (3 small steps from lobby to the street). The vacation rental LV Premier Clérigos RE1 is equipped wiht AC, heating, all major appliances and a fully equipped kitchen. Minutes away from Clérigos and Galerias de Paris, we are ideally loc
neighborhood_overview:
Try and go for a jog by the river Douro margin simply by heading right as you exit the building.

Inquire about adapters for US and UK appliances.


Close proximity of key historic sights in Porto will enable you to discover the city on foot- Clerigos tower 4min; Galerias de Paris 5min; Aliados Av- 7 min; Theater district 8-10 min, Ribeira -10 min, Gaia and the Porto wine caves crossing the bridge a leisurely 15-20 min walk. The pedestrian shopping district of Santa Catarina is less than 15 min away on foot, and the art district around Miguel Bombarda streets are 7-10 min away. Try to vist the nearby Foz, at the mouth of the Douro for a relaxing afternoon overlooking the sea. A bit further ahead sample fresh and delicious seafood in the picturesque village of Matosinhos.

name: Spacious top floor apartment in the heart of Porto
description:
Very spacious apartment- 151.29 sq meters- 2 bedroom 2 bath with large living area apartment located in the UNESCO heritage site.

Be steps away of tourist attractions (Clérigos, S Bento Station, City Hall, D Luis Bridge, R: das Flores etc), shops and restaurants while staying at this top floor (service by two elevators) apartment with high ceilings located right at the center of Porto. Enjoy the living area with views of Clérigos and Se and wake up to the views of S. Bento Station towers.

The space
This is a very spacious 2 bedroom 2 bath top floor apartment served by two elevators with views of Clerigos tower, Sé and S Bento train station located right in the heart of the city of Porto. This site is part of the UNESCO World Heritage.

What makes it so unique is the fact that these buildings were remodeled maintaining all the traditional facades and details (as it is World Heritage Site) while the interiors were updated and modern amen
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located right at the center of Porto- in the UNESCO heritage site.

You have easy access to all of the top tourist attractions (city hall, S Bento train station, clerigos tower, many churches including Sé Cathedral, livraria Lello, local life and the newly developed area near the waterfront.

It is right next to the pedestrian comercial Rua das Flores and not too far from Galerias Paris, Rua de Santa Catarina Rua dos Clerigos (other pedestrians only streets).

You can walk down to the riverside or up to the Torre dos Clérigos, or you can take the Metro or train being that the stations are steps away from our place.
host_about:
We are a fun loving couple that calls San Francisco home.

Sofia was born and raised in Porto and before a quick stop in France she moved to San Francisco. She visits frequently her hometown as all her family lives there and keeps up with all the new things to see or do there to the point their local friends ask her for suggestions!


Matthew was born and raised in Washington DC but he has been calling the Bay Area home for a while. He loves Porto and is always surprised by how much it changed the past couple of years.

Sofia worked for a while in business development for the Portuguese government in the west coast of the US  and during those years she got to know Portugal (top to bottom) even better. Should you need any tips she will happily help!

When we visit Porto we love to walk around get lost on the streets of the city. In every trip we get to see and do things we haven’t done before. We enjoy urban hikes, delicious food (you can find us either at a fancy restaurant or a hole in the wall) and just getting to know more about the people and the place we travel to.

Our daughters LOVE Porto. You will see that kids get a lot of attention (and an occasional treat) in Porto and that plus the wonderful summer weather, beaches, playgrounds and parks, etc make for a very fun stay!

description:
The flat has been inaugurated in 2015, it is located at the heart of the historic city center. Perfect for those who intend to visit the city on foot.
1min from the main tourist attractions Aliados Avenue, Porto City Hall and Bolhão Market.
Very close to the metro stations Bolhão/Aliados/Trindade (direct connection from the airport) and to the train stations.

The space
Please read full description.

Configuration of the flat (max 7 people):

- 1 bedroom with 1 double bed (140x200cm) for 2 people and 1 single bed (90x200cm) for 1 person
- 1 bedroom with 1 double bed (140x200cm) for 2 people
- 1 sofa bed for 2 people
- 1 living room with kitchenette
- 1 bathroom complete

High
neighborhood_overview:
At the heart of the city, Downtown Porto Soul stands for quality, modernity and good taste.
The location is great, it can't be any better.
In the center of all the tourist attractions of the city:
Aliados Avenue, Bolhao Market, Clerigos Tower, Lello Bookstore, São Bento train station, Sé Cathedral, Rua Galeria Paris, Rua Santa Catarina, D. Luiz Bridge, Ribeira, Porto Wine Cellars, etc.

In this part of the town there are typical Portuguese food restaurants, museums, churches, traditional commerce, shopping centers, grocery stores, ATMs or cafes.
Ideal if you want a very central but quiet and peaceful location in a completely renovated and modern flat.
host_about:
Proud of my city. I am a passionate about the world. I love to travel and to meet new people, experiencing other cultures and their foods and visiting as much as I can when I travel.
I have already studied in Finland and currently I am finishing my master in Industrial Engineering and Management.
I hope I can please all my guests and make them feel at home, that is the reason why I try to provide the maximum quality and comfort with my house.

neighborhood_overview:
Porto won in 2017 the prestigious title of Best European Destination, for the third time.
We are trying not to play favourites, but Porto is the best for a number of reasons. Just to name a few, The Ribeira - the riverside by river Douro, the Port Wine cellars, São Bento Train Station, its gastronomy.
Also its World Heritage Historic City Centre. Porto is an ancient city, almost 900 years old and it has many aging buildings, but the city is undergoing great restoration works and many historic buildings have been brought to life as business centres, cinemas, health centres.

Miramar is a small seaside village, in Vila Nova de Gaia, in the subregion of Greater Porto. It is an upmarket residential area south of the river Douro, most known for its beach and the small chapel called Senhor da Pedra (Lord of the Rock).
Along the beach there are several cafes with terrace and lovely walkways.
host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host_about:
Ever since my daughter left home to go study abroad, five years ago, I have enjoyed hosting people at my house.
I would like to help you get to know my country and specially my city, Porto.
In my spare time I love riding, eating good food, reading, going to the gym, watching movies, and hanging out with friends.
Welcome!

name: Estúdio aconchegante na aldeia
description:
A Casa do Paúl disponibiliza um aconchegante estúdio, resultante de um antigo palheiro recuperado. Localizado numa típica aldeia portuguesa, totalmente equipado, é ideal para casais que apreciam natureza, conforto e tranquilidade.

The space
A Casa do Paúl resultou da recuperação de uma casa antiga, tendo por base a aplicação dos princípios de construção sustentável, nomeadamente através da utilização de materiais locais que contribuíssem para uma maior eficiência energética, associada ao conforto ambiental. Pretendeu-se igualmente que a intervenção no imóvel degradado preservasse a memória do antigo, mantendo as paredes exteriores em xisto.
O estúdio é dotado com o equipamento indispensável para uma estadia com comodidade, ideal para o acolhimento de turistas interessados nas potencialidades naturais da região, em particular do seu rio.

Guest access
Os hóspedes têm acesso a todo o espaço.

Other things to note
Co
neighborhood_overview:
A Casa do Paúl fica localizada junto à margem do rio Paiva, rio com características únicas para a prática de rafting, kayaking e canyoning.
Os trilhos existentes e a floresta envolvente oferecem numerosas possibilidades para explorar, para além da vila de Arouca, com um valioso património cultural, geológico, gastronómico.
host_about: Terei muito prazer em recebê-los na Casa do Paúl no interior de Portugal ou na Casa do Marinho, junto à fantástica praia de Afife!

neighborhood_overview: Very quiet residential area in the heart of the city .
host_about:
Lema de vida? Ser feliz e viver o máximo de tempo com o máximo de qualidade!
Coisas sem as quais não poderia passar: O ar que respiro (de preferência, no campo, onde é mais puro), a saúde, o sossego e a amizade incondicional da família e dos amigos.
Os destinos de viagem favoritos são, sem dúvida, locais por onde as civilizações egípcia, romana e árabe deixaram o seu rasto. Sem esquecer a África subsariana....
Os livros preferidos são os romances históricos e quanto  aos filmes, os de ficção científica e de desenho animado. Quanto à música, gosto de tanta que vai desde Bach e Chopin até AC/DC, passando por Sisters of Mercy, UB40, Sprinsteen, David Bowie, Leonard Cohen, Sinatra, Queen e tantos outros.... O que hei-de dizer? Ando sempre com música na cabeça e sem "headphones"!
Comida, é mais frango e ovos...
Ser anfitriã na Airbnb é uma experiência nova. Penso que gostarei de o ser pois gosto de comunicar com pessoas diferentes. A ver vamos... :)

name: Cosy Room on the beach - Espinho
description:
Excelente quarto privado numa bonita moradia histórica totalmente recuperada e remodelada que está situada no centro da cidade de Espinho, mesmo aqui ao lado da praia, da zona comercial, do casino, de restaurantes e da estação de comboios, bus e táxis. A 20 minutos do Porto e de Aveiro. Tudo o que é necessário para passar uns bons dias de férias!

The space
Situado no 1º piso, o quarto é bastante espaçoso e muito confortável, conta com cama de casal ; varanda; tv e internet wi-fi; WC (partilhado).
A casa tem uma decoração harmoniosa, combinando o clássico e o contemporâneo, com vários pormenores de nota musical!

Guest access
Distâncias a pé:

2 min: Praia, Restaurantes, Mercados, Padaria, Casino.

3 min: Lojas, Estação de Comboios.

5 min: Multimeios, Planetário, Cinema, Biblioteca e Parque da Cidade.

15 min: Campo de Golfe, Ténis, Centro Equestre e Aeródromo.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: Diversão em Espinho é o que não falta, depois de um belo dia de praia, com a prática de surf ou skydiving, pode jantar num dos excelentes restaurantes afamados por causa do peixe pescado no próprio dia, dado que, na zona, situa-se um porto costeiro de pesca, e depois beber um copo nos bares e esplanadas espalhados pela cidade, de seguida, divertir-se no casino, que conta com uma agenda de espectáculos e concertos muito preechida durante todo o ano. Se gosta de andar a cavalo, porque não, ir ao centro equestre, depois, mesmo ali ao lado, pode fazer um baptismo de voo no aeródromo de Espinho (as vistas lá de cima são espectaculares)! Com os pés bem assentes na terra, sabe bem passear no centro comercial ao ar livre e na marginal à beira mar, andar de bicicleta, jogar nos excelentes campos de golfe e de ténis, ver exposições e cinema no centro Multimeios, visitar o planetário e a biblioteca, etc... além de outras muitas experiências e actividades nesta cidade. Até já!
host_about: Sou tranquilo e assertivo, gosto de receber e conhecer pessoas interessantes! Adoro viajar, praia, surf, boa comida, boa música, coleciono discos em vinyl e não dispenso uma boa conversa com os amigos!

A few minutes from the main tourist points of the city, as well as from the area where the cafes, bars and entertainment venues are.

host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

Well-located in the city center, between 100 meters away from one of the most iconic streets of Porto, 'Rua de Santa Catarina', this spacious and quiet flat has a beautiful terrace perfect for having an amazing breakfast, drinking a good bottle of wine or just enjoying the Portuguese sun.

It may accommodate up to 9 guests and it is an ideal solution for families or a group of friends looking to spend a comfortable stay in the best location in town.

description:
Espaço confortável e lindo com um terraço à frente do mar com vistas lindas onde terá um maravilhoso pôr-do-sol . Com transportes à porta que facilmente o levará a uma das cidades mais lindas do mundo. Pode passar o dia na praia, jantar num restaurante a ver o mar ou então passar o dia no Porto , cidade linda que tem tanto para oferecer ...

The space
O nosso espaço é único...
quase não tenho palavras...
É confortável, espaçoso,em que cada cantinho foi pensado com cuidado e carinho. Tem tudo o que necessita. e quando pomos o pé fora de casa a grandeza do mar e a liberdade da praia completa tudo...
Situado na 1ª linha do mar, numa das melhores praias do norte, rica em iodo e vigiada com bandeira azul.
No terraço poderá apreciar o por-do-sol ou então desfrutar de churrascos ao ar livre com todo o conforto...

Guest access

Pura Vida! :)

É ideal para umas ferias com sol praia e muita diversão.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located at the heart of Foz do Douro. Rua Senhora da Luz is one of the main commercial streets of the neighbourhood.
Here you will find one of the most genuine places in town with some of the most famous restaurants just a few meters away. You will also find plenty of little neighbourhood shops, still run by old traditional families, cafes, beautiful terraces by the sea and even a small supermarket. All of this in walking distance.

name: Working Class House
description:
Durante a grande industrialização da cidade do Porto, a partir do século XIX, foram criadas muitas habitações agrupadas em bairros para alojar os operários que trabalhavam nas fábricas. Que tal recuar cem anos e ficar alojado numa casa recuperada em 2015?

The space
Uma pequena casa térrea do século XIX, recuperada em 2015, inserida num bairro operário habitado por pessoas idosas e alguns familiares, estando ainda algumas casas vazias. Local com portão, fechado à noite, muito soalheiro e sossegado, apesar de localizado junto de ruas com trânsito na parte alta do centro do Porto, junto à Praça do Marquês de Pombal.

Guest access
Casa totalmente independente (não é um quarto com espaços partilhados com outros hóspedes), com cozinha toda equipada, quarto de banho moderno, estúdio com cama de casal, 1 mesa de cabeceira, 1 cómoda, 1 roupeiro, 1 secretária, mesa de comer e duas cadeiras, roupas de cama, toalhas e todo o necessário para uma estadia
neighborhood_overview: Localizado na parte norte da zona centro da cidade, situa-se numa zona de pequenas casas antigas, misturadas com prédios de 3 a 5 andares, perto de uma das praças principais da cidade e de várias das ruas importantes que ligam esta zona ao centro e outras zonas da cidade, com 3 supermercados, vários bancos, restaurantes, cafés, confeitarias e outras lojas próximo.Tem 2 estações da linha amarela do metro perto, Marquês e Faria Guimarães, o que o liga rapidamente à baixa e centro histórico da cidade, a Gaia e ao Hospital de São João. O parque verde da Quinta do Covelo fica perto, para fazer exercício físico ou passear.
host_about: Natural e amante da cidade do Porto, gosto muito de ler sobre variados assuntos, de Historia, de antiguidades e coleccionismo de objectos variados, interessado em conhecer os usos e costumes, tradições, pratos e bebidas típicos de outros países, gosto de visitar museus e monumentos, acredito que uma cidade se conhece melhor a pé que só de transportes públicos, antes de viajar aprendo o mais possível sobre a cidade a visitar desde algumas palavras aos transportes, lojas e mercados que me interessem visitar. Conheço dez das principais cidades da Europa e outras menos conhecidas,  Procurei oferecer um apartamento como gosto de ficar hospedado, perto do centro e com muitas lojas variadas perto, bons transportes e sossegado à noite, com boa internet, televisão por cabo com canais internacionais e tudo que um viajante pode necessitar para descansar depois de, durante o dia, conhecer a minha cidade e região, podendo contar com a minha ajuda nesse sentido. Cidades favoritas: Porto, Londres, Amsterdão, Praga, Budapeste,Kiev e Madrid. O meu lema de vida sempre foi este: acredito que posso aprender algo de novo todos os dias.

description:

The space
Covid 19: BBA Apartments respect all cleaning standards required by DGS.

BBA Apartments Boavista is in the financial and cultural heart of Porto.

Between the Casa da Música and the Palácio de Cristal / Super Bock Arena.

Walk to the Bom Sucesso Market, Soares dos Reis Museum, the Arts District with the art galleries of the streets of Torrinha / Breyner and Miguel Bombarda and also the Botanical Garden. All of these places are at a distance of 10 to 15 minutes on foot.

With two metro stations very close: Carolina Michaelis and
neighborhood_overview: Julio Dinis is financial street of Oporto! Between Casa da Musica & Palacio de Cristal, you can do almost everything by foot!
host_about:
Hello,

I'm a portuguese pianist natural from Ponta Delgada (Azores)

During 30 months, I was living abroad in Berlin, Brussels and Barcelona, and then when I finished my musical studies I decided that in spite of being living in Lisbon for many years, Porto was the best place to get a place to live! 

It was here that I started university, where I got my best friends that became like a family, and maybe because I was born in the middle of the atlantic, maybe I need to have the sea so close...

Although is a small city, it's the best place to get life quality in Portugal (in my opinion).

I love host people from all over the world and let them know what can expect from Porto and their people.

I give importance to the small details, and that's what you can find at BBA Apartments, and I hope that you enjoy your stay as much I will to host you.

host_about:
I am a traveler, so I like to contact and helping other travelers. Anyway this is not my professional business!!! Simply I like to contact with people from other countries. 
.
I am Anthropologist and I was a Teacher. Actually my work is Therapist of FAP therapy, and I love my work! 
I live in Porto, Portugal. 
My house is only 3 km from some sandy beaches with a few cozy bars just on the sand. Usually I go to drink a coffee after lunch just in a bar on the beach, even in winter sunny days!!! 
Anyway, I have a big passion for traveling, mainly in Europe, to know more about local uses, life style and mind way!!!! But I prefer places near from lakes, nice rivers or near to Sea, but I also like small villages, typical architecture, the local meals and drinks, handicrafts, dances and folk music, of each European Country. 
I love to discover hidden treasures in each country or region, interacting with the local people. 
Also I like reading, writing, take photos, music and serene people.

name: Domum  | Turistic Apart. T1 Duplex
description:
Domum's building is located in the heart of Porto city. The intervention that suffered aimed to retain key identity elements of the original construction, associating others, current, allowing to establish an dichotomy between the new and the old.

The space
This one bedroom duplex apartment was developed in the two middle floors of the building, facing the masonry side. Wooden floor was applied throughout the apartment providing its full soundproofing, in order to provide a more comfortable and cosy stay.

Guest access
The entrance floor contemplates a living area prepared with a sofa bed and a fully furnished dining area for a pleasant and convenient use. The kitchen, which also integrates this floor, is fully equipped with stove, dishwasher, oven, microwave, kettle and a Nespresso coffee machine.

The upper floor offers a large sleeping area composed by a very cosy room with a double bed, an office area with natural light, a smal
neighborhood_overview: Its location is privileged, since it is near some of the emblematic places of this beautiful city: for example, the Carmo Church, the Clerigos Church, the Aliados Avenue, the Casa da Musica or the Cathedral of Porto.
host_about:
domum, latin word meaning “go to someone’s house” or “invite to come to your house”. Its meaning was the motto that gave origin to the concept of domum apartments.
Its definition is based on the act of receiving and welcoming people in the country and in the city, which is ours, providing a stay in an intimate and familiar environment, in places that stand out for their refuge and gathering in an urban environment.
 
So, the idea of family is intrinsically present in this concept, translated into the customization of all interior spaces of each apartment, as well as the care given to the choice of each element that composes it, giving them an enormous originality, uniqueness and identity.
The main objective of the implementation of this concept in several buildings is to make our guests feel at home, and therefore at your disposal numerous amenities thought with every detail.

In fact to get to the gate that gives access to the house, you will have to go up some stairs, but believe me it's worth, when you see the panoramic view from our patio!

Well-equipped, comfortable and recently renovated with the architectural line of Oporto nineteenth century.

The space
This building was a typical construction of Porto that was completely remodeled and rebuilt with excellent materials and beautiful details that are difficult to match with most reconstructions currently done in the city.

I have a baby bed avail
neighborhood_overview:
Oporto FR Cativo Flat offers a quality accommodation to spend a few pleasant days in Porto.

Located in historic heritage area designated by UNESCO, is a few meters from Gustav Eiffel D.Luís Bridge, with a panoramic view of Ribeira and Douro River with its traditional Rabelo boats.

Its centrality allows also be less than 5 minutes walk of the most visited tourist attractions like the Sé-Cathedral, St. Catherine Street with its recognized internationally coffee Majestic, the emblematic Rua das Flores, Avenida dos Aliados, the great city icon and masterpiece of baroque in Porto Clerigos Tower of Nasoni, the wonderful station of S.Bento and the area of Ribeira where you can quietly enjoy the famous Port wine, complemented by a pleasant boat trip through the five bridges of the city.

name: Óporto.INguest, " Unique experience residence "
description:
Using a garden located at the rear of the house and being able to practice local sports such as fitness or weight training, are two of the options available. The sea, at a distance of 9 kilometers, is a reality that can be covered by walking or public transport.

The space
Welcome to the Invicta City! This beautiful northern city of Portugal is getting nicer than ever! If you haven't found a place, this may be a great opportunity for you! A beautiful apartment situated in Cedofeita is the perfect location if you are looking for a peaceful and tranquil atmosphere! The property comprises a total of four bedrooms, a modern kitchen, a tastefully decorated living room, a bathroom and a beautiful garden! There are two Supermarkets near by ( around 100 meters away): " Pingo Doce" and " Continente Bom dia".
The center and historical area of the city it's located about three kilometers away from the house and can easily traveled in 15 minutes by foot.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is part of one of the main areas of the city of Porto. it is a calm and safe neighborhood that offers a feeling of being in a rural environment due the surrounding urban fabric. The neighbors are discreet, but helpful and welcoming people. The proximity to the Boavista area, considered the second center of interest in the city and center itself, allows visitors visit points of interest in short periods of time. The distance from the neighborhood to the sea is about 9 miles, which can be covered by pratics running or public transport who ensuring frequent and fast connections to the beaches.
host_about: I like receive people and consider every details for minimize the error that can to conduct  to possible damages. hearing music and to be informed about my own country and worldwide is fundamental for me. Good television series such as Dexter or Breaking Bad, definitely hold my attention. A good cuisine and enjoy nature it's two things that I enjoy. Travel it's also one of my favorite options, in fact I already visited  Brazil (Rio de Janeiro), Germany (Dusseldorf), France (Paris), Spain (Barcelona and Madrid) and finaly Ukraine (Kiev) that made me understand better experiences and customs of other people. Solidarity it's my motto. Passion for animals it's a feeling that I always had. Understanding people at their own diversity, cultural and religious makes all sense, specially in this controversial present times that societies living.

name: Quinta da Longra
description:
Quinta da Longra está a 10 minutos de carro dos Passadiços do Paiva, a 15 minutos a pé da ponte pedonal suspensa e a 23km de Arouca e seu famoso mosteiro. Caminhadas, miradouros deslumbrantes, rafting, caiaque, canyoning e várias praias fluviais no rio Paiva são algumas das actividades de que os hóspedes poderão desfrutar. Bons restaurantes, vinhos e licores locais e doces tradicionais são as atracções gastronómicas da região. O aeroporto do Porto fica a 70km, o rio Douro a 30 minutos de carro.

Guest access
A casa pode receber 6 hóspedes. Existe um compartimento com sofá-cama e WC anexo à casa que pode receber 2 hóspedes extra (mediante pagamento de taxa)

Idéalement situé, vous pourrez visiter les villes de Porto et de Vila Nova de Gaia sans dépendre des transports en commun. name: Porto Natura Guesthouse
description:
Porto Natura Guesthouse is located within a beautiful urban farm, next to Porto center, offering to its guests a relaxed and marvelous stay in the middle of nature.
As a guest house (w/ three rooms w/ private bathroom for guests) the booking and the announced price is per room, for two people. All guests have access to a equipped kitchen, terraces, gardens and swimming pool.
There is a train station at 3min walking distance with direct trains to the historic center of Porto.

The space
Within our Guesthouse you'll be in the middle of the nature, while you're at the gates of Porto! The house itself is situated inside a little urban farm, with a beautiful and wild biodiversity. Loose yourself in our gardens, among the hammock, the pool and the solarium. Have a walk and say hello to our friendly horses or lay down on the grass with your favorite book, while listening to the magical birdsong.
The historic and eclectic house has three spacious and comfo
neighborhood_overview:
The guesthouse is situated in a quiet and safe residential area. In the neighborhood you can find a pharmacy, supermarkets, coffees, restaurants (there is a traditional restaurant that delivers for free) and public transports, all within 10min walking.
Within your stay, you may ride the horses and enjoy the neat air from the countryside with a relaxing ecological walk, alongside the “Paleozoic Route” (Sítio Rede Natura 2000). Following this path, you will end up in the middle-aged village named “Couce” (Aldeia de Portugal), where you can experience a real time flashback. Meanwhile, you can travel over the Roman’s empire legacy, which intensively exploited this Gold enriched soil. The mines still remain as a tourist open landmark, and it’s possible to visit them in a safe and guided tour. These places are in the surroundings.
Porto Natura Guesthouse is situated inside a triangle constituted by three admirable places - Douro, Porto and Guimarães – World Heritage.
Thus, i
host_about:
We are nature lovers. We love to travel, to have contact with different and local cultures and to share our experiences. We strongly appreciate art, music, gastronomy and a good conversation. 
For us it's a huge pleasure to receive guests in our farm and make them feel like home.

Apartment in the heart of the historical and cultural city center. In order to provide high comfort and functionality it was restored with the upmost care, combining contemporary architecture with a sober decoration based on Nordic furniture design.
Apartment located near the most central area of the city of Porto.

The space
The apartment is the result of an Oporto based architect renovation, emphasizing the existing like the wooden floor and window frames, and assuming the contemporaneity with the design of the new infrastructure needs, like the bathroom and kitchen. The intervention is concluded with a careful selection of its decoration, with furniture whether conceived by the architect, like the iron tables with the floor´s wooden slabs, or designed by famous architects and designers like Arne Jacobsen, Steen Ostergaard, Percival Lafer, Charles and Ray Eames. All of these elements were put together creating a meticulous and aesthetical symbiosis in order

The neighborhood is calm and safe but is a main street, so you have during the day trafic noise. But the flat have double glazed windows.
host_about:
I m a happy person and I love to spend time with my family, friends and new people of other countries. Metting new people is metting new countries. 

Oporto is my city and I love my city. The city of Oporto is very rich in history, monuments, wine and food.
I love the food from Oporto and Portugal. Tradicional food like "tripas à moda do Porto" or "cozido à Portuguesa" or "bacalhau" in every aways... And of course the great portugueses desserts.









Adoro ser feliz. Gosto de viajar mais e mais e mais.
Adoro arte. 
Adoro a minha cidade. A maravilhosa Cidade do Porto! 
A minha família e os meus amigos são as "coisas" mais importantes da minha vida, incluindo o meu Chico      (cão) e o meu Óscar (gato). 
Adoro dançar.
Adoro a comida portuguesa. As Tripas à moda do Porto, Cozido à portuguesa, Bacalhau de todas as maneiras... E as sobremesas.

4 people apartment with a double bedroom, a living room with a double sofa bed, a kitchen, a bathroom and private aparkment

The space
Located in the historic center of Oporto, the “Casa do Sol” is a charming and pleasant apartment, housed in one of the oldest neighborhoods of the city, classified as UNESCO World Heritage.

Despite its location in the heart of the city, the apartment offers unusual peace and tranquility, in a building built in 2010, with a double bedroom and living room with sofa bed for two people.
The kitchen is fully equipped with appliances and utensils.

The building has an elevator which provides a more comfortable access to the apartment and offers a private garage for one vehicle.
It has a large terrace where you can enjoy a unique view of the Douro river, the “Infante”, “Doña Maria” and “D. Luis” bridges, the latter being the most emblematic of Oporto.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located two minutes walking from the beach of Matosinhos and close to the largest park in the city of Porto, with 83 hectares and about 10Kms of footpaths. It is located also about 5 minutes walking from the Sea-Life Center.
Along marginal, ideal for cycling or walking, you can enjoy fantastic views of the sea and enjoy the many esplanades all along the coast.
The beach of Matosinhos, which has a long sandy beach, is one of the reference beaches with excellent access and support services, as ex: esplanades, surf schools and other activities outdoors.

name: Apartment by the Beach - 20282/AL
description:
The apartment is located in Foz do Douro, a privileged zone in Oporto city. Just walk down the street and wander through the seaside to start to feel at home!

The space
This is a fabulous fully furnished apartment: one bedroom with king size bed; living room with couch, dining table and cable TV; fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, washer/dryer, microwave, oven and hob, coffemaker, toaster and all the utensils; fully equipped bathroom with fresh towels. Wi-fi is provided throughout the apartment.

Guest access
Access to all areas of the apartment is restricted to guests as well as the use of all equipment provided. Total access to the kitchen, living room, bedroom and WC.

Other things to note
We can provide cots for babies (by request).
Check-in: 14 p.m.
Check-out: 10 a.m.

License number
20282/AL
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy the numerous restaurants, bars and terraces available in the various beaches that extend in front of you ! For those who like surf, there are also great spots for practice. 15 minutes walk from the city park (where many music festivals take place, like the "Primavera Sound" in June), as well from the Contemporary Art Museum of Serralves.
host_about:
Hello!!
I love to travel around the world and to know different places and people. Come and feel at home in Oporto, one of the most beautiful cities in the world!

name: HeartMade Loft
description:
Loft from 19th century completely restored in 2015, remained unchanged many of the original features with high quality materials. It has thermal and acoustic insulation. Right in the heart of the city.

The space
Loft of 61m2 in late nineteenth-century, specifically 1895.
The restoration, completed in 2015, remained unchanged many of the original features, but included thermal and acoustic insulation.
The living room and the bed are in one single space and the kitchen is on a different division as well the bathroom.

Guest access
Access to all the loft. Kitchen with all appliances included (complete crockery for 3 persons, dishwasher, oven, kettle, hob, microwave, toaster, etc), towels 100% cotton linen, soap and shampoo.

Other things to note
As of March 1st 2018 a new regulation entered into force that will require all hosts in Porto to collect tourist tax from their guests and remit it to the municipality. T
neighborhood_overview:
Porto typical neighborhood, quiet and safe. Very hospitable and friendly neighborhood.
There are several shops around (supermarkets, cafes, ATM) and antique stores.
Main attractions can be reach easily by foot:
Lello Bookstore - 10 minutes
Clerigos Tower- 10 minutes
Trindade Station - 8 minutes
São Bento Station - 10 minutes
Sé Cathedral - 15 minutes
Ribeira- 20 minutes

name: Peaceful cottage near the centre of Porto
description:
If you want to know Porto, but you'd like to get away from the fuss of the city, this is the place for you! It is close to the city center but has the charm and tranquility of the countryside. A romantic cottage where you can relax and be enchanted!

The space
My cottage is a unique place in this city. It's near the center and all the touristic spots, but it maintains the necessary distance to create a peaceful and quiet atmosphere, that you would find in the countryside. When you come through our doors, it seems as you've been transported to a different place: everything is green around you, you can hear the birds singing, the air is fresh and at night you can see a sky full of stars.
All of this just a few minutes away from a metro station with tonnes of connections (VISO).
The cottage is designed for 4 people (max), with 2 double beds. It's ideal for couples, families or groups of friends who want to share a genuine travel experience.

G
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is not touristic. We live in a residential area, served with all the shops you may need (ex: supermarket, pharmacy, grocery store, restaurant). Very close by we have a metro station (Via Rápida - Viso) and various bus stations, that can take you downtown in minutes!
host_about: I'm a world traveler, food geek, infinitely curious about people, cultures and ways of being. Since I was young, I dreamed about crossing the world, living abroad, learning all the different languages and expressions. AirBnb has a been the perfect platform for me, for a more interactive and genuine way of traveling and knowing the world.
