In the historic city centre, we restored the house with all the comforts. Privileged place to see old town. 2 bedrooms: 1 with double bed other with 2 single beds. Sofa bed in the living room. Equipped kitchen and reliable wifi. Baby friendly.

The space
Totally refurbished flat with 72m square, opening for guests this summer. Right in the middle of old city, UNESCO World Heritage. Perfect spot for body resting after a stroll along Rio Douro (river) sidewalk and Porto historical streets. Casa da Catedral is a renovated flat where we tried to preserve all its original marks. You can expect modern house, with all amenities and comforts.

Perfect flat for 4 and 5 persons. Can accommodate 6.
Very easy and fast access from and to airport.
Public parking lot near 50 metres.

Charming two bedroom apartment in a central location. 5 minutes walking to Batalha Square, Sta. Catarina street and Majestic cafe. 1 minute waking to Cathedral and Gu
neighborhood_overview: One of the oldest neighborhood in the city, right in the middle of town heart. Therefore you can find lots of historic buildings, Cathedral lays 100 metres from the flat. Very lively, with shops, restaurants and 15 minutes walking from the main interesting visiting sites.  Riverside (Ribeira), Port wine cellars, Clérigos tower, comercial downtown, etc.
host_about:
We’re a couple truly in love with our city, Porto. Nuno lives here for the last 43 years and Raquel lives in since she's 3 years old. Nuno been working in journalism and financial sector and Raquel teaches arts and design. Travel, films, books, history and culture in general are among our main interests. 

Our purpose is to disposal of Casa da Catedral for visitors around the world in order meeting new people and share our city with them.

name: Attic suite with incredible view
description:
The suite we rent is located in a fantastic apartment in the historical city center, as defined by UNESCO. The apartment draws the perfect balance between the original Porto houses and new design, with a wonderful garden and an amazing view.

The space
The building in which the suite is inserted is a XVII century building, newly renovated for full contemporary standards, located in one of the most historical streets of the "old city", with to major landmarks in the street (now converted to a theatre and a museum). Its also one of the streets which maintains a neighborhood life, being at the same time a very centrical location.
Staying here you'll experience local life from a close distance and you'll be a very short (less than 5m) distance from most major centre landmarks and tourist attractions, as well as nightlife and restaurants. Its in the heart of the city, please enjoy it as much as we locals do!

Guest access
Apart from their ow
neighborhood_overview: The Vitória neighborhood was developed in the late XV century as the 4th and last jewish quarter, and in its time it was an advanced urbanistic development. This very obscure period in history was the background for its edification. With many different backgrounds, the people that inhabited this area, inside the city wall limits and right beside the "olive field door", gave an heterogeneous look and feel to the neighborhood. Nowadays, you can still feel all these elements of history while walking through the cobblestone streets and hidden staircases, as well as through the great mixture of people inhabiting the area. Its in vitoria that you'll still find this living mixture inside Porto in its rawest form. You'll still find a lady selling fish in the streets, old and young people hanging and talking in the streets,  kids jumping inside fountains and playing football, open doors and a peep inside peoples lives, and the occasional interaction, specially if asked for. People around here l
host_about: I'm an Italian architect, living in Porto since 1994. I felt in love with this beatiful city and I decided to invest in the historical city center. I like to say that I know the city better than locals. I like food and cooking, good chat with a glass of wine or beer. I always lived with many people, so I have the notion of sharing and respect the private space.

name: Sunny apt with a balcony
description:
This sunny apartment is situated in the center of Porto, right in front of the river. It is located in a completely remodeled (March 2015) 19th century building. A fully equipped kitchen, a balcony and an additional sofa bed are at your disposal.

The space
In this apartment you will enjoy the best of both worlds: the beauty and timelessness of traditional Portuguese architecture of the 19th century in one of Porto's historic districts and the amenities of a totally remodelled, fully equipped and modern home away from home.

It is situated in the second of a 3-storey building, oriented towards the garden and therefore very calm.

The apartment has space for up to four adults, however we recommend max. three adults. The bedroom (normal bed) can be closed with a sliding door. Please note, that it does not offer complete privacy due to the open space concept of the apartment (gap between door and ceiling, see photos). There is a small sofa bed for
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in one of Porto's most important historic districts - mostly know for its S. João celebrations. The river is only 250m away. You can walk along the Douro, for example until the popular Ribeira area.

Within a walking distance of less than 5 minutes you can find typical restaurants, small tascas (try Casa Guedes!), bakeries and shopping possbilities. You are only 10 minutes away from the best Blues and Jazz Club of the city (Hot Five) and right in front of the park Jardim de São Lazaro, where you can observe the pensioners playing cards.

Porto is best discovered by foot and you are in the best location to start your adventure from here (and end it on your balcony with a glass of wine in your hand :) ).
host_about:
Born in Poland, grown up in Germany and now living in Porto, I have a passion for foreign languages and cultures. Consequently, I love to travel and receive guests from all over the world.

I consider myself an open-minded, adventerous and warm person. I have a passion for dancing salsa and kizomba with my fiancé, to-do-lists and flee markets - and of course my (new) hometown Porto.

neighborhood_overview:
Familiar building with nice neighbours, situated on a central district.
The building is located in the city center, with many shops and restaurants close by, you can go out day and night in safety. Close to the main points of interest: Santa catarina street, Majestic Café, Bolhão Market,... Only a few meters from the Bolhão and Trindade metro stations. Nearby you will find all kinds of restaurants, cafes, supermarket and shopping centers . You can walk to the theater or cinema. The historic center, the Porto wine cellars and the Ribeira area at 1500 meters.
Really all within a walking distance, day or night!

The nearest supermarket is Pingo Doce. Leaving the building, turn left, at the end of the street turn right and on the first left . A few meters away you will find the supermarket (next to the Hotel Ibis sign) . It is open from 8h30 - 20h30 every day except Sunday, from 9h00-20h00 .

Tourism Office, at Aliados, on the left side of the city Hall. Eve
host_about:
We are a couple, 55 and 52 years and we have two sons Pedro (28 years) and Diogo (24 years) and two doberman dogs: Lola and Zak ​​(yes, they are part of our family too!).
We decided to rent our apartment because we think it has fantastic conditions for our guests and because we like people from other countries to enjoy our town. In fact we love traveling and discovering new cultures, we believe it help us understand better our world. Our family trip: 15 days in Brazil ...
The boys are passionate about motorsport and our children participate in races. Pedro is a Motorsport Engineer in a F3 team, and lives in Italy. Diogo wants to follow his brother and he is finishing his studies in mechanics too... As parents, we are their number 1 fans. We support them, no matter what!
In our spare time, we enjoy reading, listening to music, dance and walking the dogs.
We love the place we live in, because it is calm and when we arrive home after a long day at work  we can take a walk to the beach with our dogs. 
We now have a co-host, Diogo, who help us managing the bookings and the apartment.
Please enjoy our fantastic city and do not hesitate to ask for more details. Help us preparing your stay and make it a wonderful time with us.

name: Sun Room at Fatima's House - Cedofeita
description:
We are renting a room in our family house for tourists who want to experience Porto. The room provides you with a queen size bed.

Located in Cedofeita and near Boavista. It's right next to the Metro station and very close to the Clerigos Tower. 15 min walking distance from downtown.

Both my sons (ages 27 and 32) speak fluent English and I speak fluent French. We can all understand some Spanish. My younger son also speaks Japanese.

The space
Our apartment has a very friendly environment. I live upstairs with my two sons and two lovely cats (although they'll frequently pay you a visit, if you allow them). Our house is situated in a really good spot with easy access to all of Porto. Downtown is just a 15 minute walk from here and we are also very close to Casa da Música (Boavista) and some of the best restaurants in Porto (you have to try a Francesinha if you visit Porto!)

We have grocery shops very close to us, a laundry shop right
neighborhood_overview: This is an urban environment. There's a chance for car noises as well as people passing in the street who can speak loudly at times. As this room faces the main street, keep in mind you're coming to the heart of the city.

name: Bonjardim OportoStay Loft
description:
Bonjardim is one of the most historical streets in the city of Porto, it's a melting pot of popular traditional restaurants and few blocks from the best loved shopping street of Santa Catarina.
Despite being close to the action this place it's located at a quiet square and the most important subway station that connects you directly to the airport its just moments away, meaning you access the entire city with ease although you can easily avoid it and explore the city on foot.

The space
A stylish and spacious duplex, this Bonjardim home is a little sanctuary that takes you away from the city's chaos. Even though this apartment is quite minimalist has plenty of charm with beautiful sloped ceilings, wood doors and modern design invite light into the open-plan living area
It's a romantic space for family or group of friends wanting proximity to some of Porto’s most famous attractions, this loft won't fall short.
What we really like most about this pla

name: SãoMiguelApartments HistoricalCenter SuperiorApart
description:
Apartamento num prédio centenário, numa rua muito sossegada e ao mesmo tempo central do antigo bairro judeu. Acomoda facilmente 6 pessoas. A cozinha está totalmente equipada e a varanda das traseiras é muito acolhedora!
Este é um dos nossos 6 apartamentos no edificio S. MIGUEL, veja os outras e escolha o melhor para si.

The space
O apartamento fica no 3ºandar de um prédio centenário, sem elevador, que ao longo dos anos sofreu melhorias sucessivas sem nunca perder a traça original.
Dos quartos da frente vês os telhados do centro histórico e a cidade de Vila Nova de Gaia do outro lado do rio. O sol entra em abundancia pelas janelas e enche de luz um apartamento muito espaçoso, com cerca de 100m2 e 3 quartos.
O apartamento encontra-se totalmente equipado para receber 6 pessoas, com fogão, máquina de lavar roupa, micro-ondas, máquina de café e chaleira.
O prédio situa-se numa rua residencial do antigo bairro judeu do Olival, numa zona muito típ
neighborhood_overview:
No bairro do meu apartamento gosto das ruas estreitas e do miradouro da Vitória, um dos mais bonitos da cidade do PORTO.
É um sítio muito nobre, onde no século XVI, a população do Porto alojou os judeus perseguidos pelo rei D. Manuel I
host_about:
My name is Lígia, I work by my own as an engineering geologist, with lots of work done in Porto and some around the world. Together with my sister LUISA I manage our short rental business.
Our values are: sustainability; ambition; entrepreneurial spirit; equality and respect, and last but not least, passion for what we do. 
At the end all we win!!

name: Welcome to my city 2
description:
Este apartamento está inserido num prédio tipico da cidade,numa rua das mais carismáticas e centrais da cidade do Porto,privilegiado por estar perto dos pontos turísticos mais relevantes do centro histórico da cidade.

The space
Espaço acabado de ser remodelado de uma forma actual e moderna,em que a sua decoração inovadora se interliga com o perfil patente nas casas típicas da cidade do porto.Inserido na rua de São Francisco,mesmo no centro histórico da cidade,este apartamento apresenta espaços amplos e confortáveis,podendo alojar entre duas a seis pessoas,acomodadas da seguinte forma: quarto com cama de casal,quarto com duas camas de solteiro e sala com sofá cama para duas pessoas,caso necessário estará disponível uma cama de bebe.
A cozinha está equipada com uma grande variedade de utensílios de enorme qualidade entre eles fogão,frigorífico,microondas, forno,cafeteira e torradeira, na casa de banho temos toalhas, sabonete,xampu,gel de banho e secador de cab
neighborhood_overview: A Rua de São Francisco é uma rua muito tranquila, em que ainda é possível se sentir a verdadeira vivência do porto antigo,em toda a área envolvente e a dois passos de distância existem ruas e prédios pinturescos, bares, restaurantes, mercearias, lojas tradicionais,praças,jardins e claro a ribeira com o rio douro a seus pés,existe também uma rede diversificada de transporte que podem de uma forma cómoda e tranquila ajudar a conhecer os mais importantes pontos turísticos da cidade.
host_about:
Olá a todos, o meu nome é Carlos, eu e a Cristina nascemos e vivemos no porto, adoramos viajar, conhecer novas pessoas, ir ao cinema, boa comida e acima de tudo partilhar com todos a nossa maravilhosa cidade.
Temos o maior prazer em vos receber,
Sejam bem-vindos...! 
Carlos & Cristina

name: Douro's romantic apartment
description:
The apartment is part of a building from 1886, the same year of the construction of D.Luís bridge, located in "Caminhos do Romantic", between Museu Romantico and the river.
Plenty of light and very quiet, it has a wonderful view to the river and the sea.

The space
During the day you get to listen to the birds that live in the gardens around, and by night, if you are lucky, you'll have an owl.
The space has plenty of light, since it is oriented south, with 5 big windows all around (except north).
It is comfortable, since it was renovated completely.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole apartment.

License number
26341/AL
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very quiet. You can stay at home and feel completely relaxed.
You can access the Museu Romântico, Casa Tait and Palácio de Cristal walking though old paths of Caminhos do Romântico.
The river is just 3 minutes distance, and here you can find traditional restaurants and cafés.
In 5 minutes walking distance, near the river, you can find Museu do Vinho do Porto and Museu do Carro Elétrico.
You can find the art gallery neighborhood, just around Palácio de Cristal. You will get around 15 minutes to get there walking.
Also nearby the apartment you can find a supermarket.
host_about: I am portuguese. I love to travel and to know people from different cultures and backgrounds.

description:
Studio Partment rehabilitated on the 4th floor front on a building that maintains the facade, located in Ribeira area, considered a UNESCO World Heritage Site, which offers a mixture of traditionalism and contemporaneity.

Open-space apartment with 2 single beds and 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen open to the living room where there is a double sofa bed. Balcony with access to main street.

Ideal for 1 - 4 people.

Prices vary according to the seasons.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

This apartment located in Rua do Infante D. Henrique, one of the main access roads to the area of Ribeira, a former commercial place near the river Douro, in one of the most complete and main areas of Porto, offering a mixture of traditionalism and contemporaneity through its shops, restaurants, bars, etc.
This is an area of the Historic Center of Porto, co
neighborhood_overview:
Building located at Ribeira, which belongs to the city’s Historic Center, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Near the Douro River, this is an area much frequented by tourists and where bars and restaurants can be found.
Nearby, are worth mentioning the Ribeira Square, popularly also known as The Cube Square; Rua da Fonte Taurina, one of the oldest streets in town; the wall of Bacalhoeiros and Casa do Infante.
A few minutes walking from the main sights of the city, as well as the area where the cafes, bars and nightlife spots are.

Points of interest:
- Ribeira
- Luís I bridge
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) ~
- Rua de Santa Catarina
- Majestic Café
- Avenida dos Aliados
- Clérigos Tower
- Lello Library
- Rua das Galerias
- Cordoaria Gardens
- Virtudes Garden
- S. Francisco Church
- Bolhão Market
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church
host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is decorated with furniture from the beginning of the twentieth Century in an atmosphere of charm and refinement so that you feel involved in the historic town.

The neighborhood area is perfect for visit Porto. Strategic place surrounded by Cafe, bakery, Supermarkets, Restaurants, Metro Station, Train Station, Bus Stop all in about 5 to 10 minutes walk!
As you are in the historic center, easy to visit all town by foot, you don't need any transport to visit the best places in Porto. Located in front of the "Douro" river with the BEST view in town, just in front of "RIBEIRA" which is world heritage area!
You can start the visit from the river and going through the the old Neighborhoods or choosing one of the several Port wine cellars for a tasting visit and next for a river cruise of 50 minutes in a typical boat called "Rabelo".
All this in 5 minutes walking!!

It has fabulous views over the River Douro and the city of Porto. The place

Os Belle Époque Apartments localizam-se num dos mais belos exemplares arquitectónicos de Arte Nova, numa das ruas mais centrais da cidade, no coração do centro histórico da cidade do Porto datado de 1890.
Este edifício foi sujeito a um completo restauro, a sua total remodelação teve fim no inicio do ano de 2015, no seu interior existem hoje seis confortáveis apartamentos com todo o conforto contemporâneo mantendo a traça e elegância da sua época , que se destinam a alojamento turístico. Absolutely perfect for 2 at 3 guest - This recently renovated 65m2 apartment,and terrace is located in the heart of the historic center of Porto , a very quiet street , close to major attractions , shops , bars , restaurants ,
The location is privileged to discover the historic center of Porto , on foot, but if you use the metro is just 5 minutes walk from Trindade station. It is also ideal if you want to visit other Portuguese cities , as Guimaraes , Braga , the proximity to the train station Sao Bento .

neighborhood_overview:
Almada – Apartments is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking.

The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries.

Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown.

Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated.

There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.

Muito perto da Praça do Marquês de Pombal, da saída da estação do metro e de várias paragens de autocarros para outras zonas da cidade e cidades vizinhas, com lojas de toda a espécie perto, bancos, supermercados, correios, situado num prédio residencial sossegado, sem o barulho da agitação nocturna e do transito, proporciona um rápido acesso à baixa e centro histórico de metro, pois está junto à segunda paragem de metro da linha amarela sentido Trindade - Hospital de São João.

neighborhood_overview: Situado na parte norte do centro do Porto, com bons transportes para diferentes zonas da cidade e para cidades vizinhas, com vários bancos, caixas multibanco, supermercados, restaurantes, cafés, confeitarias e outras lojas, com um parque verde perto, a Quinta do Covelo, para passear ou fazer desporto, com autocarro para o Estádio do F.C. Porto e seu museu e três para a zona das Antas, onde há muitos restaurantes, baratos ou mais caros, além de muitas lojas e o Parque de S. Roque.
host_about: Natural e amante da cidade do Porto, gosto muito de ler sobre variados assuntos, de Historia, de antiguidades e coleccionismo de objectos variados, interessado em conhecer os usos e costumes, tradições, pratos e bebidas típicos de outros países, gosto de visitar museus e monumentos, acredito que uma cidade se conhece melhor a pé que só de transportes públicos, antes de viajar aprendo o mais possível sobre a cidade a visitar desde algumas palavras aos transportes, lojas e mercados que me interessem visitar. Conheço dez das principais cidades da Europa e outras menos conhecidas,  Procurei oferecer um apartamento como gosto de ficar hospedado, perto do centro e com muitas lojas variadas perto, bons transportes e sossegado à noite, com boa internet, televisão por cabo com canais internacionais e tudo que um viajante pode necessitar para descansar depois de, durante o dia, conhecer a minha cidade e região, podendo contar com a minha ajuda nesse sentido. Cidades favoritas: Porto, Londres, Amsterdão, Praga, Budapeste,Kiev e Madrid. O meu lema de vida sempre foi este: acredito que posso aprender algo de novo todos os dias.

neighborhood_overview:
Estará a 5 minutos a pé da praia, de restaurantes fantásticos e internacionalmente conhecidos como o Terra, Cafeína ou Portarossa, e de uma marginal incrível para passear com vista para mar e rio. A Baixa do Porto também se encontra ali ao lado demorando apenas 10 minutos de carro a chegar lá. description:
With a great location in the tradicional Almada Street and at 250 meters from Trindade Metro Station with direct connection to the Airport, this pleasent and elegante Loft Apartment with 60m, is perfect for you discover Porto.

The space
Absolutely perfect for 2 at 5 guest - This recently renovated 60 m2 apartment,is located in the heart of the historic center of Porto , a very quiet street , close to major attractions , shops , bars and restaurants .

Guest access
•Internet Free

Other things to note
1-Information about cleaning service

Coronavirus 19:
Due to the conditions related to Coronavirus 19, the apartment is not cleaned during the guest's stay.
Cleaning products are available
Bed linen and bathroom linen are changed every 5 days.

Extra cost information

2-Nas reservas com duração superior a 20 dias,as despesas de electricidade e água são pagas pelo hóspede,mediant
neighborhood_overview:
Almada – Apartments is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking.

The center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries.

Theatres and show halls like the Rivoli Theatre, Coliseu do Porto or São João National Theatre are also in downtown.

Downtown - Baixa - is also known for the significant number of nightlife establishments, bars and cafés, in various restaurants from the most traditional to the more sophisticated.

There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.

We can cook a traditional and delicious meal, upon request!

The space
The apartment is located in the "Miradouro" building, a landmark in the history of architecture from the 60s, by the first architect of Oporto, Maria José Marques da Silva, daughter of an extraordinary architect called Marques da Silva, who left many works of reference, in this wonderful city.
Porto is also a city considered the "cradle of architects", in whose schools were formed several architects such as Siza Vieira and Sotto Moura, both awarded with the Pritzger architecture prize.

neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is situated in the upper part of the center of Porto, away from noise and traffic, but 10 /15 minutes walk from all interesting points. As we are in a high point of the of the city centre and because Porto's city, rises from the river, the ascent is a little accented, however, for those who do not want to tire, we advise Uber or a taxi, both do not charge more than 5 Euros / car.

The neighborhood is mostly housing, although there are 2 hotels and some buildings of Tourism Accommodation, there are 3 restaurants that I recommend, "Portucale", located at the top of the building with a superb view over the city, for special occasions because it is not cheap, " Solar da Alegria "and" Casa Nanda ", both with good price / quality ratio.
Near the apartment you can do your shopping on foot, in a small supermarket called "Amanhecer"". There are some cafes, bakeries, pharmacy and even a good ice cream shop. We are 2 minutes from Santa Catarina's street, by where
host_about:
Marta

Olá o meu nome é Marta e sou "Tripeira", alcunha porque são conhecidas as pessoas do Porto e sou quem recebe os nossos hóspedes,  nesta cidade tão bonita e cheia de história.

Tenho 2 filhos, adoro cozinhar, tenho um blog de culinária e canal no Youtube.

Adoro agricultura e faço parte de um projeto de Agricultura Urbana.

Terei todo o prazer em vos indicar os locais imperdíveis da cidade, os sítios desconhecidos e os restaurantes mais típicos.

Estarei sempre contactável e terei todo o prazer em vos dar a assistência necessária.

Poderei também providenciar cestos de piqueniques e jantares de cozinha tradicional portuguesa, desde que nos sejam marcados com alguma antecedência.
antecedência.

Venham conhecer a minha fantástica e surpreendente cidade do Porto!

Sejam Bem Vindos à minha casa !

My name is Marta and I´m “Tripeira” , nickname that the people from Porto are known for and I help my sister , the owner of the company, receiving our guests

Mom of 2 boys, I love to cook and I have a food blog and a YouTube channel

I love agriculture and I make part of a Urban farming school and garden

It will be a pleasure to give you some tips, to tell you witch are  the best places in town, the “hidden ones” and the typical restaurants.

I´ll be always reachable  and I will provide all the assistance needed 

I can  arrange picnic bags and home made meals at your place, under request.

Come meet this beautiful and amazing city of Porto! 

Welcome to my place !

Bonjour,
Je m'appelle Marta et je suis "Tripeira" le petit nom qu'on donne à ceux qui habitent à Porto et je suis râvie de recevoirnos hôtes.
 J'ai 2 enfants et j'adore la nature et et les animaux. J'adore la cuisine et j'ai un Blogue avec plus de 50 000 adeptes et une chaine dans le YouTube. 
Je fais partie d'un project d'agriculture urbaine durable, dans le centre de la ville.
Je serai tres heureuse en vous recevoir dans ce magnifique appartement et de vous conseiller les endroits à visiter, surtout ceux qui ne sont pas tres connus, comme des petits restaurants et je pourrais aussi vous preparer des repas de la cuisine traditionnelle portugaise.
Je serai toujours à l'appel en cas de besoin.

Soyez les Bien Venus chez moi!


Hallo mein Name ist Marta, ich bin eine “Tripeira” so werden die Einheimischen von Porto genannt. Ich wuerde mich sehr freuen Sie in meiner geschichtstraechtigen Stadt Porto begruessen zu duerfen.
Ich habe 2 Kinder, liebe es zu kochen und habe auch einen Blog uebers Kochen auf Youtube.
Ein Hobby von mir ist die biologische Landwirtschaft im staedtischen Raum.
Als Einheimische gebe ich Ihnen gerne Tips ueber die Sehenswuerdigkeiten von Porto und die vielen typischen Restaurants.
Waehrend Ihrer Ferien bei mir in Porto bin ich immer erreichbar um Ihnen alle notwendige Unterstuetzung fuer einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu geben.
Gegen Voranmeldung bereite ich gerne Ihr Fruestueck, Picknick Koerbe oder ein traditionelles Portugiesisches Abendessen vor.
Kommen Sie und erleben Sie diese schöne Stadt, die Sie überraschen wird!
Herzliche Gruesse aus Porto
Ihre Marta

Chamo-me Andreia e vivo na cidade de Braga. Adoro a natureza, gosto de viajar, de férias, descobrir novos lugares, ler um bom livro ou conviver com os amigos e, também ser uma boa anfitriã.

Sendo eu uma viajante, sei que é mais confortável e acessível uma estadia numa casa em vez de um hotel! 
Adoraria compartilhar dicas, aconselhar destinos dentro da cidade do Porto e arredores, para tornar a sua estadia o mais agradável possível e o mais perto possível da vida dos portuenses. 
Será um prazer confiar as chaves da minha humilde casa!

neighborhood_overview:
Situated on a central district in a familiar building with nice neighbours.
The building is located in the city center, with many shops and restaurants near by, you can go out day and night in safety. Close to the main points of interest: Santa Catarina street, Majestic Café, Bolhão Market,... Only a few meters from the Bolhão and Trindade metro stations. You can walk to the theater or cinema. The historic center, the Porto wine cellars and the Ribeira area at 1500 meters.
Really all within a walking distance, day or night!

The nearest supermarket is Pingo Doce. Leaving the building, turn left, at the end of the street turn right and on the first left. A few meters away you will find the supermarket (next to the Hotel Ibis sign). It is open from 8h30 - 20h30 every day except Sunday, from 9h00-20h00.

Tourism Office, at Aliados, on the left side of the city Hall. Every day, from 9h00-19h00.
host_about:
We are a couple, 55 and 52 years and we have two sons Pedro (28 years) and Diogo (24 years) and two doberman dogs: Lola and Zak ​​(yes, they are part of our family too!).
We decided to rent our apartment because we think it has fantastic conditions for our guests and because we like people from other countries to enjoy our town. In fact we love traveling and discovering new cultures, we believe it help us understand better our world. Our family trip: 15 days in Brazil ...
The boys are passionate about motorsport and our children participate in races. Pedro is a Motorsport Engineer in a F3 team, and lives in Italy. Diogo wants to follow his brother and he is finishing his studies in mechanics too... As parents, we are their number 1 fans. We support them, no matter what!
In our spare time, we enjoy reading, listening to music, dance and walking the dogs.
We love the place we live in, because it is calm and when we arrive home after a long day at work  we can take a walk to the beach with our dogs. 
We now have a co-host, Diogo, who help us managing the bookings and the apartment.
Please enjoy our fantastic city and do not hesitate to ask for more details. Help us preparing your stay and make it a wonderful time with us.

name: Cosy, river view, historical centre
description:
Casa da Ribeira is a cosy flat at Porto’s historical centre, within the UNESCO World Heritage area. It’s a one bedroom flat with river view, in a renovated building, 2 mins walking distance from the river, near major historical landmarks. Free Wi-Fi.

The space
Casa da Ribeira (12338/AL) has a prime location in the historical centre. The flat is on the 3rd floor of a renovated building, without lift access. The main entrance is on a quiet pedestrian street, next to São Nicolau´s church. This is a great starting point to explore Porto. The flat has two large windows with balconies facing Casa do Infante from which you can enjoy the view of the Douro River.
It can accommodate up to 4 people, two guests in a separate double bedroom, and two extras guests, on a click-clack sofa bed (110cm x 175) and an extra single bed in the living room. A cot bed is available, upon request and free of charge, for children up to 3 years old. It has a bathroom with shower and a
neighborhood_overview: Casa da Ribeira has an excellent location within the S. Nicolau neighbourhood, 2 minutes walking distance from the river, Palácio da Bolsa, S. Nicolau Church, S. Francisco Church, Casa do Infante and Ferreira Borges Market, to name a few. Walk a bit further and you can head to D. Luiz I Bridge and visit the wine cellars across the river and get the most beautiful view of Porto. There’s plenty to see within walking distance, the Cathedral, Muralha Fernandina, Torre dos Clérigos, many churches and less known spots when you venture through the narrow historical alleys. You can find plenty of restaurants, bars, cafés and shops around the flat. There are 2 paid car-parking facilities and pharmacies close by. The riverside is also perfect for a long walk towards Foz and the seaside!
host_about: Hi, my name is Sónia, I grew up in a neighbouring town by the sea, but later went to college in Porto. I lived abroad for some time, a short stay in the Netherlands followed by a few years in London. I moved back to Porto in 2006 and lived happily at Casa da Ribeira for a couple of years! The family grew and we had to move out but we will always cherish the special moments spent here! I hope you feel as cosy and at home as my family once did. I will try my best to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

name: Apartment Sao Nicolau Porto
description:
Ideally located in the historic center of Porto, the Douro River. Property in the area classified world heritage by UNESCO.
Very close: Stock Exchange Palace, St. Francis Church, Bridge D. Luiz I.
Across the Douro River, the Port Wine cellars.

The space
Apartment in the heart of Porto, in the Ribeira quay. Balcony with magnificent views over the River Douro. Recently renovated. Very near: bank, supermarket, bakery and many restaurants as well as many tourist attractions. The apartment has 45 m2 and consists of a main room with balcony overlooking the Douro River, with double bed. Separated by the staircase, it also has a toilet, a kitchen and a dining room with two windows over Rua da Fonte Taurina, one of the oldest streets in the city of Porto. The kitchen is equipped with electric plate and oven, refrigerator, microwave, coffee machine, etc.. Bathroom and hydromassage shower.
The apartment has been renovated in 2015.

Guest access</
neighborhood_overview: Ribeira is the ex-libris of Porto. Major tourist spot of the city, close to major tourist attractions, with the wine cellars of Porto right in front. And keeps the traditional experience of the city. Many traditional restaurants.
host_about:
Luis Almeida
Born in Porto, I love my town. Many interesting things to see.

name: Porto Architecture and Cool Design
description:
És apaixonado por arquitetura e queres ter uma experiência de viver num espaço desenhado! A casa está dividida em dois andares diferentes, sendo o rés-do-chão totalmente para o inquilino. O rés-do-chão tem um hall de entrada que dá acesso a um luminoso e confortável quarto amplo, de acesso direto a um bonito jardim e um quarto de banho privado. No jardim existe uma antiga estufa totalmente restaurada sendo o sítio ideal para os pequenos almoços e preparar refeições ligeiras!

The space
The house is divided in two different floors, with the first floor being occupied by the landlord and the ground floor by the tenant. The ground floor has a double bedroom and a private bathroom with a direct access to a beautiful garden.

Guest access
O espaço comum é o jardim.

Other things to note
O jardim é um espaço único e intimista de grande sossego! Com uma estufa transformada num apoio de cozinha, um pequeno lago, uma casinha par
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is calm in a really confortable area of Porto. You have any kind of shop, from a minimarket to a barbershop in the nearby. The metro stop is 7 minutes walking from the room and has lots of cheap and good places to eat, supermarkets, cafés and bars and nice squares. You can reach the more touristy areas in about 10 minutes by metro (including walking to the station) and you can walk to the same areas in less than 30 minutes.
One of the best part To stay with is is that you can have a portuguese dinner with the family. The price depends on the meal.

name: Garden apartment - walk to center
description:
Bright 2 bedroom apartment in a traditional and beautifully renovated Porto townhouse. Quiet upper floor unit facing a garden with fruit trees, an oasis of quietness in the central city. Each bedroom has its own private bathroom with shower.

The space
This is a back garden unit in a lovingly renovated traditional Porto townhouse with stark solid granite walls and wooden floors throughout.
Conveniently located about 20 min walk from the central square (Aliados) and a short walk from the Marquês metro station, yet in a quiet, very safe and authentic neighborhood.
You will find a fully equipped kitchen (stove, microwave, fridge, sink and cooking utensils) and dining area and two bedrooms, each with their private bath.

Guest access
Guests have access to their unit, comprised of kitchen/dining area and 2 bedrooms each with a private bath. Additionally, guests can use the laundry room, the garden and outdoor barbecue.

Ot
neighborhood_overview:
The Marquês neighborhood is located on the highest part of town. Traditionally a family-oriented working class area, it's comprised of a mix of new and old buildings, mostly built on traditional and unusually shaped Porto lots - only 5.5 meters wide and up to 100 meters deep!
The neighborhood remains very safe and authentic to this day, no overpriced tourist traps here! Within a 5 minute walk you will find a variety of authentic local businesses supermarkets, small grocery and fruit & veg stores, butchers, bakeries, cafes, hardware stores,...

This area is deeply associated to the history of FC Porto, the city's most successful football club whose historical first playing fields are just a few doors down the street and where you can watch young and hopeful future stars at their football school.
host_about: I have lived in the beautiful city of Porto for over 40 years and I'm happy to welcome you here!

The space
Apartamento na praia do Mindelo. 3 quartos + 1colchão insuflável.
Cozinha com frigorifico, fogão, maquina de lavar roupa, maquina de café, torradeira. 1 WC com banheira. 1 WC com base de ducha. Sala de jantar e de estar com TV. Garagem individual fechada.
Apartamento com a praia em frente a cerca de 50m e próximo da estação de metro, a cerca de 2km. Esta linha de metro passa no Aeroporto Sá Carneiro (Porto), no centro do Porto, na cidade de Vila do Conde e na cidade de Vila Nova de Gaia.
O apartamento é apenas utilizado para férias pelos proprietários, está por isso preparado com objetos úteis para a praia. Assim podem utilizar o que vos parecer útil desde que o preservem:

description:
Two bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment in a traditional and beautifully renovated Porto townhouse. Accommodates up to 4 guests.

The space
This is a front 1st floor (1 above ground) unit in a traditional Porto townhouse with stark solid granite walls and wooden floors throughout.
Conveniently located about 20 min walk from the central square (Aliados) and a short walk from the Marquês metro station, yet in a quiet, very safe and authentic neighborhood.
You will find a fully equipped kitchen (stove, microwave, fridge, sink and cooking utensils) and dining area and two bedrooms.

Guest access
Guests have access to their unit, comprised of kitchen/dining area, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom. Additionally, guests can use the shared laundry room, garden and outdoor barbecue.

Other things to note
This unit is on the upper (1st) floor of the house and access requires climbing stairs. Guests with mobility requirements can see
neighborhood_overview:
The Marquês neighborhood is located on the highest part of town. Traditionally a family-oriented working class area, it's comprised of a mix of new and old buildings, mostly built on traditional and unusually shaped Porto lots - only 5.5 meters wide and up to 100 meters deep!
The neighborhood remains very safe and authentic to this day, no overpriced tourist traps here! Within a 5 minute walk you will find a variety of authentic local businesses supermarkets, small grocery and fruit & veg stores, butchers, bakeries, cafes, hardware stores,...

This area is associated to the history of FC Porto, the city's most successful football club whose historical first playing fields are just a few doors down the street and where you can watch young and hopeful future stars at their football school.
host_about: I have lived in the beautiful city of Porto for over 40 years and I'm happy to welcome you here!

The LV Premier Clérigos RE2 is a spacious 5-bedrooms, 3 bathrooms apartment and has balconies, AC, heating and all of the amenities.
It features a large balcony in the living room and smaller balconies in 2 bedrooms. Located in city center- Clerigos area. Elevator building. Premium beds and towels. Rigorously cleaned and sanitized.

The space
The LV Premier Clérigos RE2 vacation rental apartment has 5-bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, balconies, AC, heating and all of the amenities. It features a large balcony in the living room and smaller balconies in 2 bedrooms. This LV Premier RE2 holiday rental apartment is fully equipped, and located in an elevator building. Enjoy great views of the “casario” in baixa of Porto, and Rua da Restauração. We are located close to Clérigos and Galerias de Paris and all of the major attractions of the city including museum Soares dos Reis, the downtown Ribeira area and of course the Porto wine Caves.

The apartment has A
neighborhood_overview: Close proximity of key historic sights in Porto will enable you to discover the city on foot- Clerigos tower 4min; Galerias de Paris 5min; Aliados Av- 7 min; Theater district 8-10 min, Ribeira -10 min, Gaia and the Porto wine caves crossing the bridge a leisurely 15-20 min walk.  The pedestrian shopping district of Santa Catarina is less than 15 min away on foot, and the art district around Miguel Bombarda streets are 7-10 min away.  Try to vist the nearby Foz, at the mouth of the Douro for a relaxing afternoon overlooking the sea.  A bit further ahead sample fresh and delicious seafood in the picturesque village of Matosinhos.

Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa and I'm the CEO of Feel Porto. 

Feel Porto was created with the goal of opening the doors of Porto to the world by offering the opportunity to welcome our travelers in the best accommodation apartments complemented with service excellency.

Headquartered downtown Porto it counts with a lot of properties not only in Porto but also in Matosinhos and Vila Nova de Gaia, so we can connect the city experience with the beach lifestyle.

It also has a terrace where you can enjoy outdoor meals, read a book, or just rest.
Close to transport and many shops, supermarkets and restaurants, you can discover the city walking day or night.
Ideal for a family with children or a friends group!

The space
The apartment has 3 suites with a double bed, but comfortably accommodates 2 more people in a sofa bed in the lounge. If necessary, we can also provide a travel cot and a high cheir for children.

It also has a terrace where you can enjoy outdoor meals, or just re
neighborhood_overview:
Familiar building with nice neighbours , situated on a central district.
The building is located in the city center, with many shops and restaurants close by, you can go out day and night in safety. Close to the main points of interest: Santa Catarina street, Majestic Café, Bolhão Market,...
Only a few meters from the Bolhão and Trindade metro stations. Nearby you will find all kinds of restaurants, cafes, supermarket and shopping centers . You can walk to the theater or cinema. The historic center, the Porto wine cellars and the Ribeira area at 1500 meters.
Really all within a walking distance, day or night!

The nearest supermarket is Pingo Doce. Leaving the building, turn left, at the end of the street turn right and on the first left . A few meters away you will find the supermarket (next to the Hotel Ibis sign) . It is open from 8h30 - 20h30 every day except Sunday, from 9h00-20h00.

Tourism Office, at Aliados, on the left side of the city Hall
host_about:
We are a couple, 55 and 52 years and we have two sons Pedro (28 years) and Diogo (24 years) and two doberman dogs: Lola and Zak ​​(yes, they are part of our family too!).
We decided to rent our apartment because we think it has fantastic conditions for our guests and because we like people from other countries to enjoy our town. In fact we love traveling and discovering new cultures, we believe it help us understand better our world. Our family trip: 15 days in Brazil ...
The boys are passionate about motorsport and our children participate in races. Pedro is a Motorsport Engineer in a F3 team, and lives in Italy. Diogo wants to follow his brother and he is finishing his studies in mechanics too... As parents, we are their number 1 fans. We support them, no matter what!
In our spare time, we enjoy reading, listening to music, dance and walking the dogs.
We love the place we live in, because it is calm and when we arrive home after a long day at work  we can take a walk to the beach with our dogs. 
We now have a co-host, Diogo, who help us managing the bookings and the apartment.
Please enjoy our fantastic city and do not hesitate to ask for more details. Help us preparing your stay and make it a wonderful time with us.

This 1 bedroom apartment is situated near "Cedofeita", 10 minutes walking distance from dowtown and historical center, an area classified as world´s heritage and close to the Art Galleries “Boulevard".

The space

O'Porto Torrinha Flat is a cozy and spacious apartment with plenty of natural light and has a very nice balcony in the living room.
In its vicinity, this apartment has all kind of services: public transport, a supermarket (500 meters), several restaurants, as well as various places of
neighborhood_overview:
O´Porto Torrinha Flat is located at the beginning of the center of Porto, in an artery with easy access to the historical center and all the attractions of Porto downtown (Douro River, Aliados, Clérigos, etc.). Its location also allows a quick access, by metro, to Foz and Boavista area, giving you the opportunity to know the lifestyle of the Portuguese people without any effort and with all the security of this city. In its vicinity, you will find all the necessary amenities: supermarkets, pharmacies, bakeries, restaurants and cafes ...
At night, you can go by foot to get to know the city and its fun.
Get to know Porto and the secular history and the artistic legacy. Find culture, architecture (expressed in a variety of museums), theaters, cinemas and international music festivals.
Get to know the history of Port Wine, its cellars and the Douro river farms above.
host_about:
“My Flat” é uma empresa especializada na gestão de Alojamento Local (AL).
Eu, responsável da “My Flat”, iniciei a minha atividade neste mercado no ano de 2014.

name: Quinta da Avessada
description:
Quinta da Avessada is a small Rural and ecological property located near Arouca, on the banks of Urtigosa and close to the limpid Paiva and Paivô rivers , lies 6 km from the center of Arouca village and 50km from Porto. An Unmissable place.

The space
Arouca is definitely a place to visit. Those who come always come back. On the green landscapes of the "Entre Douro e Vouga" region, is located the Vale do Rio Urtigosa, where we can find a natural and preserved heritage, surrounded by the imposing Serra da Freita.
Quinta da Avessada is a small Rural Tourism property located in Rossas, Arouca municipality, on the banks of Urtigosa river and close to the limpid rivers Paiva and Paivô. Quinta da Avessada lies 6 km from the center of Arouca village and about 40km from Oporto. It is located on a farm on the slopes of Serra da Freita, offering a unique atmosphere of calm and well-being, envolved on a countryside; perfect for those who want to move away from the bus

name: Room "HAPPY", private residence.
description:
The accommodation is spacious and i's located in a quiet area of Oporto historic zone and downtown, where the "movida" happens with restaurants and bars are opened all over the night. The public transports are frequent and they serves the area of beaches and cultural spaces as the Serralves Foundation with the exhibition of works by Joan Miró, for example. Hundred meters ahead for both sides of the house's main entrance there are two brands of supermarkets. Pingo doce and Continente Bom dia.

The space
Building recently rehabilitated offer three rooms, the "Happy" with two single beds, the "Zen" and "Time" with double beds. All rooms are equipped with cable TV and WiFi internet connection also extensive throughout the house.
The kitchen is equipped with induction hob, washing machine, microwave, refrigerator, fryer, cutlery and pots and small appliances.
The bathroom has bath cabin and heater.
The house has a small garden where it's possible serve
neighborhood_overview:
The area of the accommodation is quiet and safe and is located 3.5 km from the downtown and historic area of Porto. Parking near the accommodation is possible free of charge and paid at places on the public thoroughfare.
There are two supermarkets: the "Pingo Doce", about 100 meters and more recently the "Continente Bom Dia", about 150 meters from the accommodation.

description:
This is a cosy one bedroom apartment, close to the Douro river, Ribeira area and some of Porto's top atractions like Palácio da Bolsa, Ponte D. Luís, Wine Cellars. You can also find great restaurants and beautiful narrow streets.

The space
Charming loft with separate bedroom, offering beautiful views of the city and the Douro.
In the heart of the historic center of Porto, the loft "S. Francisco" was renovated in 2017 in a contemporary spirit and now has reversible air conditioning (hot and cold) in each room. Very bright, the apartment is on the 5th and last floor of a centenary building (without elevator), typically Portuan, 50 meters from the public parking “Alfandega”.

Ideally located for a tourist stay in Porto, our apartment is located a few steps from the river Douro with its river cruises and the Luis Bridge, the main historical and tourist buildings such as the S. Francisco church, Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges market... but also the
neighborhood_overview:
It is one of the most typical neighborhoods of Porto, where the inhabitants still live and where you will be welcome in their daily life that you will be able to observe.
It is an ideal location to enjoy most tourist attractions on foot or by bus or tram N°1 while being able to leave your car parked nearby in a public car park.

The accommodation is spacious and i's located in a quiet area of Oporto historic zone and downtown, where the "movida" happens with restaurants and bars are opened all over the night. The public transports are frequent and they serves the area of beaches and cultural spaces as the Serralves Foundation with the exhibition of works by Joan Miró, for example. The bathroom has bath cabin and heater.
The house has a small garden where it's possible serve

name: DOWNTOWN DESIGN APARTMENT – S. Domingos
description:
Designed and decorated by its owners, the space seeks to reflect their way of life and living. Modern architecture in the heart of Porto's historic center – UNESCO World Heritage Site – is located in one of the city's reference area – an animated place where art, culture and architecture breathe in healthy coexistence with cafes and restaurants for all tastes, and where you can move on foot everywhere!

The space
Cool and bright apartment in the heart of the historic center of Porto.
It consists of a living room, a bedroom with a large bed and a mezzanine with two single mattresses in a space designed with architectural refinement for a pleasant experience!
A sofa bed is also available in the living room.

Guest access
Guests have free access to the entire apartment.

License number
55361/AL
neighborhood_overview:
Ribeira disctrit — the old and now extremely fashionable city is right here! The place where the marvellous Douro river breaths in its all splendour.

Our apartment is just 3 minutes walking distance from the river, from Palácio da Bolsa, the Cathedral, the S. Francisco Church, the fascinating Clérigos tower, the beautiful bookshop Lello, and from the iconic architectural bridge — D. Luís, engineered by the Belgian Théophile Seyrig, that previously had worked with Gustave Eiffel himself in the nearby D. Maria bridge. Crossing it you can have all the most worthy celars of the world famous Port Wine.

Just in front of the apartment (in the very beginning of Rua das Flores) you can visit the brand new Misericórdia Museum, a place where you can have the opportunity to get to know better this part of town. The museological space includes the Misericórdia Church and the Gallery of Benefactors, an example of the architecture of iron and glass in the city. Built in the six
host_about:
Greetings!

I'm Sónia [and Pedro] and we are delighted to welcome you, so we love to meet new people!

We're both in the performing arts field: I'm an actress who works regularly with contemporary dance, Pedro is a composer and contemporary music editor.

This place, our work studio for several years and where we've completed several artistic projects, has now been transformed with the purpose of receiving people all around the world.

In here is some of our own way of being. The furniture, as well as all the single objects, came directly from our own home.

Welcome to our apartment – Enjoy your stay!

name: Explore Porto's From a Charming Flat in Se - with River View
description:
Wake up to picturesque views of the Douro River from this enchanting gem boasting eclectic furnishings, vibrant artworks, and parquet wood floors. Fix breakfast in a bright, white-tiled kitchen and dine at a hip table, next to a wood burning stove.

The flat is located in the back of Porto's Cathedral, in the middle of UNESCO World Heritage area, with an amazing view to the Douro river from all the flat's windows. It's a great choice and location if you want to discover the city on foot!

Located in the center of Porto, right in the heart of the Old Town, a step away from the riverside.

License number
21573/AL
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a restored building behind the Porto Cathedral in the historic Sé parish. Steps away is Ribeira Square’s delightful restaurants, wine bars, shops, and boat cruises. Some of Porto's most essential landmarks dot the immediate area.
The Barredo neighborhood is one of the most picturesque areas on the city, and you will feel a true local, right in the heart of Porto's Old Town.
host_about:
I was born in Porto, lived here almost all my life, and I think this is the most beautiful place in the world to live in. 
I studied History in University and I love to share with my friends all the curiosities I know of the city history. 
I'm very glad to welcome you to the "European best destination 2017"!

name: Sea man house
description:
The house is in the first line of sea. Is a tradicional sea side house .
It was my fathers house and is a perfect place for a holiday by the sea.
It has a courtyard to east where you can enjoy the morning sun for breakfast and other facing west on the sea side. there are two litle houses near by where sometimes my daughters stay..
The garden gives direct access to the beach.Perfect for children cause theres no cars passing by..
Facing the sea you have a litle terrass ...

The space
This is a tradicional house from the seaside. Me and my daughters have been triyng to make it cosy but still keep its original character.
The ambience is a mix of a fishermans house and a summer house by the sea.
We kept the white wooden furniture in the kitchen and the hall.
Is a perfect space, not modern, but with soul. Both couples or families will find it , we hope , a special space. Children can easily and safely play since theres no cars
neighborhood_overview:
Aguda is a small fishing village still with auction and sale of fish in the morning. It is a quiet beach, but alive!
There are some cafes, two small supermarkets, bakery, restaurants and a pizzeria. The medical center is two minutes walk from the house.
You realy feel theres still a sense of a fishermans village comunity!!
host_about: My name is Odete.I Like travelling, reading, and nice dinners with good friends and my close family. I live in Aguda, not far from my fathers house that is the "Sea Man House". Me and my daughters, Célia and Rute will be here to meet you and help you during your stay.

name: Large Studio with great views - Clérigos
description:
Our beautiful studio apartment is located in the heart of Porto, with all landmarks at walking distance. Enjoy the exquisite view to Jardim das Oliveiras and almost touch Torre dos Clérigos as you stretch your arms in the morning!

The space
Located in the heart of Porto - you can almost touch Torre dos Clérigos when you stretch your arms in the morning! Picture-postcard view, with several landmarks and the beautiful olive tree garden visible from your bed. And a different twist when you get in - we furnished and decorated the apartment with products made by young Portuguese designers and artists. But with no fuss. We just want to offer you the possibility to experience what is done best in Portugal while supporting small scale entrepreneurs.

Guest access
The apartment accommodates up to 2 people and has all amenities needed for you to feel at home. Upon request we can provide a baby cot.

Other things to note
The apar
neighborhood_overview:
Well, this is quintessential Porto downtown. You can basically walk to all pins in the map. Jog by the river Douro in the morning, stroll by Aliados in the afternoon and hit Galerias de Paris for nightlife!

Due to its very central location you may sometimes experience a background noise from people in the street, but hopefully that will not disturb your sleep!
host_about:
Tripas-Coração is a collective of friends, all born and rooted in Porto. We aim at greeting people like we would like to be greeted; in homes where we would like to live in; and show the places in our city where the real Porto culture still prevails.

We all love to travel, just like you. We are all born and raised in Porto. Even though, we travel constantly, for work or fun..., Porto is where home is! 

Our hosts across the world have made our journeys memorable - that hidden square, that restaurant with no english menus, unexpected block parties or that book left on the bedside table. Come visit us in Porto and we will return the favour! 

Most of the times, Filipe, Tiago & Sara will be your hosts, but whenever possible João, Nuno & Melo will come to meet you too!

The space
In this apartment you feel young and at home. The apartment still has the original trace of a University student.

In the kitchen, you have all the cooking equipment to do a magnificent dinner or just having your breakfast.
You can also use the washing machine to do your laundry.
The balcony in the living room is ideal for people smoking.

neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood have a lot of young people, because it's close to Universities. It has restaurants, coffees, pharmacy, supermarket, gimnasio and banks near.
host_about:
I'm a 41 years old business woman that lives in Oporto, but I am definitely a country girl. My roots are from Montalegre and I really love going there every weekend to make some outdoor activity  or do some farm. 
My parents live there all year and our family house is very big. In the Summer we plant plenty of vegetables and collect different fruits and berries. I truly enjoy this healthy life,  although I can't live without the frenetic rhythm of the city!
I invite you to experience both lifestyles, stay at my place in the busy city of Oporto and enjoy the peaceful Country side of Portugal at my parents home in Montalegre.

neighborhood_overview:
This studio is located downtown Porto, Rua Formosa nº54, is about 450mts from the Bolhão Metro Station and very close to all points of interest in downtown Porto, from here you can visit all of them on foot, not need a car!
In each accommodation is available with an Induction Manual of studios and also our suggestions to try the Port such as wine tasting, museums and heritage, historic center, architecture, culture and recreation, river, sea, open air, shopping, dining, nightlife and fashion.
host_about:
Somos uma empresa familiar especializada em prestação de serviços para Alojamento Local no conselho do Porto. Dispomos de 2 prédios na baixa do Porto, desde 2014 na gestão de propriedades, fomos capazes de nos adaptar às diferentes necessidades dos nossos clientes para lhes oferecer o melhor serviço possível.
Sabemos que a nossa recomendação é a satisfação dos nossos clientes. O nosso serviço está disponível 24 horas por dia, sete dias por semana!
Relaxe e deixe-nos cuidar de todos os aspetos de gestão e manutenção do seu imóvel.
Sinta-se livre para fazer qualquer pergunta por email, telemóvel ou pessoal e vamos responder a quaisquer perguntas ou preocupações que você possa ter.

Access to the whole house.

name: Aniki Porto Riverside
description:
Enjoy this 3 bedroom apartment where you have fabulous views over the Luis I bridge, the river Douro and the port wine lodges.
It's located in the historic city centre, in a quiet neighbourhood. Most of the main touristic attractions are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (metro, train, bus) nearby.
It has a spacious living room and can accommodate up to 6 guests.

The space
The building is located in the historic city centre, on the hill, halfway between the Cathedral of Porto and Luis I bridge, in Ribeira. To the apartments there is pedestrian access only, along 80 steps/stairs, (please see last photo on the website) either down from the Cathedral or up from the river. It may be a drawback if you have mobility concerns, but it does afford you privacy, peacefulness and fabulous views in one of the most genuine quarters of Porto :-)

Other things to note
Discounts apply on weekly and monthly rates.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 minutes walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 minutes from the cathedral, and 5 minutes from São Bento station.
It is perfectly placed to visit the world heritage site of Porto city centre. Go down to the Ribeira to watch the world go by in a riverside cafe, or to take a river trip up the Douro to see the Port wine vineyards. Walk across the river to sample wines in the port wine lodges in Gaia. Visit the Cathedral, the Clérigos Tower and the colourful Bolhão market. Visit the Serralves Museum, one of the best art galleries in Europe, and the Casa da Música, an incredible work of contemporary architecture. Take in the cafes, bars, restaurants and clubs of the city. It's all on your doorstep.
host_about: Please don't hesitate to contact me for further information.

The neighborhood is incredibly central and only a few minutes from the main avenues in Porto. It is safe and very quiet allowing you to walk easily to all the main hot spots, it's also close distance to public transport I.e bus, taxi, metro stations should you need them.
Given its privileged location you would be within walking distance of pharmacy, paid parking, supermarket, shopping center, restaurants, cafes, bakery, bookstores, traditional shops, alternative shops of retro-cool furniture, music and urban culture in addition to several art galleries and artists' studios located on the famous Rua Miguel Bombarda (300 meters).

We look forward to hosting your next adventure in Porto !

name: Trindade House. Cozy fully equiped!
description: Trindade House is a studio for 2, Porto Downtown, Just in front of Central metro station Trindade.  Perfect location , near Aliados, Staº Catarina street,  Majestic Café, Lello Library, 10 minuts walking from Ribeira and 5 from Night Spot.
host_about:
Vivo na cidade do Porto em Portugal.
Tenho 59 anos, falo inglês, francês e espanhol.
Gosto de viajar; Conhecer novas gentes e novos lugares.
Conheço quase todas as capitais europeias e,  de África, já estive em Marrocos e na ´Tunísia.
A Paris já fui 2 vezes mas é uma ciadade aonde apetece voltar mais vezes; Oh Paris, toujours Paris!! ;-))
Gosto de animais mas o meu preferido é o gato; Adoro a sua indepêndencia e auto confiança; Neste momento partilhamos a  casa com o  gato "Félix" que vive connosco há 13 anos.
Gosto do Verão e das suas noites quentes, de flores,  de chocolate, de praia, de passar um fim de semana no campo, de ler e cinema.
Em viagem sempre fiquei hospedada em hoteis mas, descobri a Airbnb através do meu filho que é um anfitrião aqui na cidade do Porto/Portugal e, como a oferta de apartamentos é tão boa, decidi experimentar; É a minha primeira vez ;-) Espero que corra bem!
Aos anfitrioes digo que os seus apartamentos ficam em boas mãos; Sou uma mulher muito organizada e cuidadosa; Se duvidar, consulte o meu horóscopo; Sou do signo Virgem, logo,  mais perfeccionista não há, LOL!!!

Ideally located at Porto's Soho you are walking distance from all major touristic points in a calm neighbourhood w/ all kinds of cafes, restaurants , shops..

Welcome to your Porto home!

The space
This brand new renovated apartment is a duplex with an inner courtyard, upstairs balcony and private garden. A sunken kitchen and living room area leads out to the garden and is closed off from the ground floor bedroom by original floor-to-ceiling shutters.
The upstairs bedroom has its own seating area, work desk and bathroom.
Meals can be taken at the kitchen's marble island or at a long oak table.
There's one sofa-bed in the l
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the downtown art district is this beautiful 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom garden apartment.
Start the day in harmony or relax in our amazing garden after a busy day exploring the city. Nearby you'll find several art galleries in the Art District, as well as convenient shopping in Rua Cedofeita which is overflowing with cafes and chic boutiques. Cedofeita lets out onto the city's main cultural landmarks in the sloping Baixa and Ribeira (waterfront) districts, all within a 5-10 minute walk!
host_about:
We’re Eric, Agata & Aaron, Berlin transplants via the US and Poland. We fell in love with Porto several years back, especially the Cedofeita neighborhood.
We hope you enjoy the city and the time you spend here at Torrinha 96 is a big part of that. We’ve designed this apartment to be light-filled and close to nature.

description:
The fusion of traditional and contemporary architecture. Suspended bed.

The space
In a fully restored building, Priorado Studio has excellent views over green gardens of Priorado Square (Largo do Priorado) and the oldest church in Porto - Church of Cedofeita, giving a feeling of great openness, not usual in the urban Porto tissue, mostly defined by narrow streets. The bathroom is lined with innovative building materials generating unusual environmental atmospheres. Guest access
All the apartment!

description:
This 1 bedroom apartment is situated near the "Jardim S. Lázaro", 10 minutes walking distance from dowtown and historical center, an area classified as world´s heritage...
The ideal apartment to visit the magnificent city of Porto and northern Portugal, with family or a group of friends up to 4 persons. Comfortable and spacious, with contemporary decor, with a quality furniture and equipment.

The space
The famous Santa Catarina street, where you can find all the main shops of the city, is only a 10 minutes walking distance.
The apartment is fully furnished, with a super well equipped kitchen, ready to welcome you with all comfort!
O'Porto Fontainhas Flat is a cozy and spacious apartment with plenty of natural light and has a very nice balcony in front of the building. There is also a private parking space for one car.
In its vicinity, this apartment has all kinds of services: public transports, a supermarket (500 meters), several restaurants,
neighborhood_overview:
Fontainhas street is located at the beginning of the center of Porto, in an artery with easy access to the historical center and all the attractions of Porto downtown (Douro River, Aliados, Clérigos, etc.). Its location also allows a quick access, by metro, to Foz and Boavista area, giving you the opportunity to know the lifestyle of the Portuguese people without any effort and with all the security of this city. In its vicinity, you will find all the necessary amenities: supermarkets, pharmacies, bakeries, restaurants and cafes ...
At night, you can go by foot to get to know the city and its fun.
Get to know Porto and the secular history and the artistic legacy. Find culture, architecture (expressed in a variety of museums), theaters, cinemas and international music festivals.
Get to know the history of Port Wine, its cellars and the Douro river farms above.

Surronded for some of the main touristic points of interest in town.
Right in the heart of Porto heritage Unesco is located in the charming and popular Ferreira Borges Street. Close to the Ribeira, Clérigos Tower and São Bento Train Station, this will be the perfect place for your stay.

The space
A nice and big one room apartment located in a rebuid historic building with lift. The apartment is completely new, has wifi, a fully equipped kitchnet, a storage room, a nice large bathroom including towels and linen, a large room with one comfortable queen size bed (1.60x2.00), nice views, and a large living room with Led TV where you can relax and take a nice break of your day. The sofa in the living room transforms in a very good sofa bed (1.40x2.0
neighborhood_overview: At this moment, one of the most beautiful places of the city of Porto. Ferreira Borges street in one of the most important streets of Porto, and you will be at 2 minutes walking distance from the most famouse place in Porto (Ribeira). Many of the tourist attractions can be visited on foot (São Bento, Aliados Avenue, Clérigos Church, Lello Library, Stock market Palace, and more!) The main streets of nightlife are also within walking distance. Is only 300 meters away from the São Bento station (Metro and Train) and only two metro stops (3 min) away from the Trindade metro station, where you can access all metro lines. João

Two bedroom apartment in the historic zone of Gaia, 2 minutes walk to the river, 15 to Oporto oldtown, excelent location, nice view over Rio Douro in a quiet peacefull neighbourhood. Good for wine trips for it is located in the middle of Porto cellars and warehouses.

The space
One double room (couple bed)
One double room (two single beds)
Living room with Smart TV and CD player
Fully equiped kitchen
Toilette

Guests have full access to all areas described in the add, and to a small pátio outsider the house where you can relax or hang your clothes.

host_about: Olá, o meu nome é Manuel e nasci e cresci no Porto. Adoro esta cidade e espero que vocês a adorem também! O apartamento que estou a alugar é em pleno centro do Porto num edifício que emana história. Trabalho no ramo do restauro e tenho muito interesse em partilhar o meu amor pelo Porto com pessoas de outras nacionalidades. Também posso facilitar o utilizo de um carro antigo para passeios na Baixa do Porto.

name: Agradable Room Style
description:
Espaço único, estilo do mobiliário é uma mistura entre o moderno e o antigo, ambiente sossegado e tranquilo. Muito central, perto da estação de Metro Casa da Música, bancos, supermercados, ao lado do Shopping, venha descobrir e amar esta cidade. Single space, furniture style is a mix between the modern and the ancient, peaceful and quiet environment. Very central, near the Metro Station Casa da Música, banks, supermarkets, next to the shopping, discover and love this city.

The space
Um espaço com um estilo entre o moderno e o antigo, móveis de família, origem de décadas atrás, isso o torno um ambiente único.
O quarto também possui uma mesa para trabalho.

Guest access
O hóspede terá acesso a casa inteira, onde o quarto é privativo e as demais acomodações da casa são compartilhadas.

host_about:
Family is very important to me.
I like reading, cinema, stroll along the beach by the seaside, I really love the smell of the sea!
I am keen on interchanging ideas and experiences with other people, on learning - I am currently learning foreign languages - and travelling.
I try to make my guests feel at home whilst giving them space and autonomy.

name: Douro Azul
description:
Large, space, full of light. Very quiet.
Overlooking the sea and sunset.
10 minutes walk from the metro station - Santo Ovídeo.
By Metro 10 minutes away from Porto's historic center. Very close to the hospital Santos Silva

The space
A opção de virem para o nosso pais em particular para o Norte, cidades de Gaia e Porto, é bastante acertada. Na cidade de Gaia, na zona ribeirinha, junto ao rio Douro, encontram-se as famosas caves do vinho do Porto. A vista para a cidade do Porto é de cortar a respiração, é única.

Guest access
Acesso ao quarto, a uma casa de banho completa, à sala da tv e à varanda solário. Também poderão utilizar o frigorífico e cozinha para tomarem o pequeno almoço.
Disponibilizo duas bicicletas.
host_about: Good mood, amusing. I like nature, outdoor sports, music, cinema, get along with people with good energy. I am interested in different cultures.

name: Breath Taking Views
description:
It is an renewed apartment in the historic center, on the side of the Porto wine cellars. Therefore is at walking distance of everything, but in a quite place!
It offers the most amazing views over the river and the historic center, with the comfort of a spacious and modern apartment.

The space
The apartment is in the historic centre, few minutes away of the main attractions.
The apartment was renewed and has a lot of space and a free close parking free, inside the building which is unique in the historic centre.
There is air conditioned in all bed rooms and living room.

Guest access
You can use all the apartment.
You can smoke in the balcony.

Other things to note
- This apartment is a reputable, legally registered and recognized rental, fully registered at Turismo de Portugal (15528/AL) and supervised by the local authorities, Câmara Municipal do Porto and ASAE. This accreditation can be checke
neighborhood_overview: The location of the apartment is on the side of the Porto wine cellars, where are the majority of the restaurants, bars and esplanades facing Porto.
host_about:
Olá! Nós somos a Joana e o Miguel. Adoramos conhecer outras pessoas, especialmente aquelas que gostam de viver a vida, de forma positiva.
Somos responsáveis, sociáveis, pontuais. "Respeito" é a palavra que melhor define os nossos valores. E o nosso lema é "trata os outros, como gostarias que te tratassem a ti".
Gostamos de viajar e de ter novas experiências, que contribuam para enriquecer as nossas vidas. O conhecimento é a nossa ambição e a nossa família e amigos são a uma paixão.
Se quiserem saber mais de nós, não hesitem em perguntar ou conhecer-nos pessoalmente!
