name: Casas de Sant'Ana Oporto Apt 1
description:
The house is located in the historic center of Porto, World Heritage of UNESCO, in the oldest street of the city. Is part of a building with 3 dwellings rehabilitated in May 2015.

The space
The house is located in the historic center of Porto, World heritage of UNESCO, in the oldest street of the city. Is part of a building with 3 dwellings rehabilitated in May 2015. Ideal for two to four people.
The house is about 45m2 and it's a duplex. It is equipped with a double bed in the bedroom and a sofa with two single beds in the living room, a bathroom and kitchen fully equipped.
The location is privileged to discover the historic center of Porto on foot. Just a few meters are two of the most beautiful sights of the city. If you prefer to use the metro, the station of S. Bento is just 5 minutes away. At the same distance, going down towards the Douro River, you will be in Ribeira, and crossing the bridge D. Luiz you can visit the Oporto wine cellars.

description:
- This room is suitable for 2 people with two single beds.
It includes towels and bedding.
It has a mini kitchen and a terrace at your disposal.
- Private bathroom
Free Wi-Fi Internet.

Inspiring room with a relaxing terrace is a welcome place that allows guests to enjoy unique moments of tranquility.
It is set in a 3 floor house which has recently been renovated. It is in a quiet neighborhood 50 meters from Rua (street) Santa Catarina.

The space
- Oporto Private Room/Terrace has been recently refurbished but retains the original wooden floor. It has excellent natural light, is large (25 m2) and is located on the top floor in a three-story house. On the middle floor has three bedrooms and I live on the ground floor.

- The bedroom consists of two single beds and a closet.
- You can enjoy the private and sunny terrace. You have outdoor seating to relax on sunny days after touring the city. Check out our photos!
neighborhood_overview:
- Oporto Private Room/Terrace is in a quiet neighborhood and 50 meters from rua (street) Santa Catarina, one of Porto's main shopping streets, is a 10-minute walk from the pedestrian zone.
- 300 meters from Bolhão metro station with direct line to Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, 40 minutes.

Due to its exceptional location, it allows you to get around on foot, starting to explore the surrounding area: from tourist sites, shops / stores, traditional businesses, Ferreira Borges market, Avenida dos Aliados, emblematic monuments, art galleries, Douro river , Port Wine Cellars and nightlife area.

Quick access and wide range of public transport.
- Metro: Line (E) direct to the airport. 40 minutes
- Train: The Campanhã station has direct access to the metro.
- Bus 100 meters away

host_about:
I´m a single father of a beautiful eight years old girl called KIka, that rules my world. With a degree in Social Communication, i´ve worked as a journalist in a newspaper, a radio and a TV. After that i become a creative copywriter in a advertising agency, and later embraced my huge passion and start giving surf lessons. Hosting appeared in my life as a casuality, and now is my main occupation. I´m an easy going and friendly guy, that put all my effort in turning your stay with me a really unforgettable experience.
 I´M EAGER TO BE YOUR HOST

name: Bright Suite
description:
I´m happy to welcome people in my new flat! Everything is new and you will have a private bathroom with everything you might need. By the river, bus connections to town and the beach. Perfect if you enjoy walking and bike tours!

Other things to note
You have buses going both downtown and to the beach. This is a residential street close to the river, I guarantee you a silent sleep. The buses would take 20/30 min downtown and a taxi should be 6/8 euros. The city is small so this is not far. There is s supermarket just here and Im usually helpful with all the tips you need.
host_about: Hi! I´m a 31 year old artist and I´m happy to welcome guests in my new apartment. It´s a bright, peaceful, dog friendly and clean flat near the river, in a 15/25 min distance from the centre and not far from the sea, in a residential street with buses and a supermarket just here. Porto is small and easy town and I´m happy to help people around whenever I´m free. I will provide useful information and links in advance. This room is on the oposite side of the apartment so you have a lot of privacy. It´s small but quiet and it has a double bed and a private wc, next to the kitchen, where you´re welcome to cook and sit. The living room is big and confortable and we share it. Feel free to book if these conditions suit your trip to Porto, and specially if you´re communicative but respectful.

name: Casa de Madeira
description:
Parte inferior da Casa de madeira situada em Ferreiros, freguesia de Palmaz concelho de Oliveira de Azeméis,com Cozinha, 1 quartos casal, 1 quarto c/ 2 camas solteiro, 1 closed contíguo ao quarto de casal com 1 beliche de solteiro duplo,1 WC, sala, televisão, vista para serra da freita, a 6 km da cidade, com restaurante a 400 metros e minimercado a 60. Esta descrição diz respeito à parte inferior da casa, pois no andar superior vive o proprietário.

The space
Pequena quinta com a área de 1300 m2. Árvores em redor (carvalhos, cerejeiras, figueiras e oliveiras. Espaço para 4 carros no exterior. Galinheiro com 30 aves. Piscina de alumínio de 3.5 metros de diâmetro e 1 metro de altura

Guest access
Os hóspedes têm acesso total à quinta e só compartilham com o proprietário que vive na parte superior da casa.

Other things to note
Bons acessos. Minimercado a 60 metros. Restaurante a 400 metros. Mais restaurantes a partir de
neighborhood_overview: Casario antigo misturado com o moderno (moderno infelizmente mais). Gente muito dócil, mas vigilante. No minimercado, o Sr Joaquim e a D. Carmina são uns amores. Há de tudo, bebidas, mercearia, frutas, pão, etc....embora, por vezes, não tenha a marca que pretendemos.
host_about: Pessoa o mais normal possível. Contabilista de profissão.

name: no Porto, Casa da Música, bus metro
description:
Prédio sossegado, perto da Casa da Música, Boavista, transportes à porta de casa, Bus, Metro, como é na baixa do Porto dá para ir de metro ou a pé para todo o lado, incluindo zona histórica, Ribeira, Vila Nova de Gaia, ao Rio e Foz
do Douro.

The space
Lugar acolhedor com gente simpática

Guest access
Cozinha, sala de jantar

Other things to note
Reforço uma vez mais que só posso aceitar reservas de hóspedes do sexo feminino ou casal, porque só disponho de uma casa de banho.
neighborhood_overview: Bairro sossegado e muito central. Onde poderá aceder ao Centro da Cidade a pé,  metro ou Bus.
host_about:
sexo feminino, trabalhadora independente, bem disposta, acolhedora, tenho um gatinho chamado Carlitos, muito meigo, sossegado, gosto de conversar, conhecer novas pessoas com ideias arejadas, gosto de sossego, de viajar, ver sítios diferentes conhecer e partilhar ideias. Escrever, ler e ouvir música. Proporciono um bom ambiente em casa, gosto de ter a casa limpa e arrumada. Destinos de viagem já tive vários na Europa Central, Paris, Londres, Bélgica, Holanda, Polónia, Espanha, várias cidades e lugares, Marrocos, Sul de Espanha, Tunísia. Gostava de ir ao Brasil,  Amsterdão e outros destinos quando me for possível. Gosto de quase todos os tipos de música, desde a clássica à moderna, música portuguesa de várias regiões. Gosto de comer coisas tradicionais portuguesas, mas neste momento tenho que fazer dieta. Filmes: gosto de muitos, um que não dispenso - Casablanca, policiais, informativos, etc. Livros: literatura francesa, inglesa, portuguesa claro, espanhola.
Lema de vida: apesar das dificuldades da vida, ser sempre otimista, ir mais além, seguir em frente de cabeça erguida, nunca desistir perante as adversidades, ser honesta, estar sempre pronta a ajudar quem precisa, ser amiga, ser boa ouvinte. Hospedar alguém é dar atenção, acomodar, fazer que a outra pessoa se sinta bem, tenha confiança, partilhe experiências comigo de várias ordens, intelectuais, culturais, de costumes e ideias.

name: Appart.near the beach/metro station
description:
Very comfortable apartment with 2 rooms in the fishing village of Caxinas, between Vila do Conde and Povoa Varzim.Located 5 minutes walk from the beach and metro.
What to do: beach, surfing, biking, boating...
Porto center 35 minutes (Metro ride).

The space
Comfortable and quiet refuge, with wi-fi.
2 bedrooms: 1 bedroom with double bed and bathroom with jacuzzi and another room with 2 single beds. Sheets available.
Complete social bathroom. Bath and face towels available .
Kitchen with fridge, dishwasher, oven, microwave, etc.
Dining room very spacious, fully furnished and with TV.

WHAT YOU CAN DO: beach, surf, bike or boat rides or nice walkaways alonside the ocean or the river.

It is mandatory to enjoy the friendliness of the fishing village of Caxinas and ITS inhabitants as well as it's local cuisine.

YOU still can choose to go on a visit to neighbor city of Porto, whose center is accessible via
neighborhood_overview: Caxinas is a place belonging to 'Vila do Conde' that borders the city of Povoa de Varzim. Predominate among the population, activities related to fishing, either directly in the fishing activity and in the derived industries (canning and frozen).
host_location: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
host_about:
Olá, sou o Oliveiros.

Adoro viajar e não me importo de repetir os meus destinos preferidos. Paris 'enche-me as medidas'. Sou um apaixonado pelo desporto em geral e pelo futebol, golfe, ténis e ciclismo em particular. Estes são, aliás, os meus hobbies de eleição.

A 'Francesinha' é a minha iguaria preferida ;-) .

Gosto muito de receber pessoas e fascina-me a ideia de poder ajudar a criar uma boa experiência.

Além do conforto proporcionado pelos meus espaços e pela atmosfera e acolhimento simpáticos do portugueses em geral e dos nortenhos em particular, os nossos hóspedes podem contar com o nosso apoio.

Um abraço.
Até breve!

Hello, I'm Oliveiros .

I love traveling and I don't mind to repeat my preferred destinations, Paris on top. 
I am a passionate about sports in general, football, golf, tennis and cycling in particular. These are, indeed, my preferred hobbies.

'Francesinha' - the absolute BEST 'kind-of-sandwich' You will EVER taste - is my favourite food.

I love to host people and the idea of helping or making part of a nice new experience, just fascinates me.

In addition to the comfort provided by my spaces and the friendly atmosphere and welcome of the Portuguese in general and the northerners in particular, our guests can count on our support.

See you soon!
Best!

name: Heritage Apartment & Balcony_Historic Downtown 1
description:
In Porto historic downtown, this Heritage Apartment & Balcony (sleeps 2-4) is located in a fully renovated historic building with elevator, walking distance to Clerigos Tower, Lello Bookshop and Praça Liberdade (main square), in the most trendy artsy neighborhood. With 1 bedroom (2 single beds), living-room (sofa-bed), sunny balcony, fully equipped kitchen, modern wc with shower, it's ideal for couples and family. Very central, yet quiet, it is the perfect stay for holidays & romance! (16829/AL)

The space
This Heritage Apartment with Balcony is located on the 3rd floor, in a XIX century historic building fully renovated, with elevator. The guests can enjoy the authenticity of an historic townhouse with the comfort of a modern design apartment. It has a twin bedroom (2 single beds 90x200cm). It has a living-room with a sofa bed (140x200cm, sleeps 2), and a long balcony along all the facade, perfect for a sunny breakfast or a drink in the evening. It has a kitchene
neighborhood_overview:
Heritage Apartment with Balcony is located in Porto's art district, in downtown historical area. In a creative neighborhood with young designers and nice shops, it is 5 min. walking to Clérigos Tower, Lello Bookshop, 10 min. walking to Praça Liberdade (main square), and around 20min. walking to the river Douro and the Cathedral area. All the emblematic places are at walking distance, as well as nice Parks to relax.
Although being around the corner to the most livable area in town (restaurants, cafés and night life area), Design Apartment it is still quiet enough to provide you a relaxed stay in the most trendy area in Porto - a perfect combination!
host_about:
Hello!

I am an architect and independent curator based in Porto. I have studied and lived in Berlin, Zurich and Paris, and it is always a pleasure to welcome guests from all over the world and share with them what I know about Porto!
Hopefully, this city will be one of those places you will not forget!

name: ORM - Bolhão 01 Apartment
description:
Rehabilitated apartment with a contemporary architecture, located on the 2nd floor of a centenary building in which the old facade was maintained.
Located in Rua Fernandes Tomás, close to the Bolhão Market, in the downtown of Porto, an area of varied and tradicional shops.

Open-space apartment with 1 double bed and 1 bathroom with shower, with fully equipped kitchen and balcony with access to the main street.

Ideal for 1 - 2 persons.

Prices vary according to the seasons.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

This apartment is located on Rua de Fernandes Tomás, near the Bolhão Market, a typical traditional market in the center of Porto, offering local products and great diversity, as well as a traditional atmosphere. It is called Bolhão because of its proximity to the market.

It has as main points of interest the street of Santa Catarina and A
neighborhood_overview:
Building located in the street Rua Fernandes Tomás, where is also located the famous Bolhão Market, one of the most emblematic buildings of the city, which is intended mainly for fresh products, especially food.
Nearby, worth mentioning is the Trindade metro station (main metro station), the Porto City Hall, located in the beautiful Avenida dos Aliados, and Rua Santa Catarina, the main street of the traditional commerce of Porto.
A few minutes walking from the main sights of the city, as well as the area where the cafes, bars and nightlife spots are.

Points of interest:
- Bolhão Market
- Rua de Santa Catarina
- Majestic Café
- Avenida dos Aliados
- Porto City Hall
- Clérigos Tower
- Lello Library
- Rua das Galerias
- Cordoaria Gardens
- Virtudes Garden
- S. Francisco Church
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church
- Ribeira
- Luís I bridge
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto)
host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

name: SEA VIEW apartment- beachfront T4
description:
The house is cosy and elegant.
Great location: 12 meters from the sand and right in the citycentre: 5min walk to the casino, restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacy, shops, cafes and bars.
Wide windows and balconies present a great view of the sea and beautiful sunsets.

The space
The apartment is located on the 1st line of the coast, therefore has an amazing view over the beach.
The house has a common room (living and dining room), a kitchen with marchise, four bedrooms, two bathrooms e and two balconies facing the beach.
Three bedrooms have couple-beds and the fourth has a berth and a private bathroom.
The kitchen is equipped with stove, oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, washing machine, coffee machine, amongst others essential to a confortable stay.

Guest access
The guests have full access to every space in the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a beach area and the house is located right in the centre of the city, with grocery stores, supermarkets, bakeries, cafes, restaurants, casino, pharmacy (2min walk), shops, etc..
It is great for kids, with playgrounds and a long waterfront that allows enjoyable walks or bycicle rides on the seaside (bike rental close to home).
At night you have a lot of bars and clubs, at walking distances always.
Since the metro station is close it's very easy to visit Porto.
The apartment couldn't be better located!
host_about:
I'm a teacher of 56 years old, married and I'm quite relaxed. I like yo meet new people.
I enjoy travelling, cinema and music.

name: Domum | Turistic Apart.  T1
description:
Domum's building is located in the heart of Porto city. The intervention that suffered aimed to retain key identity elements of the original construction, associating others, current, allowing to establish an dichotomy between the new and the old.

The space
Apartment T1 situated on the ground floor, is prepared for people with disabilities. The entire apartment was furnished with a new wooden floor providing its full soundproofing, in order to provide a more comfortable and cosy stay.

Guest access
Facing a pleasant and attractive courtyard, the living room is prepared with a sofa bed, which is in the masonry area of the building. The apartment also offers a bedroom with a very welcoming double bed, as well as a fully equipped kitchen with stove, dishwasher, fridge, microwave, oven, kettle and a Nespresso coffee machine.
The bathroom blends the use of traditional materials with a contemporary language in order to give answers for the de
neighborhood_overview: Its location is privileged, since it is near some of the emblematic places of this beautiful city: for example, the Carmo Church, the Clerigos Church, the Aliados Avenue, the Casa da Musica or the Cathedral of Porto.
host_about:
domum, latin word meaning “go to someone’s house” or “invite to come to your house”. Its meaning was the motto that gave origin to the concept of domum apartments.
Its definition is based on the act of receiving and welcoming people in the country and in the city, which is ours, providing a stay in an intimate and familiar environment, in places that stand out for their refuge and gathering in an urban environment.
 
So, the idea of family is intrinsically present in this concept, translated into the customization of all interior spaces of each apartment, as well as the care given to the choice of each element that composes it, giving them an enormous originality, uniqueness and identity.
The main objective of the implementation of this concept in several buildings is to make our guests feel at home, and therefore at your disposal numerous amenities thought with every detail.

name: ORM - Bolhão 2 Apartment
description:
Rehabilitated apartment with a contemporary architecture, located on the 2nd floor of a centenary building in which the old facade was maintained.
Located in Rua Fernandes Tomás, close to the Bolhão Market, in the downtown of Porto, an area of varied and tradicional shops.

Open-space apartment with 2 single beds and 1 bathroom with shower, with fully equipped kitchen, in the back of the building.

Ideal for 1 - 2 persons.

Prices vary according to the seasons.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

This apartment is located on Rua de Fernandes Tomás, near the Bolhão Market, a typical traditional market in the center of Porto, offering local products and great diversity, as well as a traditional atmosphere. It is called Bolhão because of its proximity to the market.

It has as main points of interest the street of Santa Catarina and Avenue of the
neighborhood_overview:
Building located in the street Rua Fernandes Tomás, where is also located the famous Bolhão Market, one of the most emblematic buildings of the city, which is intended mainly for fresh products, especially food.
Nearby, worth mentioning is the Trindade metro station (main metro station), the Porto City Hall, located in the beautiful Avenida dos Aliados, and Rua Santa Catarina, the main street of the traditional commerce of Porto.
A few minutes walking from the main sights of the city, as well as the area where the cafes, bars and nightlife spots are.

Points of interest:
- Bolhão Market
- Rua de Santa Catarina
- Majestic Café
- Avenida dos Aliados
- Porto City Hall
- Clérigos Tower
- Lello Library
- Rua das Galerias
- Cordoaria Gardens
- Virtudes Garden
- S. Francisco Church
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church
- Ribeira
- Luís I bridge
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto)
host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

name: Casa da Hera - The Ivy House
description:
Beautiful 150 y/o house in the heart of the old town of Porto.
If you want to get the taste of real life in town, in a lively neighbourhood, come and stay at our 3 bedroom house, where you'll find all the comfort you need for your stay in Porto.
Waiting for you, there will be a complimentary fine bottle of Douro wine from the famous brand Poças Júnior!!

The space
It's almost impossible to find a house with more caracter. It's a 3 floor building with 11 big windows and a large conical skylight over amazing spiral stairs. In the center of the staircase, hanging from the second to ground floor, you'll find the 25 y/o beautiful ivy that gives name to the house.
You'll have access to the entire house, with a dinning-room with stone wall, next to a large fully equipped kitchen, large living-room with chill-out area, large LCD TV and library, 3 rooms (2 double rooms and 1 twin room), 3 complete bathrooms (one in each bedroom) and 1 toilet. All bedrooms ha
neighborhood_overview:
This is one of the oldest neighbourhoods in Porto, with narrow stone stairs and streets climbing the hill. Centuries ago, there was a jewish quarter which, until the present day, give names to some streets.
The house faces a beautiful patio where you can see children playing and the neighbours in their normal life. Across the street is the old customs house, nowadays home of 3 museums and a congress venue.
This is a very traditional neighbourhood, full or genuine life and local people.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer and Director of Photography, always traveling around the world. 
I recently moved to another city and I decided to rent my own private house, so others can enjoy this beautiful building and neighbourhood. Our guests can read some of my books, relax at the chillout and meet the famous ivy that gives name to the house. 
I love to meet people from different countries and cultures, so I'll be happy to receive new guests.

neighborhood_overview:
The Cais de Gaia is the Port wine cellars district, with the best views overlooking Porto´s historic center.
It is a very pleasent riverfront, with aerial cable cars, plenty of local and international restaurants.
Even though this area is highly visited by tourists it´s really pleasant, clean and quiet.
This apartment is less than one minute walking to the D Luiz I bridge and Ribeira, Porto.
There are several bus stops nearby. You can chose direction beach or city.

As you may see in our photos, there are many boat cruises passing by the Douro all along the day. Better than seing this beautiful scenario, you can step abord and go for a 1 hour cruise, just in front.
Other cruises options are available.

Cosy and bright apartment with a privileged location 10 minutes walk from the Metro station of the Trinity and 5 minutes walk from Faria Guimarães Station. It was direct connection to the airport, where every detail has been meticulously cared for to provide you with a great stay with us.

The space

This magnificent apartment with 40m2 is on the second floor which allows you to enjoy a relaxing atmosphere after a day walking in the beautiful streets of the Porto.

In dinning area, we made an attempt to create a different atmosphere where we couldn't miss a bottle of port wine to welcome you and a coffee.

In the couple's suite everything will surprise you: t
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the Downtown of the city, near the important monuments and interesting points that you can visit by walking.
Near the most important Avenida dos Aliados we have the center of all the everyday bustle is Santa Catarina street, where you can find the older and typical coffees shops and pastries from Porto, such as the café Majestic, also the old bookstores that healthily coexist with large and modern libraries.

On the other hand, near Rua Do Almada, you found the major interesring places to visit ( Livraria Lello, Torre dos Clérigos) and the Paris Galleries, known for its variety of bars and restaurants, to the most traditional to the more sophisticated.

There is also a great number of alternative and specialized small shops, especially for art, gourmet, design, sewing, bookstores and antique shops.

"Ribeira" the area of the Douro River and the famous bridge Don Luís, is a 20" walk.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is incredibly central and only a few minutes from the main avenues in Porto. It is safe and very quiet allowing you to walk easily to all the main hot spots, it's also close distance to public transport I.e bus, taxi, metro stations should you need them.
Given its privileged location you would be within walking distance of pharmacy, paid parking, supermarket, shopping center, restaurants, cafes, bakery, bookstores, traditional shops, alternative shops of retro-cool furniture, music and urban culture in addition to several art galleries and artists' studios located on the famous Rua Miguel Bombarda (300 meters).
host_about:
We are a  couple from the north of Portugal (near Spain) who loves to meet and interact with new people, we love travelling and sharing interesting ideas.
We live in Porto since 99 and we are in love with this wonderful city and with our life  !!!!! Life is amazing and everyone should enjoy it to the fullest.


We look forward to hosting your next adventure in Porto !

Carpe diem

neighborhood_overview: Granja is a very special place. There is a collection of very nice mansions with a very nice architecture. Just 7 min walking there are a very typical fishermen village. name: Apartment at Porto, Casa da Música
description:
Welcome to the City of Porto!

This modern and well-lit apartment is located in the center of Porto, in one of the most noble areas of the city of Porto, Avenida da Boavista.

In the vicinity you will find supermarkets, the "Bom Sucesso" market and Shopping Porto with many shops, services and restaurants.

Buses at the door every hour and metro at 700m.

Beach at 7KM.

If in doubt, feel free to contact us.

The space
Our apartment is located on the 3rd floor, in a completely renovated and furnished apartment.

The kitchen is fully prepared for you to cook, from oven to cutlery.

The master bedroom has a KING SIZE bed where 2 people can stay and you can also use the sofa bed to accommodate one or 2 more people.

Bed linen, duvets, pillows and bath towels are available for you.

Guest access
In addition to the main entrance, guests have access to the rear entrance,
neighborhood_overview:
Avenida da Boavista is considered the "sophisticated upper class neighborhood".

It is a predominantly residential area that houses cultural spaces such as the notable and contemporary Casa da Música, where you can watch eclectic shows.

It also houses the Serralves Foundation: a museum of avant-garde art.

The area also has sophisticated shops, modern cafes and modest restaurants serving the classic francesinha from Porto, a meat sandwich with melted cheese and tomato sauce.
host_about:
Je suis de Porto , j'ai fait mes études en France ( Normandie ), j'ai travaillé aux îles Canaries, j'ai une experience des voyages que  j'adore , j aime recevoir et faire découvrir ma ville , très belle , propre et sécurisé .
Porto est une ville très agréable et accueillante , les rues commerçantes, ses plages et son fleuve Rio Douro , ainsi que ses fameux vins de Porto et la trés bonne nourriture typique.
Bien sûr à ne pas oublier son climat très ensoleillé.
Ville à découvrir !
A très vite , je vois donnerais la maximum d infos que vous souhaiterais .
À bientôt “ je vous attend “

name: Foz Sea Apartment Porto
description:
Apartment in Oporto with terrace over the sea and the mouth of the Douro river, in a quiet street close to beaches, restaurants, bars and traditional shops, with multiple access to the Historical Centre and near the Serralves Museum.

The space
The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a residential building with a lift. It comprises: a living room, a kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, two small halls, a closed veranda facing East and an ample terrace facing West. The two rooms are next to the veranda and the living room and the kitchen to the terrace. One of the bedrooms has a double bed and the other have two single beds. The living room has a spacious dining table and a large sofa that can be transformed into a double bed (1,40mx1,90m). The kitchen is fully equipped. On the terrace you can dine, sunbathe, read a book, relax.
A parking space in the basement of the building can be used by the guests.

Guest access
The apartment w
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located on Rua do Teatro in Foz do Douro, close to the sea, one of the most beautiful areas of the city of Porto, a traditional place of leisure. In the neighbouring streets there are bars, restaurants, supermarkets, traditional markets, pharmacies, a bike rental shop, bakeries and a variety of shops where you can buy different products. At a 2 minutes’ walk distance you will find the sea front promenade where you can walk, run, ride a bike or skate and enjoy a fantastic sunset. Alongside this promenade there are beaches, bars and restaurants. You can choose to walk to Matosinhos beach or take the opposite direction to the mouth of the Douro river, and then walk along the riverside promenade to the Historic Centre.
In the vicinity there are bus stops that will take you to the Historic Centre, the Port Wine Cellars, the Casa da Música (Music House) or other emblematic sites. You can also opt for renting a taxi on the Foz market square, at a 3 minutes’ walk distanc
host_about:
Hi my name is Paula. I was born in Monção, a small village in the North of Portugal, I live in Porto and spend large periods in Aljezur, a village of the South of Portugal. I love my family, traveling, cooking for friends, wandering the streets of Porto, the green of the mountains of Minho and the blue sky of Alentejo.
_______________________________________________________________________

Olá o meu nome é Paula. Nasci em Monção, uma pequena vila do Norte, moro já há muitos anos no Porto e passo largas temporadas em Aljezur, uma vila do sul. Adoro a minha família, viajar, cozinhar para amigos, vaguear pelas ruas do Porto, o verde das montanhas do Minho e o azul do céu do Alentejo.

name: ALEGRIA 319 | 2D @ Porto Downtown
description:
Located in Porto downtown, the ALEGRIA 319 | 2D is very close to the main landscapes. It is central and ideal to relax as well. It is full equipped for a perfect stay.

The space
The ALEGRIA 319 apartments are equipped with all facilities for welcoming our guests, including those with reduced mobility (wheelchairs).

The kitchen is equipped with all utensils and dishes: washing machine, coffee maker, kettle, natural juices machine, toaster, microwave, stove (plate) and oven, iron and ironing board.
In the dining area, guests can enjoy the magnificent view over Porto.

The living room and the bedroom have two TV's and air conditioning.
In the room the bed can have two single mattresses or 1 double mattress to accommodate 2 people.
In the bedroom there is a double bed and we can add an extra single bed (upon request), accommodating up to 3 people. For children we have cots and bathtub (upon request).
The windows are double a
neighborhood_overview: Located in Porto downtown, in a residential street parallel to Rua de Santa Catarina (main shopping zone, Café Majestic), the apartment is very close to many landmarks, shops, theatres, restaurants and bars. Customers can discover and enjoy the city and its idiosyncrasies by walking. Walking along Rua Santa Catarina (100 meters), guests find the Souls Chapel (Capela das Almas, 280 meters) next to the Bolhão Market (Mercado do Bolhão, 400m) and the Bolhão metro station. Just about 8 minutes is the city's main avenue, the Avenida dos Aliados, next to which are the São Bento Station, Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) and across the Tower of Clerics (Torre dos Clérigos) (shopping area, restaurants and bars). Going down to the Riverside of Douro (Ribeira do Douro; about 20 minutes from the apartment), guests find the Palace of Bolsa (Palácio da Bolsa) and the Church of St. Francis (Igreja S. Francisco). In this area guests can taste and enjoy the renowned Port wine and visit the cellars.

host_about:
Nous sommes régulièrement en déplacement la bas sur porto . 
Nous avons crée ce loft a notre image que nous mettons en location.
Nous avons également mis notre ancienne maison de vacances en location aussi ici, ne pas confondre avec le loft , les prestations ne sont pas du tout les mêmes d'ou un prix bien inférieur.  
Pour les grandes familles  et amis qui voyagent ensemble le loft et la maison se trouve en face l'un de l'autre , donc pratique pour voyagez ensemble et avoir chacun son intimité . la capacité d’accueil est possible ainsi pour 8 personnes et chacun peut garder une certaine intimité.  
Suite a plusieurs désagrément du a des voyageurs peu respectueux et ingrats, ,avant toute validation nous demanderons confirmation d'avoir bien lu le règlement intérieur.

name: 1 Oporto City Center - sleeps 6, 4 beds
description:
Located in the heart of Porto downtown at Rua Formosa in a 5 floor 60’s building with lift, the apartment at the 3rd floor is perfect to host from 1 to 6 people. Just few meters away between the city hall located in the main city avenue Aliados and the old Bolhão Market, it is ideal for a city visit. Main commercial streets, the river and historic center, night life and all major points of interest are at a walk distance, as well as all the transport network metro, train, buses, city buses.

The space
The apartment has been renovated and has 3 double bedrooms with cable TV. The rooms are large and they have convenient place to store your belongings and one has a small balcony. There is a full bathroom with shower and hairdryer. A polyvalent room with a large table suitable for your breakfast and light meals is also at your disposal. The apartment is north faced so not very hot on summer, there is air conditioning in the rooms.

Guest access
I
neighborhood_overview:
This is the city center, safe place to go out walking day and night, plenty of shops and restaurants just nearby. Theatre, cinema, and all the activities at a walking distance. The historic old city, the Douro River and the Port Wine Cellars at “Ribeira” are 1500 meters away. Five car parks also available nearby. The area is very safe, day and night.
Really everything at a walk distance, day and night!
host_about:
I’m Pedro and I have two sisters, Paula and Isabel all us around 50’s. Some years ago we inherited a full 5 floor building just 80 meters from the main city square and the local authority building. 
Used in the past mainly for office and commercial activities, we believe it is a fantastic and safe location for travellers with short visits to the city, looking for a very central place to stay surrounded by all the transport and needed facilities.
So, we have decided to refurbish some of the existing flats that we sincerely hope you will enjoy.
As a family we are property, farming owners and traders and we get involved with several business activities.
We like to travel and we have experienced many places around and believe that meeting people from other countries and cultures help us better understand the world we live.
Please enjoy our fantastic city and do not hesitate in asking us for more details and about how to prepare your staying with us.

name: Bright & Cosy Studio at Clerigos
description:
Cosy studio with a unique view on Torre dos Clerigos, inside the UNESCO-listed area.

The space
Our studio is cosy, comfortable and sunny. It is as central as it gets and has a unique view on the most iconic church of the city and its tower (Torre dos Clerigos). Inside of the UNESCO-listed neighbourhood, it is a perfect place to experience both traditional Porto and the most dynamic parts of the city.

The studio is on the 3rd floor of a tastefully-renovated 19th century building (no lift). It has a practical open kitchen with a stove, a microwave and a fridge, and a bathroom with a shower. There is a humble and cosy bed (see pics) and everything else you could need for two people to live comfortably. The flat will be cleaned for you and we will provide fresh bed linens, towels and our own little map of favourite places in the city.

Guest access
The entire studio will be yours.
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is inside an area described by UNESCO as "a townscape of high aesthetic value, with evidence of urban development from the Roman, medieval, and Almadas periods". We just find it beautiful :).
It is also a very dynamic place, buzzing with amazing eateries, bars and shops, both traditional and edgy. The most famous sightseeing spots are also extremely close if not visible from the windows. Location hardly gets better frankly.

Ahmed, architect from Switzerland now living in Porto, Portugal. :)

name: Calm & Cosy Studio at Clerigos
description:
Extremely central and cosy studio inside the UNESCO-listed area.

The space
Our studio is cosy, comfortable and sunny. It is as central as it gets and has a unique view the old centre of Porto. Inside of the UNESCO-listed neighbourhood, just a few dozen meters from Torre dos Clerigos, it is a perfect place to experience both traditional Porto and the most dynamic parts of the city.

The studio is on the 3rd floor of a tastefully-renovated 19th century building (no lift). It has a practical open kitchen with a stove, a microwave and a fridge, and a bathroom with a shower.
There is a cosy bed for one, and everything needed to live comfortably. The flat will be cleaned for you and we will provide fresh bed linens, towels and our own little map of favourite places in the city.

Guest access
The entire studio will be yours.

name: Lovely&Modern 5 min to Porto Center
description:
Hi! I'm delighted to host in this modern and comfortable apartment.

We are located just a couple of minutes D. Luis Bridge, one of the best scenic views in Porto, and the UNESCO world heritage area.

The space
The apartment is very modern, featuring a large living room, a fully equipped kitchen, two bedrooms one of them with an en suite bathroom, and one more bathroom with a smaller shower for guests.

Both the living room and bedrooms have a balcony facing the street. The street is one of the main streets of Vila Nova de Gaia, being quite busy, with lots of public transportation.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole apartment.

Other things to note
The apartment is located in a busy street with buses and metro passing by. To the more sensitive to noise, this can be an inconvenience.

We provide our guest towels once, on the day they check-in. Extra towels can be arranged upon
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in one of the main streets of Vila Nova de Gaia (or just Gaia) , just next to the bridge D. Luis and the UNESCO world heritage area. It is a few hundred meters from what are generally considered the best views of Porto.

In Gaia, you should visit the Port Wine cellars (you might know the world famous Port wine), where the wine is aged. There are a number of Port wine cellars (Sandeman, Calem, Taylor’s, ..) and all have their strong points.

Vila Nova de Gaia has generally very good views to Porto, and it is very scenic to walk near the river bank. Gaia also has a vast beach side, with very nice beaches to walk and to spend time in the summer.

name: Canidelo Beach Apartment, Porto south
description:
A cosy 2 bedroom apartment on the ground floor of a charming villa built in the 50ies, with private swimming pool, private parking, a farm in the back and just 5 min. walk away from the beach in Vila Nova de Gaia, on the other side of the river Douro, at 15 minutes by car from the historic centre of Porto.

The space
The apartment is on the ground floor of a 2-family-house in Vila Nova de Gaia, South of Porto. It has a small living and dining room, a kitchen with stove, 2-door fridge, coffee machine for expressos; toaster; dishes, cups and glasses; pots and pans; crockery and further cooking utensils. The 2 bedrooms face the backyard and there is a bathroom with walk-in shower. The apartment is very fresh in the summer and should you choose to stay in the colder days, there is a central heating.
In the property for exclusive use of guests there is: a big swimming pool, a green area with a swing for children; there is also a small pergola and on the side a
neighborhood_overview:
Canidelo is a parish of Vila Nova de Gaia, on the other side of the river Douro. This house is just minutes away from the beach and from the riverside. In the nearby village, Afurada, down by the river you can take a boat to Porto and then the tram either to the historical centre or westwards to the beach.
There are local fish restaurants in Afurada and also at the beach.
There is a minimarket and a bakery just 2 minutes walking the street to your right
host_about:
2004, during the Football european championship I rented out a fully furnished and equipped flat in Porto to foreign guests. It was the one in Boavista. 
The experience was great. The people who stayed loved the apartment, and I loved the concept of renting my flat to visitors. I prepared the flat not only with furniture and bed linen! I tried to gather useful information about Porto and surroundings in order to help my guests make the best of their time in town.
Then friends and family, who either got married and saw their families grow or had to move abroad, started asking me to take care of their flats, apartments or townhouses and find guests. Again, I prepared the flats so that anyone visiting Porto would feel welcome and easily integrated in Porto.
Well, now it's two of us, me and my colleague Paula (https://www.airbnb.pt/users/show/180050) and we decided to create a small company called Flat in Porto to manage all these flats and get them ready to welcome you in our city. 
All of these homes still have the owners' own touch, so you get an inside feeling of how people live in Porto. We hope you like your new temporary home in Porto, no matter if you are on holidays, studying or working here, and we do hope you enjoy your stay with us!

The space

Apartment in Vila Nova de Gaia, 10 minutes walk from Oporto Downtown and 3 minutes from Subway and Trains Station (with direct connections to visit the Gaia’s Beaches, all Oporto City and surroundings (Guimarães, …).

host_location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal
host_about:
Hello, my name is Paulo Couto and I'm an Economist. I Love to travel around the world were I've been making very good friends. I'm also passionate about nature and I'm a Scuba Diver. 
Me and my brothers have been remodeling apartments and houses left by our father to receive tourists from all the world and show them the beauty of Porto. City center, River, Beach, vineyards and beautiful surroundings.
We look forward to receive you very soon.

Bonjour, je m'appelle Paulo Couto et je suis Économiste de formation. J'aime voyager et connaître nouvelles personnes et pour cette raison je parle 5 langues. Je suis passionné par la nature et en particulier par la Mère. J'aime fair de la plongée sous-marine.
Moi et mes frères avons remodelé des appartements et maisons de la famille pour recevoir des touristes de tous le monde et les montrer la beauté du Porto. Centre de la cité, Rivière, Plage, vignobles et alentours.
Dans l'attente de vous rencontrer prochainement. 

Buenos Días, me llamo Paulo Couto y soy Economista de formación. Siempre me ha gustado viajar en trabajo y vacaciones un poco por todo el mundo donde hago normalmente buenos amigos. Soy un apasionado por la naturaleza y muy especialmente por el Mar. Me encanta Bucear.
Yo y mis hermanos hemos decidido renovar unos apartamentos y casas que nos ha dejado nuestro Padre para recibir turistas de todo el Mondo y les mostrar la belleza de Porto. Tenemos espacios indicados para recibir grupos y familias donde pueden disfrutar del centro de la Ciudad, Río Duero, Playas encantadoras, Viñas y muy interesantes alrededores del Grande Porto.
Nos encantaría recibirlos muy pronto.

description:
1 km from the city center. 5 minutes, on foot, from Metro or Bus.
3 rooms flat.
Internet. Cable TV
Sunny, spacious and big terrace. kitchen. 1 bathroom. 1 WC. Sheets. Bathroom towels. Near to a park, supermaket, etc
Free street parking.

The space
3 rooms. 5 beds.
+ 1 bed for a child (1,60/0,70).
Cable Tv e Wi-Fi.
Full kitchen: fridge, stove, oven, microwave, toaster, blender, coffee machine and kitchenware.

1 toillet.

neighborhood_overview:
It is located in uptown in a residential area and traditional trade.
Nice and quiet. Close to supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, bakeries, butcher, fishmonger, post office, pharmacy, hospital Santa Maria, bars and nightclubs.
Metro and Bus 5 minutes, connecting the entire city.
Near the garden Marquês de Pombal and the Church Senhora da Conceição (visit its tower overlooking the city). Also visit the Lapa Church and the Trinity, when down the road to the city center. Alternatively, take Metro to the Stadium of the Dragon and visit the museum of FC Porto.
Quinta do Covelo is 30 meters from the apartment. It is a very nice green area with playground, walking, exercising or cycling.
Our street has a direct connection to highways.
If you come by car you can park in the street or in garages (with charge) in the street itself.

name: Top floor balcony flat in Porto
description:
Two bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment in a traditional and beautifully renovated Porto townhouse. Accommodates up to 3 guests.

The space
This is a street facing 2nd floor (2 above ground) balcony unit in a traditional Porto townhouse with stark solid granite walls and wooden floors throughout.
Conveniently located about 20 min walk from the central square (Aliados) and a short walk from the Marquês metro station, yet in a quiet, very safe and authentic neighborhood.
You will find a fully equipped kitchen (stove, microwave, fridge, sink and cooking utensils) and dining area and two bedrooms.

Guest access
Guests have access to their own unit, comprised of kitchen/dining area, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom. Additionally, guests can use the shared laundry room, garden and outdoor barbecue.

Other things to note
This unit is on the top (2nd) floor of the house and access requires climbing stairs. Guests with mobility re
neighborhood_overview:
The Marquês neighborhood is located on the highest part of town. Traditionally a family-oriented working class area, it's comprised of a mix of new and old buildings, mostly built on traditional and unusually shaped Porto lots - only 5.5 meters wide and up to 100 meters long!
The neighborhood remains very safe and authentic to this day, no overpriced tourist traps here! Within a 5 minute walk you will find a variety of authentic local businesses supermarkets, small grocery and fruit & veg stores, butchers, bakeries, cafes, hardware stores,...

This area is associated to the history of FC Porto, the city's most successful football club whose historical first playing fields are just a few doors down the street and where you can watch young and hopeful future stars at their football school.
host_about: I have lived in the beautiful city of Porto for over 40 years and I'm happy to welcome you here!

name: Aida's Haven | Bolhão | Room #1
description:
Your vintage nook in the heart of the city.

The space
The apartment is located in an emblematic building from the 50's that still preserves its original features like the perfectly working lift with a grid courtain or the fire hydrants available on each floor.

The apartment has 3 independent and private bedrooms each with a double bed, warm lighting and window blackouts. All the 3 bedrooms are for rent and share the common areas.

Guest access
The guests have access to:
- a set of keys: bedroom, apartment and building
- 1 bedroom with double bed
- private locker/armoire with private key to store your luggage, one for each room, located on a corridor adjacent to the rooms
- dining room with table and chairs for 6
- living room with a 32' TV with 100 channels and radio
- marquise with a table and chairs
- fully equiped kitchen with stove, fridge, microwave, toaster, teapot, pots and pans, tablewea
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of the city centre in a very quiet street close to the main commercial street Santa Catarina, the beautiful chapel Capela das Almas, Bolhão market, S. Lázaro garden, the Fine Arts University and the new food quarter in the city - Praça dos Poveiros - a  joyful new gathering spot in the city where people join friends around the table enjoying Porto's delicacies.
host_about:
Hello! :)

We are Alexandra and Catarina. We love our city and most of all we love to offer new experiences to the people that are now discovering Porto. We like to share experiences with people from all over the world, receiving them in our apartment and showing them not only the must sees, but specially the hidden places that make this city so exciting. We love art, design, architecture, photography, vintage objects, music, history and, of course, the amazingly rich Portuguese gastronomy.

name: downtown|84 Historic Centre Charm
description:
Welcome to downtown|84!

[about: the location]

Situated in Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in the heart of the Historic Centre that was classified World Heritage by Unesco in 1996, this picturesque building from the 1930’s was originally a single family house and more recently transformed into apartments.

The space
[COVID-19 UPDATE]
Our apartments are certified by the Portuguese National Tourism Institute as 'Clean & Safe' establishments.
We are ensuring compliance with all basic precautions for prevention and infection control in relation to the outbreak of the new coronavirus COVID-19.
Stay safe by choosing 'Clean & Safe'!


[about: the apartment]

Comfortable and spacious, this 99m² third-floor apartment easily accommodates 6 guests. It is comprised of:
- one double bedroom
- one twin bedroom
- dining / living room with double sofa bed
- fully equipped kitchen [refrigerator with fr
neighborhood_overview:
[about: the neighbourhood]

The apartment's superb location allows walking distance to the most visited hotspots and points of interest of the city; the Ribeira riverfront, the famous Port Wine Cellars just across the beautiful D. Luís bridge, Palácio da Bolsa Stock Exchange, Ferreira Borges Market, S. Francisco Church, Sé do Porto Cathedral, S. Bento Railway Station, restaurants, bars, cafes... you name it!

Have a look at our Location Map in the photos section!
host_about:
We're Joana and Francisco and oportodowntown is the project we started based on our passion for our home city and for travelling. Having lived outside of Portugal for some time, in São Paulo (Brazil) and London (UK) respectively, we believe Porto is a fantastic city that is worth getting to know!

We are intent on providing our guests with the best experience possible, hoping to take an active part in the success of their stay!

description:
**BOUTIQUE APARTMENT IN LUXURY CONDO**
Amazing 1 bedroom apartment located aside the beach of Matosinhos (Astonishing views) and Porto's City Park (NOS Primavera Sound), at 4km of EXPONOR - International Fair Center - and 2km far from downtown.

name: Apartamento São João
description:
“Apartamento São João” is a cozy and spacious apartment, with lots of natural light and also has a private parking space for one car.
It consists of bedroom with double bed, living room with sofa bed for two, complete bathroom and fully equipped kitchen.

The space
This 1 bedroom apartment is located close to the "Jardim S. Lázaro" within 10 minutes walking distance from downtown Porto and the historic center, in an area classified as world heritage...
It is the ideal apartment to visit the magnificent city of Porto and the northern region of Portugal, as a family or in a group of friends up to 4 people.
At the end of the street there is a panoramic path from which you can see the magnificent Douro River. On Saturdays morning a fair is held there.
In its vicinity, this apartment has all kinds of services: public transport, a supermarket (500 meters), several restaurants, as well as various places of leisure and culture...

Guest ac
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is a 5-minutes walk from Praça da Batalha, where the Guindais Funicular is located, which goes down to the Ribeira area by the river (on the other side are the famous Port Wine Cellars).
In the vicinity there are numerous restaurants and bars, in addition to the main shopping streets of the city, especially the famous Santa Catarina street.
Nearby you will also find the National Theater and other concert halls, the Fernandina Wall, the Cathedral and the historic Café Majestic.
An absolutely privileged location within one of the oldest and most authentic areas of the city - the Fontainhas.
host_about:
Nasci no Porto e aqui tenho vivido sempre. Adoro a minha cidade! Sou viúva  e tenho um filho já adulto.
Trabalhei durante 39 anos na Banca: 25 anos num banco inglês e os restantes num banco português. Adoro concertos e por isso vou com frequência à Casa da Música, que fica junto à casa onde vivo. Gosto de boa comida e quando viajo gosto de experimentar a gastronomia local. Mas gosto sobretudo de conhecer as pessoas dos lugares que visito, pois é através delas que melhor se conhece uma cultura.

host_about:
Vivo na cidade do Porto em Portugal.
Tenho 59 anos, falo inglês, francês e espanhol.
Gosto de viajar; Conhecer novas gentes e novos lugares.
Conheço quase todas as capitais europeias e,  de África, já estive em Marrocos e na ´Tunísia.
A Paris já fui 2 vezes mas é uma ciadade aonde apetece voltar mais vezes; Oh Paris, toujours Paris!! ;-))
Gosto de animais mas o meu preferido é o gato; Adoro a sua indepêndencia e auto confiança; Neste momento partilhamos a  casa com o  gato "Félix" que vive connosco há 13 anos.
Gosto do Verão e das suas noites quentes, de flores,  de chocolate, de praia, de passar um fim de semana no campo, de ler e cinema.
Em viagem sempre fiquei hospedada em hoteis mas, descobri a Airbnb através do meu filho que é um anfitrião aqui na cidade do Porto/Portugal e, como a oferta de apartamentos é tão boa, decidi experimentar; É a minha primeira vez ;-) Espero que corra bem!
Aos anfitrioes digo que os seus apartamentos ficam em boas mãos; Sou uma mulher muito organizada e cuidadosa; Se duvidar, consulte o meu horóscopo; Sou do signo Virgem, logo,  mais perfeccionista não há, LOL!!!

With two rooms, a living room, dining room, bathroom and fully equipped kitchen and a private sunny terrace. Free wi-fi.
Located in the heart of the O’Porto city centre, very near the Bolhão Market, it is also situated in a quiet street, away from the nocturnal city noise.

The space
Located in the heart of the O’Porto city centre. this flat is within walking distance to most of Porto landmarks, with very easy access to major transportation lines.
It’s a 10 minute walk to important attractions such as the Majestic Café, the Time Warp Shops, the local Bolhão Market and the monumental Avenida dos Aliados.
It’s also a 15 minute walk to Porto’s historical center classified as World Heritage by UNESCO in 1996, where you can visit the famous Lello Book Store, Clérigos Tower, Palácio da Bolsa, Sao Francisco Church, the Cathedr
host_about: I’m a urban planner and a calm easygoing person. I love the great things of life, such as travelling, getting to know different cultures and ways of life, listening to music, cinema and gastronomy. Love talking and being around people. The space
The house is big, and belongs to a small farm family property. It's right in front of the sea.

The ground-floor of the house has 4 rooms available for rent, one bathroom (for 3 rooms), a kitchen and a living room for guests.
Outside there are gardens, a swimming pool (in renovation), a area with vegetable garden, and other area with animals (sheep and goats).

The base price is for two people (or 1 person) in double bed. There is also a single bed so you can ask for use it in advance (plus 15€ for person).

neighborhood_overview:
Praia do Paraíso is a small beach in Perafita, next to some other big beaches like Praia do Cabo do Mundo, and Praia do Aterro, very frequented by surfers and body-boarders.
Also Praia da Memória, famous because of a Portuguese historical event, is very near.
Angeiras, a fisherman village is quite near (5 km) where boats are still pulled to the beach and where you can taste fresh fish there and also enjoy the calm beach.

Leça da Palmeira, 4 km, has some architecture famous buildings like "Piscinas das marés" (salt water pools design by Álvaro Siza Vieira), and also many trendy restaurants and pubs

Matosinhos, also known to have the best fish restaurants is very closed (8 km).

Porto is just around the corner, you can visit Tower of Clérigos, Casa da Música, Livraria Lello (bookshop), the Port Wine Cellars, Miguel Bombard (design district) or just experience the downtown life, with lots of restaurants and shops.

Nº 52367/AL.

neighborhood_overview:
The building is located in the historic Porto, just a few streets from the Douro River and the main historic and touristic buildings as S. Francisco church, Sé do Porto, Palácio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market (Hard Club).
From our apartment you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, designer stores in Porto.
This is one of the most typical neighborhoods in Porto, where the locals still live and make us all feel welcome and part of the everyday life that you can still witness.

name: Porto Gaia, Apt 2 rooms,50m beach+Private Terrace
description:
Two bedroom, spacious and confortable apartment, situated 50m from the beach in a condominium with tennis court and playground. It has a private terrace with 120m2 and a barbecue.
It is an excellent place to visit the city and enjoy the beach!

The space
O apartamento localiza-se na praia de Lavadores (Vila Nova de Gaia) a 500m da foz do rio douro. A zona está servida de bons acessos, bem como de transportes públicos.
Essa rede de transportes dá acesso ao centro da cidade do Porto e Vila Nova de Gaia, à estação de comboios das Devesas, e ao centro comercial Arrábida Shopping.
A casa é bastante espaçosa, confortável e acolhedora. Tem um exelente terraço, ideal para as crianças brincarem, com barbecue. O condomínios é tranquilo, possui jardim, court tennis e parque infantil. Na zona envolvente à casa, poderá encontrar vários restaurantes, cafés e bares de praia. A praia tem bandeira azul.
É um local muito tranquilo bem frequentado e seguro. Toda
host_about:
Hello...I am passionate about nature, beach and sports. I love travel, surf, run and go on adventures. I decided to buy a house that allow me to have all of this in just one place! Canidelo is a perfect place to visit Porto ( in 15 minutes) and enjoy the Douro river and the best beaches.
I will do my best to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable!
I hope to see you soon.
Celso Almeida

name: Bonjardim 466-Historic Townhouse
description:
Experience Porto’s historic signature by staying at a beautifully townhouse, recently renovated, but keeping typical 19th century period traces such as patio, garden and even a family Chapel.

The space
Great for one family or a group of friends on holiday in Porto!
The house keeps its original architecture with the kitchen and the dining room at the 3rd floor, one lovely master bedroom suite (couple bed), two bedrooms (couple bed), one single bedroom and two living rooms in the 1st floor… with fabulous handcrafted ceilings and crystal chandeliers allowing you to experience the élan from the “belle Époque”.

Located in the heart of downtown Porto: just one minute walking distance to the City Hall and a few minutes to other historical and contemporaneous sites such as Aliados Avenue, Bolhão Market, Clérigos Tower, Sta. Catarina Street and to the most exquisite Porto’s restaurants or trendy bars.

Perfect connections: just near to Trindade
neighborhood_overview: Bonjardim street is located in the heart of Porto, one of the main arteries of access to the historical center and with fast pedestrian access to all the attractions of Porto downtown (Douro River, Aliados, Santa Catarina, Clérigos, etc.). Its location also allows access, by metro, to the area of Foz and Boavista, giving you the opportunity to know the lifestyle of the Portuguese without any effort and with all the security of this city. Around, you will find all the necessary facilities: supermarkets, pharmacies, bakeries, restaurants and cafes ... at night you can go by foot knowing the city and its fun. Get to know Porto as the secular history and the artistic legacy. Find the culture, the architecture (expressed in a variety of museums), the theaters, the cinemas and the international music festivals. Discover the history of Port Wine, its cellars and the farmhouses located in the Douro River Valley.
host_about:
“My Flat” é uma empresa especializada na gestão de Alojamento Local (AL).
Eu, responsável da “My Flat”, iniciei a minha atividade neste mercado no ano de 2014.
A nossa empresa tem como principal objetivo oferecer um serviço de excelência, garantindo a melhor experiência a todos os nossos hóspedes.
A nossa história tem sido testemunhada desde sempre pelos hóspedes que nos têm procurado na “Cidade Invicta” bem como pelo orgulho de ostentar o título de “Super Host” que o Airbnb nos confia, ininterruptamente, desde o ano de 2014!

“My Flat” is a company specialized in the management of Local Accommodation (AL).
I, manager of “My Flat”, started my activity in this market in 2014.
Our company has as main objective to offer an excellent service, guaranteeing the best experience for all our guests.
Our history has always been witnessed by the guests that have been looking for us in Oporto city as well as for the pride of bearing the title of “Super Host” that Airbnb has entrusted to us, uninterruptedly, since the year 2014!

We will be working during the time you will be here but you can feel free to do everything...

neighborhood_overview:
Why I love my place?
I have everything I need around me and I just have to walk...
If you need to cook you will find supermarkets, the old market and small-old shops.
If you want to go out at night, just walk 10 minutes and you will find the heart of night life.
If you want to visit some interesting places around porto you can go by train and metro - 1-10 minutes walking. If you want to visit porto by bike I have one at my place.

You will feel a mixture of village in the city center! Meet the neighborhood it's quite easy... Especially if you say everyday "Bom dia" or "Como está?" After 2 days the people recognize you and they start a good conversation...
host_about:
I´m a travel lover, a curious person, I love dialogs about your country, my country and about the world. I also love my city and I love to ear what people love about my city. I´m a dreamer so I'm thinking all the time going out...

I'm a travel blogger, a photographer, a first aider and so much other things. Airbnb was the way that I have found to travel around Latin America (2016) for 9 months and it's the way that I can still travel through your voices.

My place its a real local stay! A place to share your world!

name: Beach room good for families (up to 4 people)
description:
On the "Caminho de Santiago", through the coast, appears this big house. Ground floor is available for guests. Our family is also available to pick you up at the airport. Be aware that there are children living at the first floor of the house :)

The space
The house is big, and belongs to a small farm family property. It's right in front of the sea.

The ground-floor of the house has 4 rooms available for rent, one bathroom (for 3 rooms), a kitchen and a living room for guests.
Outside there are gardens, a swimming pool (in renovation), a area with vegetable garden, and other area with animals (sheep and goats).

The base price is for two people (or 1 person) in double bed. There is also a single bed so you can ask for use it in advance (plus 15€ for person).
In this room there is also possibility of another mattress (so four places in total, nice for a couple and two children) for other 10€. We also have bedding for babies, just a
neighborhood_overview:
Praia do Paraíso is a small beach in Perafita, next to some other big beaches like Praia do Cabo do Mundo, and Praia do Aterro, very frequented by surfers and body-boarders.
Also Praia da Memória, famous because of a Portuguese historical event, is very near.
Angeiras, a fisherman village is quite near (5 km) where boats are still pulled to the beach and where you can taste fresh fish there and also enjoy the calm beach.

Leça da Palmeira, 4 km, has some architecture famous buildings like "Piscinas das marés" (salt water pools design by Álvaro Siza Vieira), and also many trendy restaurants and pubs.

Matosinhos, also known to have the best fish restaurants is very closed (8 km).

Porto is just around the corner, you can visit Tower of Clérigos, Casa da Música, Livraria Lello (bookshop), the Port Wine Cellars, Miguel Bombard (design district) or just experience the downtown life, with lots of restaurants and shops.
You can find a shopping

description:

The space
Yolga's apart is the invisible extension of ourselves, unique in its identity and its simplicity, manifested through a super cozy space stuffed with materials and decorative elements that balance the atmosphere and make it cozy and tender.

Facing south and with the sunshine bathed from dawn to sunset the games of the warm colors that surround it convey at the same time a feeling of welcome and excitement.

The terrace is a call to the contemplation of the evening of the seasons embroidering a good and lively conversation.

Yolga's apart is an inscription of the time in the world that includes the rhythms of the city, the rhythms of the urban population to the pure comfort and evasion.
Our purpose is that all our guests feel at home, in a space where they can rest, laugh, d
neighborhood_overview:
The Yolga's apart is located in the historical center, in a neighborhood in the heart of Porto and in a historical street as well ... Rua Formosa!
Along the way we can immerse ourselves in the Portuguese food culture and the traditions of the city through the best grocery stores in Porto such as "Chorar e comer por mais", "Pérola do Bolhão", "Mercearia do Bolhão";
Also in Formosa Street is located the Bolhão Market (currently in remodeling) with its neoclassical architecture and where the soul of the people of Porto reigns.
Still in the street we can find the beautiful and traditional Confectionery of Bolhão, the official store of the F.C of Porto as well as the Bolhão Palace considered one of the most notable buildings of the civil architecture of the nineteenth century.
To the west our street will empty into the emblematic Avenida dos Aliados (crossing it starts to go up to the Spot Night).
To the west our street will empty into the emblematic Avenida dos Al

neighborhood_overview:
Bonfim is a parish of Porto that currently has 177 years of existence. The parish and parish of Bonfim were created on December 11, 1841, by government decree signed by Costa Cabral during the reign of D. Maria II. The parish was then constituted by means of a small territory that was suppressed to the parish of Sé, to which was also added a part of the territory belonging to the parishes of Santo Ildefonso and Campanhã.
 
In the mid-nineteenth century, Bonfim became the main industrial hub of the city of Porto, in which the textile industry predominated. In the landscape stood the tall chimneys and the hasty movement of factory workers, which guided the daily life of the parish. In fact, at that time, Bonfim assumed itself as a true industrial cluster, holding the largest number of workers and factories in the city. The massive installation of factories in this eastern part of Porto led to the multiplication of a housing solution known as the 'island', which spread throughou

host_about:
ENGLISH:
Hello, my name is Adam and I am 29 years old. I am currently studying (I left school when I was a teenager and I have gone back to school) and I am also unemployed.
Since childhood I have been a big dreamer but because of fear, finally, everything was just that: a dream.
A year ago, I decided to take a chance and believe in me to fulfill one of my dreams: to live in Porto.
I'm "alone", yes... but I am in the place that makes me happy.
I have fought, and I'm struggling to fight to stay and live here. This website helps me to fulfill my dream. Do you want to be part of my dream?

During your stay I will try to help as much as I can. I recommend you all kind of places to visit and eat.
Porto is a great city. A very beautiful city, and I will do you to think the same!

FBK: emdicadam


ESPAÑOL:
Hola, me llamo Adam Torres y tengo 29 años. Actualmente estoy estudiando (dejé los estudios de pequeño y he vuelto a retomarlos) y en paro.
Desde pequeño he sido un gran soñador pero por miedo, finalmente, todo se quedaba en eso: un sueño.
Hace un año, decidí creer en mí y arriesgarme para cumplir uno de mis sueños: vivir en Porto.
Estoy "solo", sí... pero estoy en el lugar que me hace feliz.
He luchado, estoy luchando y lucharé por poder quedarme a vivir aquí. Airbnb me ayuda a cumplir este sueño. ¿Quieres formar parte de mi sueño?

Durante tu estancia intentaré ayudar en todo lo que pueda. Recomendaros todo tipo de sitios para visitar y comer.
Porto es una gran ciudad. Una ciudad muy bonita, ¡y haré que penséis eso mismo!

FBK: emdicadam

name: Classy Apartment in Boavista
description:
Classy apartment in the heart of Boavista.

The space
Welcome to Porto!

You’ll find our studio in the historical center of Porto, in Boavista district. In a few minutes’ walk, you’ll be in the Arts District, Casa da Música or the Bom Sucesso Market.

It is located on the lower floor of a XIX century building, with direct access to a big and sunny terrace overlooking the garden. The bright studio features a large kitchen, fully equipped with various appliances, a bathroom, a living area and a bedroom area.

It is appropriate for families, couples or business travelers; but most of all, we want you to feel welcome in Porto.

Other things to note
The apartment has 40 square meters. It features a double or twin bedroom (ask for your preference), living room area with a sleeping sofa that turns into a comfortable double bed, kitchen and bathroom.

The building doesn't have an elevator.

name: Casa da Mineira
description:
Enjoy quiet time in a centuries-old cottage 25km from Porto and minutes from the ocean. The antique furnished 10-room house sits in 6 acres of walled land. It hosts 4 guests in the two bedrooms. We can set up an additional cot in the office, which will have access to the third bathroom. We can accommodate a young child in a crib. We offer all contemporary amenities and a bounty of space to spare. Casa da Mineira is very proud to welcome all guests.

The space
Casa da Mineira is a airy 160 m2 or 1600sf house that sits in a 6-acre walled property. The grounds include a garden, lawn, granite patio and areas of orchard and cultivated fields. The grounds are part of a large 300-acre farm called Quinta de Vilarinho which has been in the family for many generations. The present configuration of the farm compound, with its mansion, barns and stables dates from the mid 19th century.

The house has 2 large bedrooms with private bathrooms, an additional bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Casa da  Mineira sits in the quiet village of Vilarinho, Macieira, county of Vila do Conde. The village offers basic amenities and commerce, such as a pharmacy and a supermarket.

neighborhood_overview:
“SUITE 51" is located at Rua da Fábrica, 120 m from Liberdade Square, in the hearth of the Porto Downtown, one of the most privileged areas of Porto.

The district has many restaurants with different types of cuisine, coffee shops, bakeries, grocery stores, supermarkets, shopping centers, banks and ATM's, libraries, beautiful gardens, art galleries, museums, theaters and trendy nightlife clubs.

The location is perfect to visit the old town, to enjoy the night life of the city, take a boat trip on the Douro River, visit the Port Wine cellars and taste the regional cuisine of Porto.

Quiet and confortable suite in a family house near Casa da Música, Boavista.

Located 10 minutes away from Porto historic centre and nightlife, by subway, the area is well served by all public transportation means.

All facilities (supermarket, banks, restaurants, etc) are within walking distance from the house.

The space
Hi,

Welcome to our place and make your self at home.

Located in the financial district of Boavista, near Casa da Música, this XIX century house was the main building of a former factory of the Industrial Revolution period. The house was completely rebuilt in 2014.

Here you will find the perfect accommodation for a few days at Porto.

The room is very spacious and comfortable with a private WC and a view to the backyard.

High speed internet and WiFi are available to our guests.

Guest access
Guests have access to all common areas of the house and the
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of the house is very quite and amenable.
Guests will find all facilities within less than 10 min walk from the house. A grocery store is located in the house next to ours and two larger supermarkets are within walking distance.

The house is located 5 min walk from the Casa da Música and several restaurants.
The beach is 7 km away from where we are.
The Serralves gardens and Modern Art Museum are 10 min away by bus.
The downtown area is just 10 min away by subway.
