name: ORM - Guindais Apartment
description:
Apartment located on the first floor front of a building considered a UNESCO world heritage site. Totally refurbished, with the original facade beeing maintained.

Open-space apartment with 1 double bed, 1 bathroom with shower, fully equipped kitchen and small living room. Renovated 1930s building, with a privileged location in the historical center of Porto, 1 minute from the Cathedral and the Luis I.

Ideal for 1 - 2 people.

Prices vary according to the seasons.

The space
See also our list of additional services, which will elevate your experience in our city.

The apartment is located on Saraiva de Carvalho Street and was named "Guindais". Guindais was originally named after an old wharf that disappeared in 1940. It is also the name of the funicular and the famous stairs that give access to the riverside area.

The building of the apartment Guindais, dates back to the 30's, retaining its original structure and
neighborhood_overview:
Familiar building located in a residential area, 140m (1 minute walk) from the Porto Cathedral (Sé) and the famous Luís I bridge where you can enjoy a breathtaking and unforgettable view of the historic Ribeira and modern Cais de Gaia, divided by the imposing Douro River. You can also visit on foot the main tourist points of the city, as well as the area where are the cafes, bars and places of entertainment.
Points of interest:
- Porto Cathedral (Sé do Porto) (140m / 1min walk)
- Luís I bridge (350m / 3min walk)
- Rua de Santa Catarina
- Majestic Café (550m / 6min walk)
- Avenida dos Aliados (400m / 5min walk)
- Ribeira (650m / 7 min walk)
- S. Francisco Church (750m / 8 min walk)
- Mercado do Bolhão (1km / 15min walk / 5 min by subway/tram)
- Torre dos Clérigos
- Lello Library(650m / 7 min walk)
- Nossa Senhora do Carmo das Carmelitas Church (900m / 12 min walk)
host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 by the wishes of four young friends. The ORM was born of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela vontade de quatro jovens amigos. A ORM nasce da combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

It is located on the 3rd floor, at Rua da Boavista, a renowned area full of restaurants and coffee shops. Please note that, as far as we preserved an ancient building, it has not elevator!

name: Beach room near Airport and Porto
description:
On the "Caminho de Santiago", through the coast, appears this big house. Ground floor is available for guests. Our family is also available to pick you up at the airport or drive you anywhere! Be aware that there are children living at the first floor of the house :)

The space
The house is big, and belongs to a small farm family property. It's right in front of the sea.

The ground-floor of the house has 4 rooms available for rent, one bathroom (for 3 rooms), a kitchen and a living room for guests.
Outside there are gardens, a swimming pool (in renovation), a area with vegetable garden, and other area with animals (sheep and goats).

The base price is for two people (or 1 person) in double bed.
In this room there is also possibility of another mattress. We also have bedding for babies, just ask!

Please ask us if you need extra bed or more rooms, because we have other rooms next to it! Perfect for big families or friend
neighborhood_overview:
Praia do Paraíso is a small beach in Perafita, next to some other big beaches like Praia do Cabo do Mundo, and Praia do Aterro, very frequented by surfers and body-boarders.
Also Praia da Memória, famous because of a Portuguese historical event, is very near.
Angeiras, a fisherman village is quite near (5 km) where boats are still pulled to the beach and where you can taste fresh fish there and also enjoy the calm beach.

Leça da Palmeira, 4 km, has some architecture famous buildings like "Piscinas das marés" (salt water pools design by Álvaro Siza Vieira), and also many trendy restaurants and pubs

Matosinhos, also known to have the best fish restaurants is very closed (8 km).

Porto is just around the corner, you can visit Tower of Clérigos, Casa da Música, Livraria Lello (bookshop), the Port Wine Cellars, Miguel Bombard (design district) or just experience the downtown life, with lots of restaurants and shops.

name: Upper Porto Apartment for 2
description:
A light filled traditional one bedroom apartment on a 4th floor (no lift!) with city views. It has all the essentials for a comfortable stay in Porto: a kitchenette, washing machine, Cable-TV, and WiFi Internet. Perfect for a couple discovering Porto or for students as it is close to Fernando Pessoa University and UP faculties.

Guest access
You have access to the whole apartment.

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE
->This apartment is in a central area of the city, but not in the historical centre. It is facing a street with a bit of car movement, so it could be noisy for those of you used to quiet places!
->4 floors without a lift! If you come with big suitcases, this one might not be the right for you!!
-> Parking is hard here, free on the street but tends to be occupied.
->Late Check-ins after 20:00 are of course possible for an additional fee depending on arrival time. Please see above under check-in.

Lic
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment on the corner of Antero de Quental street and António Candido is very close to Constituição street, which we could say is the northern limit of the downtown area of Porto.

In this area you have a great garden: Quinta do Covelo, excellent to take a walk. There are many local traditional shops, some good long lasting restaurants, like Capitão Pombeiro or the Pub Cenáculo; a school and it is not too far away from Fernando Pessoa University. At about 8 minutes walking is the metro station, but on the street there are also buses.

If you walk the Antero de Quental street you come past the beautiful Lapa Church, then the Praça Da República and there you are in the centre of Porto.
host_about:
2004, during the Football european championship I rented out a fully furnished and equipped flat in Porto to foreign guests. It was the one in Boavista. 
The experience was great. The people who stayed loved the apartment, and I loved the concept of renting my flat to visitors. I prepared the flat not only with furniture and bed linen! I tried to gather useful information about Porto and surroundings in order to help my guests make the best of their time in town.
Then friends and family, who either got married and saw their families grow or had to move abroad, started asking me to take care of their flats, apartments or townhouses and find guests. Again, I prepared the flats so that anyone visiting Porto would feel welcome and easily integrated in Porto.
Well, now it's two of us, me and my colleague Paula (https://www.airbnb.pt/users/show/180050) and we decided to create a small company called Flat in Porto to manage all these flats and get them ready to welcome you in our city. 
All of these homes still have the owners' own touch, so you get an inside feeling of how people live in Porto. We hope you like your new temporary home in Porto, no matter if you are on holidays, studying or working here, and we do hope you enjoy your stay with us!

name: Sunny "FLAT 51/52" Porto Downtown
description:
“FLAT 51/ 52" is located in Rua da Fábrica, 120 m from the main Liberdade Square, in the hearth of the Historic Porto Downtown, one of the most privileged areas of Porto - World Heritage Area by UNESCO.

All the most important tourist sights, restaurants and bars are within walking distance

The space
“Flat 51/52” is an apartment recently fully renovated and decorated with refined details.

The space is composed by the union of 2 sunnies Studios to host up 8 people.

The apartment is very bright thanks to 8 large windows and is furnished with:

- 2 good double bed with comfy encased coils mattress
- 2 good sofa double bed (one provides with chaise long)
- 2 dinning table with chairs

Both 2 bathrooms are provided with large contemporary marble showers.

The kitchen is equipped with a modern boost induction hob, combo-fridge, microwave with grill (dishes, cutlery, glasses, pans & frying pan are
neighborhood_overview:
"Flat 51/52" is located in the heart of Historical Area of Porto, just only 120 meters from the Aliados Avenue, in the heart of the Porto Downtown

The district has many restaurants with different types of cuisine, coffee shops, bakeries, grocery stores, supermarkets, shopping centers, banks and ATM's, libraries, beautiful gardens, art galleries, museums, theaters and trendy nightlife clubs.

The location is perfect to visit the old town, to enjoy the night life of the city, take a boat trip on the Douro River, visit the Port Wine cellars and taste the regional cuisine of Porto.

Examples of nearby points of interest:

- Aliados Avenue & Aliados Metro Station (1 min walk)
- Clérigos Tower (2 min walk)
- Neo gothic/Art Nouveau Livraria "Lello & Irmão" bookstore (3 min walk)
- Nightlife streets bars & clubs (3 min walk)
- Historical "São Bento" Railway Station (3 min walk)
- Theater "Sá da Bandeira" + Theater "Rivoli" (both
host_about:

I'm Architect, I had Art school formation and I collaborate in several cultural events.

I love nature, arts, music and I'm also an enthusiastic surfer and windsurfer.

I'll be very happy to host you, all my guests are very Welcome :)

from #10 at europeanbestdestinations, "Best beaches in Europe 2015",

"Miramar is a small seaside village near the towns of Gulpilhares and Arcozelo, in the municipality of Vila Nova de Gaia, in the subregion of Greater Porto, Portugal (Grande Porto). It is an upmarket residential area south of the river Douro, most known for its beach - Praia de Miramar (Miramar Beach) – and the small chapel called Senhor da Pedra (Lord of the Rock), which forms the central attraction of a yearly festival."

name: Enjoy a Green Local Experience
description:
I live at a quite big and comfortable century old house in the center of Espinho
Is Located within a 5min walking distance from the Train Station Beach main Shopping Street and Sunset
Espinho is a small town, with the benefits of a big city

The space
You will be staying at the century-old house located in the central town of Espinho, where you will find the beach and a long coastline to explore just a minute away but also within walking distance of the opportunity to experience the characteristic sides of the local culture, through the Monday Market and the unmissable arrival of fisherman boats at the auction while you choose the freshest fish for dinner.

The house is invaded every day by a wide range of colors packed with energy, making this your peace place even that it is in the center of the city.

Guest access
Access to all commons spaces of the house, kitchen, dinner room, 2 living rooms, yard, terrace and two
neighborhood_overview:
A small town, with the benefits of a big city.
Espinho, Espinho, a beautifull city ! Espinho, Espinho, a city on the sea shore… - so does a song begin.
Espinho, a city that emerged more than a hundred years ago. Situated on the sea shore, a few kilometers from Porto (capital of the North, the “place to be” when visiting the country) or Aveiro (the Portuguese Venezia), a city of culture, art, sport, fishing, gastronomy...
The layout and numeration of the streets is another of its unusual characteristics, a “grid city”, with even numbered streets parallel to the ocean and odd numbered streets perpendicular to it.
In Espinho, time runs out following the rhythm and taste of the Atlantic Ocean.
Calm and plane, that allows long walks for every visitor, regardless age, always near the Ocean.
The gastronomy will be perhaps among the greatest gains, with plenty of restaurants doing marvels with the fresh fish caught only a few hours before.
The sunsets in Es
host_about:
After several international experiences being a tourist, enjoying the pleasure of travelling, eat and meet people with good vibes, I decided to share and give all the good things that exist in this corner of Europe, PORTUGAL.

Depois de várias experiências nacionais e  internacionais, desfrutando do enorme gosto por viajar, comer e conviver com pessoas diferentes, optei por partilhar  o que existe de bom neste pequeno país, no sul da Europa, Portugal.

name: Fontaínhas Apartamento
description:
Apartamento novo e acolhedor situado no coração da cidade do Porto, num dos bairros mais emblemáticos e a 10 min do centro histórico da cidade. Possui uma localização privilegiada para explorar a pé o centro da cidade.
Tem uma cozinha totalmente equipada: frigorífico, placa a gás, micro-ondas, máquina de lavar roupa, torradeira, chaleira elétrica, espremedor de sumos e todos os utensílios para permitir aos hóspedes preparar as suas próprias refeições.

The space
O apartamento é novo, situado no coração da cidade do Porto, no bairro emblemático das Fontainhas e a 10 minutos do centro do centro histórico da cidade. Tem uma localização privilegiada e reúne todas as condições para que se sinta em sua casa.

Tem uma cozinha totalmente equipada: frigorífico, placa a gás, micro-ondas, máquina de lavar roupa, torradeira, chaleira eléctrica, espremedor de sumos e todos os utensílios, para que possa preparar e saborear as suas próprias refeições. Para além d
neighborhood_overview:
O Fontainhas Apartamento, está localizado nas Fontainhas, um dos bairros mais emblemáticos do Porto, onde se realiza a Festa de S. João a 24 de Junho com a típica sardinha assada.
A Ponte do Infante situa-se a cerca de 150 metros do apartamento e é a principal entrada para o centro da cidade.
O Fontainhas Apartamento situa-se a 900 metros da Ponte D.Luís I e da popular zona da Ribeira e a 10 minutos da baixa do Porto.
Os arredores oferecem todas as comodidades necessárias, desde supermercados a farmácias, mas também a locais de lazer e vida nocturna, como restaurantes, cafés e bares da moda.

Principais pontos de interesse:

Teatro Nacional de S. João - 5 minutos a pé
Catedral do Porto - 8 minutos a pé
Ponte D. Luís I - 8 minutos a pé
Funicular dos Guindais - 7 minutos a pé ( através deste ”funicular” terá acesso direto e rápido às caves de Vinho do Porto, no lado sul do rio, que são um dos principais pontos de atração da cidade

Very comfortable 150 square meters apartment with two lovely bedrooms and a space living room with private balcony and fireplace for the winter. A big terrace for relaxing, also where kids can play freely. Everything thought so you can feel like home.

There is an elevator to the apartment no stairs needed so it is wheelchair friendly.
Garage available free of charge.
Great outside terrace for kids.

Guest access

Cafe's, bars, pharmacy, restaurants, ATM's, self-service laundry, shopping, supermarket, subway are all within 2 minutes.
Typical Portuguese restaurant near as well international fast-food (like MacDonald)

In terms of local attractions there's plenty of choice the nearest are Mercado do Bolhão (traditional market) and Santa Catarina street (the biggest shopping street) with many attractions such as Almas Chapel, Magestic Café and all 3 main theaters. Also a walk distance we have other main attractions like Clérigos, Lello's bookstore and night life.

neighborhood_overview:
The flat is really nice and comfortable. It is just renovated and everything is new. Flat has two rooms, with a TV with cable in each of it. The flat has a Wi-Fi with a very strong signal. You have a washing machine, microwave, and everything needed for living. The flat has a small garden and two doors to outside. It is like a semidetached home in a quiet region. You have near the biggest shopping mall in Porto (just a few minutes of walking) and next to the home there is the metro and the bus. This region is very safe and friendly. The ocean is very close and around the house there are many grocery shops. Ideal for couples and honeymooners.
The house is fully equiped. No need to bring any kind of cloths either for bed either for bathroom. Depending on the will and relationship can host up to 3 people.

The small vegetable garden give you some seasonal fruits and vegetables that you can use for free in the preparation of your dishes. The house is equipped with barbecue and there is a supermarket 5 minutes walk. The living room is filled with light and the sounds of birds. Although small, the bathroom is very beautiful and pleasant. It can be provided a crib for baby.

The space
The house, located in the area of a century-old aqueduct, is close to forest area, which can be explored on bike rides. It can provide two bicycles. The house has an outdoor place for car.
